1b1(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya su bi kA dad tsi ta de pa bu da tra ba ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du
1b2(mdo): 'phags pa lha'i bu rab brtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
1b3(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das gnyen du yod pa ma/ rgyal
1b4(mdo): bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal 'gor myed zas spyir gi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
1b5(mdo): 'jig rten ki khams// gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rabatu mang po dang / 'dod pa
1b6(mdo): ma spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i lham bu rnams dang / klu'i rgyal
1b7(mdo): po rgya mtsho las stsogs pa'i 'khor mang po dang / gnod sbyin gi rgyal po lus ngan las stsogs pa gnod sbyin gi 'khor mang po rnams
1b8(mdo): dang / nam mkha' lding gyi rgyal po stobs chen las stsogs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gi
2a1(mdo): dbang po sma gcan las stsogs pa lha ma yin gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las/ stsogs pa myi'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag
2a2(mdo): bzangs las stsogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'kho dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
2a3(mdo): pa tshangs ris kyi lha phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsas rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa thabs gcig du bzhugs te// de dag
2a4(mdo): las stsogs pa 'khor bzhi mang po rnams kyis yongs su bsko rad cing mad+ya na gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur da te 'dug go// lha'i bu
2a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa/ rab phal sems kyang 'dus par gyur du te/ 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu rab chal
2a6(mdo): sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par rig nas/ sta nadang las langs te gla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
2a7(mdo): thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnabs lags/
2a8(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags/
2a9(mdo): ba rnams lags// ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mur ba
2b1(mdo): dang bral ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la
2b2(mdo): rton pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtenang gi tshul gri chos ston pa rnams lakra/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
2b3(mdo): kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par
2b4(mdo): shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags// ji lta rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems
2b5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams la gas// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtenang gi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams lags/
2b6(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pas dbang po la mkhas
2b7(mdo): pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang mo 'dres pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gnas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2b8(mdo): po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i slad du snrel gzhing sgrub pa mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las gi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyul mkhas pa rnams lags/
2b9(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs
3a1(mdo): su sbyinang par bgyid pa dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas rtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags// ji ltar/
3a2(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad
3a3(mdo): kyi pha rol son pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar tsho ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten
3a4(mdo): thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnaMs lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub
3a5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa ma mchis pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya mtsho
3a6(mdo): lta bu rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po chos la dbang bsgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a7(mdo): chen po bgyi ba thams cad la bslob dpon du gyur da pa rnams lags// ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa dzas
3a8(mdo): lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab chal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab tshal sems legs so// legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a9(mdo): dpa' chen po 'jig rtend thams cad las mtshon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rtend ki yongs su 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skal pa grangs myed pa nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shi nad tu brtan pa/
3b1(mdo): ded dpon chen po/ sems can dpag tu myed pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu myed pa thang bde ba la rab tu 'akod pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs/
3b2(mdo): su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la gzung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par
3b3(mdo): 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar slar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
3b4(mdo): pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po gzhan ki drid myi 'jog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs
3b5(mdo): pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / ngor dang chos su mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i
3b6(mdo): mngon par shes pa lnga po dag ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnams yin no// de la 'di skad
3b7(mdo): ces byas te/ thabs la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub par byed pa'i// mngon gsum shes rab gtogs par khong du chud gyur da cing // thabs cad skyabs phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la// gnas pa'i byams pa
3b8(mdo): mngon par bsgrub par byed 'gyur la// don dang chos la shi nad tu mkhas par 'gyur ba'i// so so yang dag rika la spobs pa thob gyur da la// byang chub la la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtse na// des ni gzhan gi
3b9(mdo): dring la 'jog par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir myi zlogs
4a1(mdo): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / bsam pa dag pa'i brtulang pa dang / byang chub la 'dus pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su myi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/
4a2(mdo): zhwa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ba'i po de dag dang ldan pa/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtsod 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bcom sasari rab tu gnas pa myed gyur
4a3(mdo): cing // bsam pa rnyog pa myed cing yongs su dag 'gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs kyi skyo// gang la chos bzhi rgya chen byeng par de
4a4(mdo): yod pa// de ni byang chub lam du mngon 'byung brtan 'gyur zhing byang chub yan lag lag mthil gzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// ring po myi thogs 'jig rte nang gsum gi chos rgyal 'gyur// lha'i bu byang
4a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// / bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha
4a6(mdo): rold tu phyind pa la mdoms par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang // sprul pa lta bur rus gsum yongs su
4a7(mdo): bsngo ba dang // byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes
4a8(mdo): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'doms shing // byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzind 'jug byed la// gang dag byang chub zhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing // yid dam ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub
4a9(mdo): 'dod byed la// dge ba gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rte nad par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma// ye she
4b1(mdo): kyi chags pa myed par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ shes pas byas pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing ngargyal gyis byas pa rnams kyi byed pa dang // chos thams cad rkye nga la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa myed pa gang
4b2(mdo): zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing / sems cad thams cad kyi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa
4b3(mdo): bsrung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yid myin zhing // rten la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lta myed la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag
4b4(mdo): sems cad myi gtong zhing // chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nas gnas pa myed// chos mchog pa'i po de la shi nang tu rab gnas pa// shes pas pha rol phyi nad cing chags myed spyod pa
4b5(mdo): yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams/ yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa myed cing tshul
4b6(mdo): bzhin yid la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis chos stond pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dper myed pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /
4b7(mdo): tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag thos tshol ngoms myed tshul bzhin rtog byed cing // de mnyam stond cing klog
4b8(mdo): 'dzinadang rnyed pa tshol myi byed// nyon mongs spri 'dra sgyu ma rmyilam lta bur lta// chos nyid tha dad myi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug che bdag chos bzhi de bsten khyad par 'thob 'gyur zhing // shes rab smon
4b9(mdo): 'das mun bas lang zla ltar 'jig rten rgya// lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhen/
5a1(mdo): // thos pa thams cad 'dzind pa'i gzungs thob pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag myed pa stond pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs/
5a2(mdo): ba dang bral ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thos kun chud myi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag spobs ldan ses/
5a3(mdo): can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag myed ston byed cing // mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud myi nyams// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag gis 'jug na
5a4(mdo): 'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jig pa myed// lha'i bu byang chubu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// thos pas don la rtor pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ zos pa zhes
5a5(mdo): cad myi 'dzind pas thos pa dang myi ldan zhing bsgrubs pa nyams pa byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par
5a6(mdo): bya ba'i phyir/ brag cha dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod du myed pa'i don la 'jug cing / brjod
5a7(mdo): pa'i don la ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la myi rtog pas/ byis pa thos dang myi ldan rtag tu grub chos nyams// srid gsum sgra skad
5a8(mdo): dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa// tha cha 'dra shes de las don lngaran smra thos nas/ 'don nyid rtog cing dag mgu nyes kun phyir myi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du myed// 'di na don dang sgra skad
5a9(mdo): thos par gyur pa lags// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ 'jig rten tshul gyi chos la rtonang pa rnams yin no//
5b1(mdo): bzhi grang zhe na/ the mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston nga ba dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su 'dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams
5b2(mdo): cad las dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang che skye bo mang po'i dbus su son 'gyur la// der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par
5b3(mdo): gyu rang pa'i tshigs rnams la// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom par bya// des ni bag yod gzhan gi gtong ba rnam sku yin// gtong la yi rang byas nas byang chub sngo bya zhing // gang che 'du 'jingag dang
5b4(mdo): 'phrad par gyur po'i tshe// der ni dben par gzhol bar rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang / ldan na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa
5b5(mdo): bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sem shes myi gtong ba dang / thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smra/ shes pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gis bdag myed pa la 'jug
5b6(mdo): pa ste 'o// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems myi gtong // de dag bskyo ba pa'i chos thos bsgrub pa'i snying por byed// bka' bro ba de mthun
5b7(mdo): ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag myed 'jug/ de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur zhig// rtag brtson myi 'dor rjes 'thun bdag myed ci yang myed rtag tu snyan pa'i
5b8(mdo): 'phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing // de ltar chos smra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// / lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/
5b9(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid bsgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos stonang pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrungs pa dang / grol ba dang / brtul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / sems cad
6a1(mdo): gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / grol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir chos stond par byed pa dang bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyurapa/
6a2(mdo): cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu dgod par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la yang stond par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bsgrub pa'i/
6a3(mdo): snying por byed cing 'gro la chos stonang la// dul srungs legs brtul shi nad tu mya ngan 'das nas kyang // gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag chos kyis dkon mchog 'byor da par 'dzud de
6a4(mdo): rag byang chub sems la bsam pa nges 'gyur cing // theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed// rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing // sems can rnams la yang de dang 'thun pa'i
6a5(mdo): chos rnams stor to// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po ches pa'i dang ldan na/ mngod par shes pa rnams kyis mdza ma par 'phags pa rnam pa yin te// bani gang zhen/ yang dang ya
6a6(mdo): du tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang bzhis gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyu dang tu rab tu dbem par gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de
6a7(mdo): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing // dben par gnas pa la yang dgal bar bskyed byed la// shes rab zab mo'i bzod la nges pa thob gyur da cing // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang //
6a8(mdo): ldan par gyur pa ste// de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa myed pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phag gyur cing // de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dra la// sems can mang po rnams
6a9(mdo): kyang yongs su spyir byer 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// bdud thams cad kyis shum par dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi ga zhes/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par
6b1(mdo): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i ba
6b2(mdo): rol tu phyind pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mtshan myed stong pas nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi bsgom zhing // sems can yongs su bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon
6b3(mdo): mchog gsum rgyur gyi gcod bcom 'grus thob 'gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan pa ro lang phyi rang pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar spyod pakhas zo ldan che ba dag yid bzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi ngag las yang dag 'das gyung/
6b4(mdo): cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba 'gon myed rnams/ mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i sam la dgod par byed// lha'i bu byang chu de sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ zlos
6b5(mdo): gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ chos zab/ mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dag 'ab dang // rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems dpar byed pa dang /
6b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrib pa myed pa la sems kyis nges par byed pa s+ho// chos bzhi po de dag dngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang // rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen/
6b7(mdo): par dka' gyur la// rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam pa zhugs gyur da cing / sems kyis nges par gtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan par rab gnas pa// blo rnams dag gis gting
6b8(mdo): dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing // chags pa myed pa'i ye shes yang dag bsgrub byed pa// de phyir blo rnams ngag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
6b9(mdo): dang ldan pa/ 'jig te rang gi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhem/ rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / stong pa dang / bdebs khengs pa skyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / kyi snyad pa dang / spang ba dang /
7a1(mdo): sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa myed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa srung zhing dben pa lta bu ste/ chos bzhi po re/
7a2(mdo): ngag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyed dang / bstan dang / bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni rnams kyang khengs par 'gyur ba 'gyur myed pa// ma rnyed kyi snyan spang dang sdug bsngal thob gyur da kyang
7a3(mdo): de dag pad ma bzhin du chags myed 'jig rten spyod// sems can spyi nad par bya phyir phung po yongs spyod cing // phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma rlar shes pa// sems can phan pa de'i don tu 'jig rten spyod byed kyang
7a4(mdo): 'jig rtend chos kyis ma gos tshul khrims spos dang ldan// lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan dam/ gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
7a5(mdo): gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag myed pa dang / sems can la sems can myed pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa chags pa myed pa/ ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
7a6(mdo): bdag la bdag myed nyid du yongs su shes gyur da cing // sems can sems can myed par rjes su rtogs 'gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su shes gyur da cing // mkha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa
7a7(mdo): yod myin po'o// dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed la// spyod pa myed la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur da cing // 'dzin tang kun 'dzin kun dang bral bas// sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'//
7a8(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// chos stond pas dbang po mkhas pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang /
7a9(mdo): shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyurd cing // shes pas so so yang dag par rig pa mya
7b1(mdo): ba 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rjon por gyur da cing sngon yang mi// yang dag bstsogs pa yongs su dag pa thob gyurang ba// sems camarnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs/
7b2(mdo): bu gro bar byed// de dag pa stanang bas 'bras bu myed pa ma yin te// bgyid mya ngan 'das ras kya ngang 'da' par byed// zhwa'i tha kyang chub sems dpa' mams rnan man pocom pa'i dang ldadad// dus
7b3(mdo): a byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams tha dad pa byed pa dang / mtshan ma
7b4(mdo): byed pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog spyod pa rnams yongs su su da las 'da' bar byed pa dang / spyo pa myong mas gnas shing / sems can yongs su smi da par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhim du skye ba se nad pa dang /
7b5(mdo): thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// stong nyid spro/ da yul de dag lhur bcings grol byed cing // mtshan myed gnas shing
7b6(mdo): sems can 'di dag yongs su sbyid pa byed// smon pa myed la nas shing sems cad spyir bya ba'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing ga nga du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis nges 'byung rnam
7b7(mdo): thar sgor gnas kyang // 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni 'dus myin thob kyi byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel gzhing bsgrub
7b8(mdo): pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad bsgrib pa myed par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs
7b9(mdo): su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rang bzhin cad gi chos thams cad la nem nur myed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// / sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'byung gyur cing /
8a1(mdo): de dag rnams kyis sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong myi 'gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab 'byung ba ma// shes nas de la snrel gzhir kun tu ston myi byed// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan
8a2(mdo): 'das pa dang // ma skyes ma 'gags ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kung mkhyerang yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag char gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
8a3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa myi spong ba dang / mtho' ris su skye bo'i rgyu tshul khrims myi spong ba dang /
8a4(mdo): shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa myi spang ba dang / bral ba'i sgom pa myi spong ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ longs spyod ce rgyu sbyin pa myi spong de'i 'bras bu te// mtho ris skye rgyu tshul
8a5(mdo): khrims 'thob cing 'bras bu te/ shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras bu te/ rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed cing de'i/ 'bras bu te/ rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag mi
8a6(mdo): byang chub snying por dbang skur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lho'i bu mtha' dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa
8a7(mdo): rlabs yin/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chang par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na ma shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang myi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags man shi'i bar du
8a8(mdo): 'gag par lta zhing srid pa 'gog par yang myi byed pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par myi lta chad par lhung myi byed// des ni chos rnams rkyedad 'byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor
8a9(mdo): ba po myed rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes// ma rig rtsal las rga shi'i bar du byung 'gyur ba// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni// rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad myi skye 'gyur/ zhes gsungs// lha'i bu
8b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rag las par
8b2(mdo): lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstsags pa la skyo ba myed pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang mos pa thabs kyis nyams
8b3(mdo): su myong bar byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la brten // dge ba stsogs shing 'dod pas yongs
8b4(mdo): su skyo ba myed// 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das yongs yu tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8b5(mdo): po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho/ ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod myi zad pa dang / chos ston po mya zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /
8b6(mdo): sems sa dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu myi zad cing // rtag tu chos kyis myi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin/ de dag mngon shes lnga po mya
8b7(mdo): zad rtag myi g.yol// rtag tu drad ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin// mnyam myed byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsho 'gyur/
8b8(mdo): zhing // byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung ba 'gyur lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/
8b9(mdo): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsrud pa dang / bden pa bzhis shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces byaste/
9a1(mdo): 59/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dag gis gnas byed cing / bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dka' byed la/ bden pa bzhi po dag la 'jigs byed dpa' bo rnams// 'gro bas ri mos byas
9a2(mdo): shing mchod pa byas par 'gyuraso so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing / 'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyu ra la pha rol bde bar gyur da pa'i bde bas mgu byed na / de'i phyir de dag yid
9a3(mdo): du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang / tshul
9a4(mdo): khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa myed pa dang / des shing 'grog sa na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrungs pa dang / bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags pa myed cing rtag tu kha na ma
9a5(mdo): tho ba la lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po dag dang ngo de la 'di skadaces bya ste thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol da som/ tshul 'chos myed cing rtag tu nges las brtul zhugs
9a6(mdo): bzang / nags dang nags rab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la/ dran ldan bdag bde myi ltos kha na ma tho lta// gang la rtag du dge bo'i yon tan de yod pa// de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson
9a7(mdo): 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can don yang rtag du byed 'gyur la// rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge ba'i spyod pa zas
9a8(mdo): cad la spras pa myed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga bzhen dad pa phun gsum tshogs pa dang / brtson 'grus phum gsum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phur gsum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yongs su sngo
9a9(mdo): ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te chos bzhi po de dag dang po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste ga/ de dag dad dang ldan la rtul ba brtan ldan zhing / de dag brtson 'grus mthu' dang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun
9b1(mdo): la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing // byang chub ched du yongs su bsngo la mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge ba kun la spras pa yod mying zhing // zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkhas la skar ma yi// tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam/
9b2(mdo): par mdzes pa ltar// yang dang yang du dge bkun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo mas pa'i rang stu na/ shes rab dgal rgya mchog su rnams yin te/ bzhi gang ni/
9b3(mdo): ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa dang // sgrub pa'i snying por byed pa dang / khro rab tu gnas pa dang / lpag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje skur gtan ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas
9b4(mdo): pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa'i snying por byed cing / bro rab gnas/ gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta buli// skrag pa'i bsam pa btad pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang
9b5(mdo): dag chos bzhi de dag stor byed pa// de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes/ gnyer bsten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par// 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzi dad par
9b6(mdo): khyed pa yin/ lga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gni ba ldan pa/ com sa dbang sgyur ba'i dbang phyug tu bya ra pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhes/ ye shes rgya/
9b7(mdo): can rnams yin zhing // nyor mongs pa'i stobs ca rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la dbang sbyar ba rdams yim 'anga'o// bdud kyis dbang bskur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang / spobs pa phur gsum tshogs
9b8(mdo): pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rngams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang myi 'gro// shes rab stobs kyis
9b9(mdo): zung spangs lha rnams kur dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdung ba'i spangs kyu nga lag/ spobs pa brtad par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrungs pa myed// de dag stong pa 'bras bu myed par myi 'gyur te//
10a1(mdo): dbyir myar nga tu bangar phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// zhwa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo mom pa'i dang ldam / bya ba thams cad la slob dpor du gyu pa rdabs yin rtse pani sa /
10a2(mdo): nga rgyal myed pa dang // bla ma la gus pa dang / bka yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ngargyal myed cing bla ma gus pas gnas 'gyur la// kun dam bag yod byang chub
10a3(mdo): mchog la 'dun drag cing bsam pa zag pas smon cing rtag tu dran 'gyur las slob dpo ma pe mkhyud myed pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rteran 'das pa'i don mkhas shing // tshul dang tshul ma yi
10a4(mdo): la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams/ 'jig rten kun 'dza' thams cad gtogs par khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la btud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
10a5(mdo): ldan na/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing yon tan rnam pa tha/ mas cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
10a6(mdo): cad kyi dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang myi bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral zhing dbang skur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po dag dang ngo // de la 'di
10a7(mdo): skad ces bya ste// sems can dag pa rgya cher mngon shes shes pas rtse// bder gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkhas 'dra'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs myed myi dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang /
10a8(mdo): ldan zhing dbang skur thob par gyur pa ste/ chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur da pa// de dag kha na ma tho myed pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstand pa na// lha dang myi rjes
10a9(mdo): las mog chags sa la nyi 'bum kyis thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems babyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang byi ngams
10b1(mdo): kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rngam par dag so// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos shing // 'jig rte rang
10b2(mdo): thams cad sdang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i mye tog gi char rab tu phab cing / lha'i sil snyar dag gi sgra yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis mu tig mar po dang / klu'i mye tog gi char rab tu
10b3(mdo): phab po// lha ma yin dngas nam mkha' lding dab gyi 'am ci dpa' lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / bcom spyan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jo
10b4(mdo): rnams kyis kyangs la la chos a la la chos e la la chos shes lagasum ched du brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
10b5(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos gsum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi dor dang tshig rngam par brtan la 'bab pa bstan pa de bka' stsal pas// 'jam dpal
10b6(mdo): khyod kyang chos gsum bcu rtsa gnyis po ba dag gi ri dang tshig rnam par btad la 'bab pa de la spogs par gyis shig/ 'angam dpal 'ilta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
10b7(mdo): kazha gi dring gyi 'jog pa rnams yid// 'jas dpal gis smras pa kwa'i bu gang gi na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kazhad kyi kyi da kyis kyi 'gro ba de ltamad/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'/
10b8(mdo): sems dpa' cher po theg pa chen po la gzhan gi dring myi 'jog pa rnams yin mo// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cham pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bcan/
10b9(mdo): pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
11a1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag
11a2(mdo): gyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings myi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub
11a3(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa myed
11a4(mdo): par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gis spras pas lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par myi byed pa dang / de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub ses
11a5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa myed par spyod pa/ rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis sun
11a6(mdo): ba dang bral ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe sa thams cad rang bzhin gis yongs su dag par shes par
11a7(mdo): byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
11a8(mdo): 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phye na myi rnyed par byed pa
11a9(mdo): de ltar na// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
11b1(mdo): chen po thos pas don la rtond pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa ga lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad brjod du myed par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
11b2(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pas ngor la btang ba rnams yin no// kwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rter gi tshul gyis chos la gtom pa
11b3(mdo): rnams yid pa 'ang ba dpal gis smras pa la lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11b4(mdo): chen po 'jig rte nang gi tshul gyis chos la brto dad pa rngams yin no// sna'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
11b5(mdo): kyis gsungs pa' bzhin du smra ba rdzabs yin 'jab dpal gyisasmras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po rnams sgra thams cad la khate nad par myi byed pa de
11b6(mdo): ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub ses
11b7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa
11b8(mdo): de lta na/ de lta'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par
11b9(mdo): shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin / 'jam dpal gyis spras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo' bar myi byed pa de ltan/
12a1(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12a2(mdo): cher po brdung thams cad kyis thulang bar dka' ba rngams yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su gtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid
12a3(mdo): byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
12a4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bros gting dpag dka' ba rnam sa yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
12a5(mdo): cad kyi gting gtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
12a6(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtenang gi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig
12a7(mdo): rten na spyod kyang 'jig rtend kyi chos rnams kyis gos par myi 'gyur ba de lta na// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtend kyi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
12a8(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12a9(mdo): rnams bdag la bdag myed pas sgyid lug par myi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
12b1(mdo): ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bstan pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gi dbang po
12b2(mdo): thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos stond pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
12b3(mdo): dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rngam par tha rad pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thard
12b4(mdo): pa stond par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par tha rang po la sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
12b5(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i/ nga rgyal can gatshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// 'jam dpal gas smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
12b6(mdo): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba la sa mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa/
12b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can 'tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// spu'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi
12b8(mdo): bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad myi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang/
12b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu las mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral
13a1(mdo): zhing rtend cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag myed par shes par
13a2(mdo): byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub seMs
13a3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig
13a4(mdo): rtenang gi tshul la smond par myi byed pa de lta na/ lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dag la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'dzag
13a5(mdo): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba sam pa yongs su dag pas rtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'ja/ ma dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
13a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams gtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam ba yongs su dag pas rtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no//
13a7(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
13a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed
13a9(mdo): cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rngams yin
13b1(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta ma/ lU'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa
13b2(mdo): rol tu phyi rad pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin
13b3(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings myi zad par rab tu gtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
13b4(mdo): po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtend thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur
13b5(mdo): ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gapa gatsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams kyi sdang / ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de lta ra
13b6(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten de thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
13b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len
13b8(mdo): par myi byed spong bar myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jas dpal ji ltar
13b9(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas pa myed pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
14a1(mdo): chos thams cad ram mkha' dang mtshungs sa gzhi 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa myed pa rnams yin/
14a2(mdo): no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal
14a3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa myi byed pa de lta nalha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
14a4(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
14a5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du myed pa sems pas/ sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub se// mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang bsgyur bas dbang
14a6(mdo): phyug du gyurd pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gis
14a7(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing // tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig zhes par byed pa de lta ra/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
14a8(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po khya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin mo// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du 'das tho ba myed cing
14a9(mdo): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po myed par gtogs nas chos 'ga' yang grub pa
14b1(mdo): myi byed// chos 'ga' yang seld par myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing // yon tan rngam pa thams dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 'jam dpal
14b2(mdo): gzhon nur gyur pas bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong kyis myi skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob pa gyur to// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyi stong ni chos rjes
14b3(mdo): la chos kyi dbyig rdul byed cing dri ma dang bral ba rngam par dag go// srog chags 'bum lhag tsam gis mi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
14b4(mdo): mchod pa'i phyir lnga rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar sna bal sa lha'i me tog gi cha dag mngon par rab tu phab po// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rngams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bsta dang
14b5(mdo): pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang dga' ba dang ga yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag/ thos par gyur da cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
14b6(mdo): spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa myi chod pa yang thob paragyur da cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam da la gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam pa
14b7(mdo): gtan la dbab pa bstand pa 'di legs par smras te// legs so// legs so// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// / bam po gnyis pa'o//
14b8(mdo): de nas lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod ngam/ 'jam dpal
14b9(mdo): dpes smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang / 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/
15a1(mdo): chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa myed pa'i phyir 'dod pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni myig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar myi snang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon par bsgrub pa
15a2(mdo): byed pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir myi mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang / yid dang // rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag bgyi ba myed pa yin mo// chos
15a3(mdo): 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul myed pa'i phyir yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gis dben pa'i phyir zag pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di
15a4(mdo): ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba myed pa yin no// chos nga 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di de ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa myed pa
15a5(mdo): yin mo// chos 'di ni rtag cing sel pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba myed pa yin nog/ chos 'di ni nam mkha' ngang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa myed pa yin mo// chos 'di mi gnyer po myed pa'i phyir/
15a6(mdo): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di ro bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo' ba myed pa dang / rlom sems myed pa dang / ma gtags pa dang // rnam par ma gtags pa dang
15a7(mdo): rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang kun tu ma brtand pa yin no// chos 'di ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i
15a8(mdo): phyir gnas myed pa gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gis nye bar zhig/
15a9(mdo): phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyis rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa myed pa yin no//
15b1(mdo): 'di'i 'ang gas kyi tshus da sa pa'i phyo na/ nga slong bsrud pa / 'dodungs pas gtags pa'i phyir pa dngas myed pa ma/
15b2(mdo): chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'i phyir spyond pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rtse ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir myi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di na grog
15b3(mdo): myed pa'i phyir myi rte rang ba yin no// chos 'di ni gyi brtend pa'i phyir myi g.yol ba yin no// chos 'di ni bzod pa nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa myed pa'i phyir
15b4(mdo): sems cad myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod pa nas ma byung gyi kyir rtag pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// /
15b5(mdo): chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid myed pa yin no// chos 'di bzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i/ phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/
15b6(mdo): yang dag par rgyur chad pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni myi byed pa dang/ myi sdang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin ma/ lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta zhig yod// lha'i bus
15b7(mdo): spras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa ni kun tu 'pho ba myed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa la lha'i bu legs so / legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di ni dgapa pa ni gang la lus dang /
15b8(mdo): ngag dang / sems kyis rtuld pa myed pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni gsal la rnyog pa myed pa yin pas de ni sems rnyog pa can gis mchod par myi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa
15b9(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjes su drad pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin mo// sgra dang / skad dang
16a1(mdo): dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gis rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su drad par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyor/
16a2(mdo): mongs pa gtan spong ba rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yi nado
16a3(mdo): ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims sems rnyog pa tsam yin lo// sems cad la te rang pa'i 'azod pa'i sems ni sems rtog pa ca yid no// sprom pa dngu 'acas bu 'igis rab kyise mas kyi sems rnyog pacan mimado/
16a4(mdo): bdag tu 'dzind pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// the tsom cam gi snying rje'i sems
16a5(mdo): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang / bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// gnyis// pa la gnas pa'i gtang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can
16a6(mdo): yin no// lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rlon/ pa can yin no/ chos su 'du shes pa'i dra pa nye bar ga'agu pa'i mas ni sems rtog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jig par 'du
16a7(mdo): shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa car yin no// sus dang sems la te nang pa'i su 'phrulang gi rkang pa 'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yi mdo// dbang po drug la brted pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems risam
16a8(mdo): rnyog pa can yin no// lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'du byed
16a9(mdo): yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam bsgom po'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sdug bsngal la yongs su gtos pa'i 'du shes can gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la sgom pa'i 'du
16b1(mdo): shes cad gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'gog pa la zad pa'i 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa cad yin no// lam la sgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lha'i bu tsam/
16b2(mdo): du rang bzhin gis yongs su dag pa nyid la spro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jas dpal sems rnyog pa myed pa dag gang yin// 'ja mi dpal gyis smras pa/
16b3(mdo): lha'i bu gang dag sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag ko/ lha'i bus smras pag 'jam dpal nam mkha' la sems cung zad kyang khong dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu ji ltar na nam mkha' la sems
16b4(mdo): myed pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi sems de 'dra rab de'ini sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur// 'jam
16b5(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/
16b6(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam sa zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/
16b7(mdo): lha'i bu rtag par byed pa 'i lhag par byed pa yin no// myi rtag par byed pa mi lhag par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / bdag dang / bdag myed par
16b8(mdo): byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma myed pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// sgyu ma
16b9(mdo): ma dang/ rmyilam dpa' myig g.yor dpag gzugs brnyan dang / brag cha dang / chu zla dang / smyig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe' nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog pa byed/ mtshon par byed/ 'jug par byedal
17a1(mdo): sto ngang par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// ci tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du yang lhag par byed pa yin te/ kud nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba
17a2(mdo): myed pa la skyon myed par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba la bskyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i
17a3(mdo): nga rgyal can rnams kyis lhag par byed pa dag yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lhag par nga rgyal myed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa// lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs
17a4(mdo): shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog par bsgrubs te gnas kyang / 'gog pa 'gog par yang myi byed lag skye ba myed pa bskyed pa myed pa ra yang myi byed cing // sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang myi byed
17a5(mdo): la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing // chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba myed pa dang dor ba myed pa thob pa
17a6(mdo): de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal myed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyi khri nyi stong chos rnamasachos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//
17a7(mdo): dge slong lnga stong ni li nad pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nye stong gis ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag
17a8(mdo): gis ni bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rngam par dag go// khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba la bud myed
17a9(mdo): stong lnga mo rnas la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas lnga'i bu rab tshal sems kyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa
17b1(mdo): ngag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig de nas gnas gtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par tha rang ba brgyad la lam
17b2(mdo): gtar byed pa/ ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jas dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung cheran po dge slong rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ri rtsa ba myed pa dang / mtha' myed pa dang / gnas
17b3(mdo): myed pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / myi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal
17b4(mdo): kyis smras btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni nga 'dzind pa yin/ gnas ni khams gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin// myi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ des lus
17b5(mdo): de ni nye ba myed par shes/ ngar 'dzind pa ni mtha' myed par shes khams gsum ni gnas myed par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni myi 'khrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su myed
17b6(mdo): par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ kho bos de las bas mas nas dge slong rnam par thard pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni cha ba myed pa dang / mtha' myed pa dang / gnas myed pa la bas
17b7(mdo): gtan byed pa dang / myi zhugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa myed pa/
17b8(mdo): shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang / chags pa thams cad kyis gos par myi 'gyur zhing /
17b9(mdo): nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon gsum du byed kyang // sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar myi byed na// de tsam gyis na byang chub
18a1(mdo): sems dpa' chags pa myed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
18a2(mdo): btsun pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma thob/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la/ slob pa dang / myi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
18a3(mdo): rdzu 'phrul che yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dag par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da gang gi tshe/ byang chub
18a4(mdo): sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa myed par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang / tshu rol dang bral zhing / byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang myi spong wa ting nge 'dzin las kyang myi sdang zhing / bya ba thams cad kyang
18a5(mdo): stong par byed da/ de tsam kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyor mong / sa pa myed par gnas pa yin no// byams pa'i bu gang pos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra
18a6(mdo): ba yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing 'du byed thams cad myi rtag go// zhes 'bras bu yod par
18a7(mdo): chos stonang par byed la// skal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang tshig dang / yi ge stong pa rnams kyis rgyas par stond par byed kyang / mthar thug par myi 'gyur du/ de tsam gyis la byang chub sems dpa' chos stonang
18a8(mdo): pa yin no// ram grus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsud pa dam grus gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhi/
18a9(mdo): gyis mnyam par bzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes rab byed la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar tu spyod par byed kyang / bsam gtan la gnas pa la
18b1(mdo): g.yo bar gyi 'gyur na// de tsas gis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no// nye bar 'khor gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji stu ra byang chub sems dpa' 'dul pa 'dzidad pa yid/ 'das dbul gyis
18b2(mdo): smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi mi byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan 'dul ba'i nyid du la shes par byed cing ltung ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyi tshos
18b3(mdo): storang bar byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par yang byed la// byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na/ de tsam gyis ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma 'gags pas smras pa/ 'jam
18b4(mdo): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i myig dang ldan pa yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad
18b5(mdo): kyang mthong bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chosams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed na/ de tsam/ gyis nga byang chub sems dpa' lha'i phyog dang ldan pa yin no//
18b6(mdo): ba gu las smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar rang byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// gang gau tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
18b7(mdo): yul yin par lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yul myed par lta ra/ de tsam gis na byang chub sems dpal dbang pos bsrungs pa yin no// sor mo'i 'phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
18b8(mdo): sems dpa' dbang po rdo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi sa byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang ba'idakyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ mtshams myed pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na/ de tsam gyis ma
18b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rdzo ba yin no// ka ta'i bu chen pos smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
19a1(mdo): ba ka ta'i bu chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa myi zad pa bzhi thob cing / tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gi bar du rgya cher rngam par 'byed cing ston nga la/ ci nas
19a2(mdo): kyang kun ras nyon mongs pa stong pa myi byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba len par myi byed pa de ltar stonang par myi byed pa dang // chos nyid gnas pa las kyang myi g.yol la/ gnas thams cad la yang myi rtend pa de ltar stonang par
19a3(mdo): byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo'i sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no// gsus po che chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin
19a4(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brjod du myed pa'i don gis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid chos so so yang dag par rig pa stond pa
19a5(mdo): dang / mying dang mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so la// nga dag par rig pa stond pa dang / brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid kyis// spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa stond par byed na/ de tsam
19a6(mdo): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin// 'jam dpal
19a7(mdo): kyis smras pa/ btsun pa snga gcan zi gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing sems can yongs su smyi nang par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chasar pa'i 'gro ba gang
19a8(mdo): yin par 'gro bar byed na// de tsam gis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no// kun dga' bos smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal
19a9(mdo): kyim smras pa// btsun pa kun dka' bo gang ga/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed cing / bos pa thams cad kyi dod kyang rtogs par byed la/ ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin
19b1(mdo): bar byed cing ba ji ltar gzung ba gzung sto dang par yang byed na/ de nam kyis ma byang chub sems dpa' mang du 'os pa yin no// de nas lnga'i bur ba rgyal sems kyis nyan thos chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/
19b2(mdo): dang ldan pa dus bye can 'jam das gnon nu byu pas 'di ga pa nang pa rig su mom ga yang ldananas// de dag gis smras pa// kwa'i bu bdag chags na sas de dag sas 'ga'acas yang myeng ngo //
19b3(mdo): su smras pa medang ldan pa dgang ltan bya mag can thos chen po mchog tu byung ba ma yid par gyi 'byung ram gag pa'i bus smras pa pa ng+gA'i bu 'dis dpe kanag rjes las gtan ma ji sumachon
19b4(mdo): ba de bzhin du/ nyam thos gzhan dag las banye nga mkho ba cag kyang mchog yin no// 'di sa ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po las brten na'og gi chu'i phung po'i mchog yin pa de bzhin dunyan thos dang rang
19b5(mdo): rgyas thams cadas ten dag bya chub sems dpa' mchog ni mdo / galnga'i bus smras pa/ btsun pag ri'i bu de ni nyan thos pa don pa'i rgyal myed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin to// sems sa
19b6(mdo): legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i dargyal skyed pa yin no// bya chub sems dang 'di lhag pa'i nga rgyal na yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jas dpag
19b7(mdo): khrigs bsams te de skad ces s+ho/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nya thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas las rten nang rgyal spangs pa yin gyi// byang chub sems dpa' di lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
19b8(mdo): yid la pang rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus spras pa// 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal ca
19b9(mdo): ni bdag la stod par byed cing // gzhan la spong bar byed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur myi 'gyur ram// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag
20a1(mdo): stod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal kis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs
20a2(mdo): du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam na// bdag nyid kyi yon
20a3(mdo): tan gi chos brjod par byed cing 'di la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par myi 'gyur bar byas nas// theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas// lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la
20a4(mdo): stong par byed pa dang // nyan thos kyi theg pa la spod par byed pa yi na no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba bcas par myi 'gyur ram// 'jam dpal gyis
20a5(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu 'ching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin/ bar brjod cing // nor bu rin po che bye du r+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur da na// de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram
20a6(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags
20a7(mdo): pa ma yin pa brjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu shind tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing / khams
20a8(mdo): kyi rgyal po la de lta ba ma yin na de sbed pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
20a9(mdo): chen po la stong par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la spong bar byed pa yang spang ba'i 'os su myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byir te// 'jam dang
20b1(mdo): legs so// legs so// khyod kyis tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la bsngags pas ni theg pa thams cad kyi sngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa/
20b2(mdo): thams cad ni de las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab thal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las
20b3(mdo): brtenang nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do// lbal
20b4(mdo): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brtenang nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gas /
20b5(mdo): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yi/ na du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskye de nas ko cha gyod par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa
20b6(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ni zhog la rnyen/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa// A'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mas cad la rte na to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas
20b7(mdo): kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyirtsa ba las brten du nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad mil brtenang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos
20b8(mdo): thams cad ni za ba myed pa'i gnas la rtenang pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir tha ba myed pa dang / mngon par bsgrubs yod pa dang / nam mkha' la brtend pa yin pa'i
20b9(mdo): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
21a1(mdo): ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas ma/ lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal lo ci 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang //
21a2(mdo): gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin nam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
21a3(mdo): nyoran mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no// zhes stond pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod
21a4(mdo): dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs myed pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rngam grangs kyis ni ma yin mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems cad
21a5(mdo): thams cad gtogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par thugs su chud / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can myed pa'i rnam pa
21a6(mdo): dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas so// lha'i bus smras pas/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig gtogs par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed
21a7(mdo): na ni de stong pa nyid du myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang / tshol ba myed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid
21a8(mdo): rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhem gsungs sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na
21a9(mdo): byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ji zhig la gnas pa yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang
21b1(mdo): gzugs myed pa la gnas pa sa yid/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye ma ched la gnas pa ma yin/ sus dang sems la gnas pa ma yin no// da ci'i phyir zhes/ skra'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur
21b2(mdo): gnas pa de yang stong pas na/ stong pa nyid ni stob pa nyidas kyi gdas pa'i gling ngo // kwa'i sa smras pa// 'jam dpas de bzhi gshegs pa dod dam bkodas kyi dasems gdas par kyis dang ngas
21b3(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa// sgra'i bu de ba'i gshegs pa nyid yi la// stong pa nyid gang yidan pa de ni gnyis su myong ba dang / de ba'i du gzhugs pa ni gnyis su myed pa'i gnam pas gdas par mdzad do// sgra'i bus smras pa/
21b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gnyis su myed pa'i gnas gang yin/ 'jam dpal gi su spras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis su myed pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su myed pa nyi du yid kyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan myed de/ de'i gnas pa'i gnyis
21b5(mdo): su myed pa la gzhan myed pa de nyid kyang gnyis su myed pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis shes bya ba ni gang / gti/ sa su myed pa zhes bya ba ni gang / 'jam dpal gis smras pa/
21b6(mdo): lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de niHnyis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su myed pa'o// zhe ngad pe ni sdang byed par byed pa de ni gnyis so// zhe sdang gi rang ba
21b7(mdo): gnyis su myed pa'o// gti mug dang / gti mug myed par byed pa de ni gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhinani gnyis su myed pa'o// cor mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed par byed pa de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs
21b8(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis su myed pa'o// bdag dang bdag myed par byed pa de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su myed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin ni gang yin/ 'jam
21b9(mdo): dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag myed pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bzod ma nas dper ba nyid dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa/
22a1(mdo): nyid dang / bzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba myed pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes/
22a2(mdo): bya'o// de ni bzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa cad ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing / tshad myed pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni
22a3(mdo): spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang
22a4(mdo): bzhin myi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin myi shes pa dag go// lha'i bus spras pa la 'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/
22a5(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin no/ sa pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpas dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa// spru
22a6(mdo): bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang du ga par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang myi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas byin pa las dad par byed/
22a7(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang myi ldan zhes bya ba ni gang mngon gsum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gi dring myi 'jog cing gzhan gi dad pas yang dang yang du myi
22a8(mdo): zab rnaM kyi pa kyi da ma da de// 'phyi phyir zhing/ zod sa das dag pa'i phyir ro// kwa'i bus smras pa/ 'das dngas ge slong gang dge 'dung dang sgrad cig kyi gnas pa
22a9(mdo): skad bya/ 'jam dpal gis spras pa la lnga'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang ldan gcig myi gnas pa de ni/ des na 'jig rten gi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas
22b1(mdo): pa yin pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa byas dang zhan gcis kyi gnas pas// rlon kyar deni da gi snyi gnas su 'gyu sa yi 'gyur ro// khwa'i nas smram pa/ 'a sa dpa rgyu sa/
22b2(mdo): dpa' 'dus pa byas dang A gcig gnas par gyu nyes pa de 'gyur/ sa rungs gis smras pa/ bu 'dus sa byas yobanas sems marnams spyo pa kyi chos su 'gyu sa
22b3(mdo): der 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas ni so so'i skye bo sa la gnas pa 'jig rte rang gi sbyir gnas su 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas
22b4(mdo): la yang gyi gnas/ 'dus ma byas la yang myi gasmaH de'i phyir de ni sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir oMd/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyed pa dang / dusas rgyas pa kyi gnapa'i
