22b5(mdo): snro pa ma la dang / lu kyi shes kyang rton pa pa te/ de cu kya kyi khyod pas des cu gyigadrug 'dus ma byas shes bsdogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su kyi ltung ba'i sbyor ro// lha'i bu 'di sa ste/ dper na mtshar/
22b6(mdo): po me chen pos steng gi bar sdang la mnga' phangs par gyur nga la denas mngal da dam mkhalas myi gnas par 'dug cing sa la rgyasung na/ lha'i bu de sa dka' ba chung bad yod dam// lnga'i
22b7(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ spu'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang myi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas/
22b8(mdo): su yang kyi srung zhing // 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongs su sbyid par byed pa de ni ches dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jas dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te
22b9(mdo): 'dus ma byas sam// kang las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jam dpol gyis spras pa// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar
23a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// ra ba'i phyir zhe sa/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las mnyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la// 'dus ma byas las ni nyor mongs pa myed pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i rdu
23a2(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa myed pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la// byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum
23a3(mdo): du nyon mongs pas myi byed na/ de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
23a4(mdo): dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / thabs kyis shes pas 'dus ma byas su myi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i
23a5(mdo): bu gzhan sdug gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas// 'dus byas spong ba myi byed cing // sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas// 'dus ma byas su myi ltung ba de lta na// byang chub sems dpa'
23a6(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsag pa'i phyir 'du byas la sbyor bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye
23a7(mdo): bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas su myi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ bsam gtan
23a8(mdo): rnams bskyed par byed ning / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
23a9(mdo): kyi sems la gnas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can rnas yongasas smyin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu
23b1(mdo): gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams gtogs par byed cing thabs la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs
23b2(mdo): pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas te/ chos stond par byed cing snying rje chen po la gnas te/ zang zing gi sbyi dang par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpal
23b3(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su sbyang ba'i las byed cing // mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te 'khor ba
23b4(mdo): yongs su sbyong ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems bra' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba myed pas skye bar byed cing pho ba myed
23b5(mdo): pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snang bar byed cing // phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin pa da nga/ thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing zhi ba dang / nye bar
23b6(mdo): zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par myi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis myi gos pa dang / bslob pa
23b7(mdo): dang myi bslob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bse u cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar myi byed pa dang / bdud kyi sdug sa rgya'o
23b8(mdo): par byed cing // chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar myi byed pa dang / shes par 'dug par byed cing / thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rnam pa stod par byed cing // 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs
23b9(mdo): su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa myed pa yin no//
24a1(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstand pa 'di bshad pa na// lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni lend pa
24a2(mdo): myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa
24a3(mdo): thogs pa myed pa skyes so// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po de dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
24a4(mdo): lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin//
24a5(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sem/ sa dpa' 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang chos stond par byed la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du myi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang
24a6(mdo): ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ zhe sdang spang ba mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ gti mug spong ba mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / nyon mongs
24a7(mdo): pa spong ba'i phyir yang chos stond par byed lanyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du yang myi byed pa de tsam gis na// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub
24a8(mdo): dpa' sems can rnams la chos ston par yang byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / sems cadan rnams la mtshan mar myed pa stonang par byed la/ mtshan ma myed pa mngon du yang myi byed pa dang
24a9(mdo): sems can rnams la smond pa myed pa stond par yang byed la/ smond pa myed pa mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba
24b1(mdo): myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang myi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos stond par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon du yang myi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa
24b2(mdo): yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su myi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol
24b3(mdo): tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang // gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan
24b4(mdo): gi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / bems po dang / dalug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgrub pa dar byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas
24b5(mdo): pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las pas mas te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su myi
24b6(mdo): gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su myi gtong ba dang / chos yongs su myi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su myi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba ste/
24b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su myi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang ba sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i/
24b8(mdo): tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ting nge 'dzind las yang dag par 'dal bas shes rab dang // shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas/ rnam par grol
24b9(mdo): ba'i ye shes sgrub par byed do// lnga'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba pe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa bsgrub par byed par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu byang chub
25a1(mdo): sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las/ log par zhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas/ de ni theg pa chen po la
25a2(mdo): legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi rad pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rtul bar myi byed
25a3(mdo): cing / ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar myi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
25a4(mdo): sems dpa' ni rmyi lam na lngas gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par myi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam pa
25a5(mdo): gzhag pa yin pas/ de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa// sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste// rdza dang shing dang / mig pa dang / lam dang / myig yor dang /
25a6(mdo): yug ltar lkug pa dang / 'dra bar rang bzhin gis nus pa myed pa yin pas// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang lug ltar skrag pa
25a7(mdo): lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa yin te// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe
25a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang myi spyod la// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gi las kyi rgyu nang yang myi gcod cing / lam gi bya ba yang bsgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngar
25a9(mdo): par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad bcal ma'i myi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi
25b1(mdo): lam spong bar myi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta ma/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ma yang rab tu
25b2(mdo): shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam kyis nges par 'byung bar yang myi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la// rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang kyi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
25b3(mdo): lam yang thob par byed la/ lam nges kyang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par nges par 'byung ba gyi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems
25b4(mdo): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngod par 'du byed pa dang marjod bar 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu ror du gyi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis kyi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba
25b5(mdo): thams cad byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba la/ nga dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de lta ra/ byang chub sems dpa
25b6(mdo): lab la gnas tha yid do// lha'i bu ka'ang yang gang ki tshe byang chu ba sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongs su btsal ras kyang nges par 'byung bar byed
25b7(mdo): pa de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa lnga yi yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'jal dpal gyis smras pa
25b8(mdo): lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste// byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//
25b9(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rtend thams cad dang myi mthun pa yin no// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rtenang gi
26a1(mdo): chos rnaMs kyis phyi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mong ba myed pa stond par byed kyang / nyon mongs pa myed pa stong pa nyid du myi ltung ba dang / rgan pa dang / 'chi ba ston da pa byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung
26a2(mdo): ba myed par shes shing / skyon myed par mngon du myi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la yos su spyod par shes kyang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched don du myi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang /
26a3(mdo): khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos stond kyang yongs su shes pa de dag yongasu shes pa myi byed pa dang / bas gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon
26a4(mdo): par sgrub par byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar brjod par byed kyang / nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar myi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lus nye bar stond par byed kyang / bdud kyi las rnams
26a5(mdo): kyis mye 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar myi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul rjes su myi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par myi byed pa dang / sems can gi
26a6(mdo): khams gi yul nye bar le nang par byed pas ya/ de'i phyir sems cad chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni 'jig rtend thams cad dang myi mthun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub
26a7(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu bsam pa yongs su dag cing dang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis/ lhag pa'i bsam pa lnga spyod pa dang / rab tu skyo
26a8(mdo): ba myed pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems myi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la
26a9(mdo): spyod pa dang / smras pa myed pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / sus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa
26b1(mdo): myed pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang gsems cad la bdag myed pa nyid kyis byams pa spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i
26b2(mdo): phyir dka' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gtang snyoms la spyod pa dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir myi rtog pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir
26b3(mdo): sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phyirang ci log rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir bdag myed pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang // 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang /
26b4(mdo): phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'a/ rang ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gis 'gag pa la'i
26b5(mdo): phyir 'gog pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon/ par zhenang pa myed pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten du cing
26b6(mdo): 'brelang bar 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang / brjod du myed pa'i phyir don so sor yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa'i
26b7(mdo): so sor yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / mying dang gzugs 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la
26b8(mdo): spyod pa dang / tshig 'bya byastsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang ga las kyi rnam par smyid pa ston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i
26b9(mdo): don gi mdo'i sde la te rnyed pa la/ spyod pa dang / gang zag yongs su sbyin par bya ba nyid chos la rtodad pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i myig sa spyod pa dpa' tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha
27a1(mdo): rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / seMs
27a2(mdo): la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa la spyod pa dang / myi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan po la spyod pa dang / myi spong pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyed du myed pa'i phyir gnas myed pa la spyod pa dang
27a3(mdo): ba dad pa myed pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams cad du rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / mye dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir
27a4(mdo): sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmyi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smyig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag myi sring ba'i mtshan nyid kyis
27a5(mdo): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin myed pa'i mtshan nyi/ da kyis mtshan ma myed pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhi/ na myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis spron pa myed pa la spyod pa dang /
27a6(mdo): 'dus byas rang bzhin myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud char bcad pa la spyodapa
27a7(mdo): pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par sgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi gcod pa la spyod pa dang / sna'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin ro//
27a8(mdo): bam po gsum pa'o// / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las
27a9(mdo): yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang /
27b1(mdo): gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
27b2(mdo): ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / stond pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin
27b3(mdo): par myi smra'o// lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa
27b4(mdo): pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par myi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad
27b5(mdo): sma/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom
27b6(mdo): pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / stond pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod
27b7(mdo): chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang // gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
27b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de chags par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gi dad pas myi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin
27b9(mdo): pa drug gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing / 'dzind par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnam par tha rad par byed pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags
28a1(mdo): pa myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par myi ltung ba de tsam gis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltarar byang chub seMs/
28a2(mdo): dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzind par byed pa dang / kun 'dzind par byed pa dang / chos
28a3(mdo): kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas myed pa dang // chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa la myi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nga rgyal gi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten
28a4(mdo): rgyang phar pa'i gtam smra ba yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yi na gi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi chos
28a5(mdo): ma yin pa myi smra ba/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la rton/ pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la myi gnas pa dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzung
28a6(mdo): kyi sgo chags pa myed pa dang ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par gnas pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su
28a7(mdo): 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par
28a8(mdo): 'dres pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brkyang la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam yan lag brkyang ba rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung bar myi byed pa dang
28a9(mdo): myi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun gsum tshogs pa dag la dgod par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bsam
28b1(mdo): gtar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa myi spong ba de lta na/ sna'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs
28b2(mdo): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su red pa rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la/ 'khor
28b3(mdo): ba myi gcod pa dang / ngan song thams cad gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du bya ba'i lam la dgod par byed pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / lha dang
28b4(mdo): myi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa stond par byed pa dang / rlom sem sa su myi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag
28b5(mdo): par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos lam la gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du phyon/ sa par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gi spyirang gnas su gyurang pa dang /
28b6(mdo): 'dus byas la sdang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / phyir ldog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dud la yang dag par gzhos ba de lta ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin no//
28b7(mdo): lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba myed pa dang
28b8(mdo): 'gro ba myed par shes nas/ sems can yongs su smyinang par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'ong ba dang // sems can rnams
28b9(mdo): yongs su smind par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba stond par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed par mthong ba dang / 'od yang nyon mongs pa myed pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'dra
29a1(mdo): ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid myi spong ba dang / bdud gi dbang gis myi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi lam la nye bar gton pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can sprul ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang /
29a2(mdo): byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra zhing myi phyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin
29a3(mdo): ci log rnams dang bsgrib pa rnams su yang myi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur/
29a4(mdo): cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par myi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'pho ba myed pa mkhas pa dang / rga ni myed pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas pa dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung
29a5(mdo): bstand pa thob pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / rnam pa mye/ da pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir myi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i
29a6(mdo): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa myed cing 'dod chags 'dul ba'i
29a7(mdo): phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba myed cing zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa myed cing gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang
29a8(mdo): chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtsom 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad
29a9(mdo): la dga' ba myed pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / pad ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang / mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas
29b1(mdo): pa dang / nye bar lend pa thams cad la bdag gi myed cing yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzind pa dang / rang gi sems rgyud dag la zag pa myed pa'i
29b2(mdo): sems dang ldan pa yin/ gzhan gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa myed pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshu rol dang pha rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu
29b3(mdo): sor ba dang / tshu rol gi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gis sems can gzhan pa da par byed pa de ltar/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ma
29b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'ja mu dpal gis smras bu/ lha'i bu gzha gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems cad kyi ca la ma thos tham tsham sgrogs par byed cing / yul rnams la spyo
29b5(mdo): bar myi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba/ byed pa dang / 'gog pa skyed pa'i chos sprogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / bdag myed pa dang / sems cad myed pa dang
29b6(mdo): rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba myed pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnam sa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas ye shes dang / ye she
29b7(mdo): chen po la chos thams cad rgyas nye bar 'gro ba chom shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gi dring myi 'jog pa dang / thos pa kyu rlom sems su myi byed pa dang / sgrogs pa thams cad kyi
29b8(mdo): sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' gyi chang pa yongs su shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa myi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang tshig dang / yig 'bru myi zad pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi mis dang / spyod pa dang shes
29b9(mdo): pa stond par byed pa dang / so so'i ci rigs par chos stonang par byed pa dang // zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / sngon gi smon lam gis spyod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos
30a1(mdo): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag
30a2(mdo): las pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / bdag myed pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang
30a3(mdo): chub 'dren par byed pa rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang // sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad myed pa bzhi'i phyogs
30a4(mdo): dang / mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa byed pa drang / de rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed cing // gzhan ki dring myi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag/
30a5(mdo): las sems skyo bar byed pa dang gnyiche ba'i gas pa 'dul banyel mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po ma legs pa rab tu gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na/ lha'i
30a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin ro// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems das
30a7(mdo): chos thams cad bzod pa nas dber ba nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag myed pa nyid du gtogs par byed pa dang / mying mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang /
30a8(mdo): mchog dang bar ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / skad gcig cig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs stong
30a9(mdo): par byed pa dang / sems cad gi dbang po dang mos pas chos stonang par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos stonang par byed pa de lta ra/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/
30b1(mdo): 'das dpal ji ltar da byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sprus pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sa byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam cu 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brjed pa
30b2(mdo): dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brtsor 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang
30b3(mdo): de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smod lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems cad myed pa dang / sems
30b4(mdo): can yongs su tha rad par byed pa dang / sems can gi gnas dang / 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad la kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na yang
30b5(mdo): yin la// de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'di na yang yin la/ 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyi ga las dag pa dang / mun pa dang / bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa myed pa dang / mun
30b6(mdo): pa'i ying tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa
30b7(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang /
30b8(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi khur dang srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / zhur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i/
30b9(mdo): 'dod chags bas sad pa dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam
31a1(mdo): ba ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho la sgrol ba dang // chu lon dang / zam pa legs par byas pa dang / myi gnas pas legs par byas pa dang / byi gnas pas legs par gnas pa dang / rtag
31a2(mdo): tu sgom pa la yid kyis brtson pa dang / sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar klog par byed pa
31a3(mdo): dang / srid pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
31a4(mdo): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams myed pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang /
31a5(mdo): mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon pa rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dngalta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa/ rnams dang / chod pa rnams dang kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang
31a6(mdo): mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sde nga dang / gti mug dang mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
31a7(mdo): gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / bslob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang
31a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrug par myi byed pa/
31a9(mdo): dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyend la rag las pa dang / yod pa yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas
31b1(mdo): bzang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na// spu'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam rapas
31b2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stonang pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad
31b3(mdo): myi g.yos pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa yongs su 'dzidad par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams su stonang pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / stond par gcig tu 'gyur ba/
31b4(mdo): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dpa' gling dang dpung ka nyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba drang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / seMs
31b5(mdo): can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod kyis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smras pa dang / khams gsum pas phyag byas pa
31b6(mdo): dpa/ sems can nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing / khengs pa myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa de da / brdeg pa dang / dgong ba dang / bshud ba dang / khro ba dang /
31b7(mdo): spyo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par myi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gi rang bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang /
31b8(mdo): 'jig rten la stonang par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' stonang pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin/
31b9(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang stonang par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang mya
32a1(mdo): 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal/
32a2(mdo): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang // bsam gtan dang / ting nge
32a3(mdo): 'dzinang dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang /
32a4(mdo): de sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras po'i sems myed par 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yi na no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
32a5(mdo): sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smra sa pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnam sa la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags pa lta ba byed pa dang / nyan thos dang
32a6(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang ba byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa las cad dang / 'du byed pas cad la spyod du yang 'du she la/ nyor mongs padzas dang 'du byed rjes spong bar yang myi byed pa dang sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyur myi
32a7(mdo): gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par bskyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyir par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i//
32a8(mdo): 'dab rdzab las 'byirang bar byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar bsgrub par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i zhabs thams cad dang khor
32a9(mdo): sur 'byir bar byed pa de lta ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// sgo'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpal gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
32b1(mdo): smras pa/ spu'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang myi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa re shes par myi byed/ rnam par shes par myi byed/ kun tu
32b2(mdo): shes par myi byed/ len par myi byed/ spong bar myi byed/ 'byung bar myi byed/ 'jig par myi byed/ g.yo bar myi byed/ rlom sems su myi byed/ bskyed par myi byed cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par
32b3(mdo): zhugs pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
32b4(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang myi g.yo ba de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams
32b5(mdo): dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phra// la zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la dgod par byed pa dang / don mthun par// byed pa dang / myi dge ba thams cad la myi bsngags pa brjod par byed
32b6(mdo): cing 'dun pa zlog pa dang / phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'kho/ rab la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyi sa sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du blta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las/
32b7(mdo): myi g.yo zhing gnas par yang myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin mo// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
32b8(mdo): chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
32b9(mdo): nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las zla ba dang nye bar bya ba'i phyir chos stond par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu myed pa me gsum gis 'bru par 'gyur ba rnams nye bar zhi bar
33a1(mdo): byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang spyod par byed la/ gtan tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang myi byed/
33a2(mdo): pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa rjes su snying brtse ba dang
33a3(mdo): ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags drug khri ni
33a4(mdo): le nad pa myed pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da to// /
33a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis myi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzo da ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur pa to// srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bu gyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag
33a6(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// steng gi bar snang la sa kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phag
33a7(mdo): po// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang zhes rab kyi nges par 'byung ba yin/
33a8(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/ lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gang tshe sems ni chags myed pa// bla myed byang chub sems yin te/ sems kyi rang bzhin mngon gsum pa/
33a9(mdo): de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni// byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhing // byang chub sems la rab rtas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag myed cing /
33b1(mdo): myi bden ya ma cha gsog dru// gang tshe shes pas shes byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni spyir byed cing // bsam pa zag pas sdud byed pa// de ni thabs//
33b2(mdo): kyi mtshan nyid do// gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan tu mthong bar myi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur da pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang na phyi rol dag/ thabs cad yongs
33b3(mdo): su gtong byed cing // sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems myi byed la// lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur dpa// de ni shes rab
33b4(mdo): mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur da cing // gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la// sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngo byed la// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad rab
33b5(mdo): stong zhing // bdag myed bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang / sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyinang// lus kyi sbyor bar myi byed cing // ngag dang sems kyis ma
33b6(mdo): yin la// chos rnams kun la dben 'gyur la// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi ranang // sems can kun gyi khro ba dang // gsod dang 'chi ba bzod byed cing // sems can de dag myi spong ba
33b7(mdo): de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyi dang // sems can yongs su smyir bya phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs pa// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyi nang // tshul rol ma yin pha rol
33b8(mdo): byin// mthun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing // spros pa'i lta ba rgyud bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyi nang rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas// de ni gtang snyoms myi byed cing // sems ca
33b9(mdo): stong nyid sbyor byed pa// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzungs myed ram mkha' 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing // de tshe gzugs la zher myed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do//
34a1(mdo): sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'drer kun mchod du 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul myed rdul bral zhing //
34a2(mdo): mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos 'ga' 'dzin par myi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi rang // chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing // 'jig rten kun gyis
34a3(mdo): dben gyur ba// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing // de bzhin nyid las myi g.yo ba// de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gi chos
34a4(mdo): nyid ci 'dra ba// sems can de 'drur shes byed pa// de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi rang // chos kun 'chi 'pho yod myin zhing // skye ba myed par shes myed la
34a5(mdo): myi 'gro rgyug par myi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi nang// sems can yongs su smyid bya ba'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod pa nga gzugs rnams su// bsams bzhin du ni skye byed pa/
34a6(mdo): de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing // nyon mongs myed la rab gnas la// bsam gtan rna ma thar sten byed pa// de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin// 'gror/
34a7(mdo): dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song nas bsam gtan ston byed cing // myi zad zhum pa yod myin pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las// skrag cing 'du
34a8(mdo): 'ji snyed myed la/ bdag nyid dul zhing zhi gyu pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi nang // 'gro ba dag ni 'dus chen po// tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa// kumar sdang ba de dag dang // 'bas kyis smras pa/
34a9(mdo): myed pa yin// gtan pa chags myed spyod byed cing // yi ge dor gnyer myi byed la// brjod myed nges don don gnyer ba// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi nga // mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// sdang zhing
34b1(mdo): chos rnams stonang byed pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyi dang // mngon shes shes la mkhas gyurd cing // zhi zhing dul la zag pa myed// bdag myed gzhag pa
34b2(mdo): yod myin pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyind// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams dbye bar 'gro byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma
34b3(mdo): 'drar shes shing / nyon mongs dngos myed shes bya nas// de dag bdud kun zhi 'gyur ba// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi nang // bdud rnams thams cad ston byed cing // bstan nas rgyal bar byed 'gyur la// de
34b4(mdo): las sems can mthar byed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// stong nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang // smond pa myed pa yod myin pa'i// rnam thar sgo la stonang byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// chags
34b5(mdo): myed sdang ba yod myin zhing // rmongs myed pa'i spyod yul dang // blang myed dor ba yod myin pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing // stong nyid bar du sten 'gyur la
34b6(mdo): kun kyi pha rol son 'gyur ba// mnyam byed 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin// zag myed brtul ba'i ma yin pa// de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni/ sems can kun
34b7(mdo): kyi grogs su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis myi ngoms pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'i// yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni// shes ldan byang chub sems dpal
34b8(mdo): ste'/ des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung // thabs dang myi ldan shes rab kyis// ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba myed// shes rab myed pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhas pa rab tu zhi myi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs zhes
34b9(mdo): pa / de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyurd cing // gnyi ga zung du 'jug 'gyur na// des ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag dgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun kyis rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol
35a1(mdo): phyi rang 'gyur te// de ni chos rnams chos nyid do// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// chos dbyings dbyer myed dga' byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub tha myed pa'i// rdul myed byang chub
35a2(mdo): rtogs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurard pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
35a3(mdo): bu byang chub kyi yul ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bus
35a4(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha' gang yin// lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi gnas gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
35a5(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub kyi sgo na kun nas sgo yin no/
35a6(mdo): no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bcom pa gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi brtsom pa ni sems can thams cad la bdag myed pa'o//
35a7(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mi dang mnyam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni chos thams cad myi skye ba dang mnyam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bgrod pa
35a8(mdo): gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi dgrod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin no// byang chub kyi dgrod pa ni 'gro ba myed par 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba myed par 'gro ba yin no//
35a9(mdo): lnga'i bus spras pa// / 'jam dpal byang chub gang gi sgyu mthun pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni snying rje cher po'i rgya ma thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal snying rje chen po ga
35b1(mdo): gi rgya mthun pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ wa'i bu snying rje chen po ji sems can thams cad rab tu tha rang bar bya ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin no// lha'i lus smras pa/ 'jas dpal byang chub gsas bcal bar bya/
35b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs par btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ka las btsal bar bya// 'jam
35b3(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas
35b4(mdo): sam// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni// 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang ldan gcig gnas par 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu
35b5(mdo): 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa myed pa ste/ nyon mongs// pa tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no// lha'i// bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lam gyis lam ki bya ba byas/
35b6(mdo): pa yin// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams myi rnyed cing // 'khor ba yang myi rnyed// mya las 'das pa yang myi rnyed pa de lta na/ lam gis lam gyi bya ba
35b7(mdo): byas pa yin mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ji lta ba'i rngam pa drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang / phyin ci log
35b8(mdo): bzhi dang / sgrib pa lnga dang / myi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems
35b9(mdo): can la sbyor ba yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos rnams pa rtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar myi bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'/
36a1(mdo): ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/ de tshol bar byed pa na/ sems can yang myi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa
36a2(mdo): rnams kyang myi rnyed do// ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba la skyo bar myi 'gyur te// lha'i bu rnam grangs des na nyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba
36a3(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo/
36a4(mdo): gsum po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin nam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar myi nus la ma tshun ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang btsal bar myi nus so//
36a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam pa/ ra shes pa 'jug par myi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar myi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji lta mngon par rtogs
36a6(mdo): par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log par lta ba yang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no//
36a7(mdo): yang dag pa'i rtogs pa gang dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i rtog pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gang dang mnyam pa'i log pa'i ngag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa
36a8(mdo): log pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang // yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtsol ba de dang mnyam pa dang
36a9(mdo): yang dag pa'i dran pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i dran pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin
36b1(mdo): ba de ri lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no// lha'i bus spras pa// 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kwa'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid nga/
36b2(mdo): dben pa nyid dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ni yod// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam mkha' dang nam mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod// /
36b3(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba chung zad kyang myed ngo do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la yang tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang myed do// lha'i bus smras pa
36b4(mdo): 'jam dpal ba dang du bya ba gang las rab tu phye ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshar ma dang dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa las rab tu phye ba yin/
36b5(mdo): mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa gang yi// na ba de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de la/ ni tha dad du bya ba myed do// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper ma
36b6(mdo): rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i tshu la ni tha dad du bya ba yod kyi// rgyamatsho chen por zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba myed pa de bzhin du lho'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongs su ma shes pa la ni chos la tha dad bya ba
36b7(mdo): yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa la ni chos thams cad du bya ba myed do// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos
36b8(mdo): kyi dbyings ni yongs su shes par myi rus so// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin la// chos kyi dbyings kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su myi shes pa'i phyir ro//
36b9(mdo): chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su myed par shes pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/ sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyang ba nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir de ni yongs su
37a1(mdo): shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' gzugs myed pa'i snang ba la
37a2(mdo): gzugs thams cad snang yang / gzugs de dag ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas rang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas/ chos thams cad mthong yang / chos
37a3(mdo): de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro smos pas go ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'gro smos pas go/
37a4(mdo): ba'i rang gi lta bas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos stond par byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros pas go ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis
37a5(mdo): smras pa// lha'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du myi byed la/ bdag myed pa yang gzhan du myi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi bkri ba yin// 'jam
37a6(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'ga' yang khrid par myi byed/ myi khrid par myi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dang/
37a7(mdo): gnas lhur len pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma myed pa'i gnas la g.yo bar myi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems
37a8(mdo): dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang / ma nges pa nyid dang log pa nyid du nyes pa'i tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bus smras pa/
37a9(mdo): 'jam dpal ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o// ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o// log pa nyid du nges pa
37b1(mdo): ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba la'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' myi khom pa thob cing / khom pa ma thob pa'i rngam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
37b2(mdo): lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' myi khom pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par byed cing / sems can yongs su smyid par bya ba'i phyir//
37b3(mdo): myi khom pa thob pa de dag kyang yal bar 'jog par byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni khom pa thob po yin pas/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i myi snang ngo // lha'i
37b4(mdo): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod myi khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni khom pa thob pa yang ma yin/ myi khom pa thob pa yang yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
37b5(mdo): dpal ci'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni thob pa yang ma yin// yangs par thob pa yang ma yin/ khom pa yang ma yin/ myi khom pa yang ma yin la/ khom pa dang /
37b6(mdo): myi khom pa la chags par yang myi byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i/
37b7(mdo): bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phung po yongs su shes pa yang myed/ nyon mongs pa selang ba yang myed/ bdud las yang dag par 'das pa yang med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
37b8(mdo): nye bar sbyar bas gzha mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so// 'jam dpal gyis spras pal/ lha'i bu 'di ltar 'di la mu stegs thams cad kyi spyod pa myed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
37b9(mdo): dpal chos kyi tog btsugs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lnga'i bu snang ba rtsed pa dang / mur pa myed pa'i phyir ro// lnga'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsko rang to/
38a1(mdo): lajam dpal gyis spras pa// lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi sdang ba ji snyed cig byas// 'jam/
38a2(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag la snang ba yang myed la/ mun pa yang myed pa de dag chos kyi sdang ba byas so// lha'i zlas smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems cad gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma/ mom
38a3(mdo): par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'chi bas rnam
38a4(mdo): par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba rnams so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jamam dpal 'chi bas rnam par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba de dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags dang zhe
38a5(mdo): sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas tha/ rad pa tshol bar myi byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sda/ nga dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam
38a6(mdo): par grol ba mnyam par gyurd pa dag ste// de dag gis ni 'chi ba ma dmyigs pas rnam par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/
38a7(mdo): srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces// bdag cag kyis kyang ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
38a8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag bsnyes pa de bzhin du thob par gyur pa gcig ces kyang smras so// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dku las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma
38a9(mdo): dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyang khri yang len pa myed par zag
38b1(mdo): pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
38b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bdun khri nyis stong gyis ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang /
38b3(mdo): rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes pa nas// ched du brjod pa 'od ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun nas yongs grol te/ dmyigs byed chos ni legs par bshad/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las
38b4(mdo): shin tu legs par bshad pa byas// de nas byang chub sems dang 'u de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang
38b5(mdo): myi ma yin pa de dag kyis lha dang myi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang phab/ rin po che'i char dag kyang phab/ gos kyi char dag kyang phab/ gdug spos
38b6(mdo): kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab po// lha rnams kyi sa steng gi bar snang las lha'i sol snyan brgyad stong dag kyang rab tu bsil to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal
38b7(mdo): blo klas la rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag kyis bcom ldan 'das dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / thal mo sbyar
38b8(mdo): te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dang par myi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rim grangs 'di spong bar 'gyid pa de dag la ni
38b9(mdo): rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par myi bgyid pa de dag la mi bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// de dag mi 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa/
39a1(mdo): yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir dgrong par myi mchi ba de dag la ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so//
39a2(mdo): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa yang ma mchis lags so// mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang thos
39a3(mdo): nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang // len par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzi nad par bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'drir bar bgyid pa dang / snod ba 'tshal par bgyis nas
39a4(mdo): gzhan dag la yang stond par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i rang yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su stond par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan
39a5(mdo): tan gis bsgrub tu gsold pa dang / nyams par myi bgyid pa de/ dag ni sems can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba 'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur
39a6(mdo): bgyid pa dang / gting rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyu bkum pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshe sa gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyer rjes la shin tu gus
39a7(mdo): pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa bzo zhing / gyis pa tshol ba lakra shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa
39a8(mdo): lags te/ skyes bu rab pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang ma mchis lags so// de dag sa ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang ma mchis lags so// de dag ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang /
39a9(mdo): ldan pa lags so// zhes kyang col to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal da pa/ byams pa/
39b1(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags
39b2(mdo): 'bum phrag brgyad ni lend pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong mang
39b3(mdo): dge skyen dadage bsnyen sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di ni gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
39b4(mdo): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa nyi stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis ni gzungs dri ma myed pa so sor thob par
39b5(mdo): gyur da to// de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag bya/ nga chub sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam po'i chos yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur zhing // mdo sde zab mo 'di lta
39b6(mdo): bu dag nod pa dang / stond pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog par ya byed pa dang / de dag ni byams pa khyod kyis byang chub tu lung stond par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
39b7(mdo): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / stond pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par
39b8(mdo): bgyi ba'i slad du// glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang / tha ma lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang / rna lam du grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams ci tsam bskyed par 'gyur lags// de skad ces gsol pa
39b9(mdo): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhir gshegs pa la ngon 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ri legs so// legs so// byams
40a1(mdo): pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nan gyis dper ma/ lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las lnga 'am/ myi gang zhig gis
40a2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang bcas pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig la bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa
40a3(mdo): de gyur pa de bas ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa/ 'di yi ger bris te 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin ni du bsgrub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la stond par byed pa de ches bsod nams
40a4(mdo): mang du bskyed par 'gyur te// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring po mya thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas
40a5(mdo): spong bar myi byed cing / mos par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam// du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir myi ldo// ga pa nyid du lung stond to// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis
40a6(mdo): mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di ni mying tsam du thob pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par lung stond par byed na/ de gang dag mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston
40a7(mdo): par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos gang dag mdo ste 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes
40a8(mdo): dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dri ba dang / phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang myi bral bar 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i
40a9(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la stonang par mdzad cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonang par yang
40b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyi/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis
40b2(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cing / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci zhes bgyi// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ 'di mying ji
40b3(mdo): skad bstanang par bgyi lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang // 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos
40b4(mdo): thams cad rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsta dang pa zhes bya ba yang zung zhig pa de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying thos nas thal mo sbyar nga te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
40b5(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstand pa mang du thos pa lags na/ ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye
40b6(mdo): ste rgya cher bstand pa dang / de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung ba la gas so// bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas
40b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /
40b8(mdo): sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du theg pa tha dad bas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag bde 'gro mchis par bgyi bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis//
40b9(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis rlab du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gis// gsol ba gtab par thugs su chud nas/ phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so//
41a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur rngam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i yod la/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i sa gzhi chen po rngam pa drug du rab tu g.yos par gyur da cing /
41a2(mdo): wA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / dka' ba dang /
41a3(mdo): yid bde ba skyes nas/ ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par myi 'gyur bar byin gyis rlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams
41a4(mdo): dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa rag byas shing / steng gi bar snang las mye tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ lha'i sil snyun dang / klu dbyangs dag kyang rab tu bsil cing blangs so//
41a5(mdo): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/ de la 'di skad ces/ nga dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlabs so zhes go bar yang
41a6(mdo): mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/
41a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan
41a8(mdo): ba kun dga' bo dang thams cad dang ldan po'i 'khor de yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stonang to// 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
41a9(mdo): mdo/ rdzogs sgo// rgya gar ga mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar nge ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyur da cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// /
41b1(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya shri ba su ba ri prid tshA nA ma ma ta ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
41b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ma/ bcom ldan 'das pa ra na se na// drang srong sba ba ri dgas kyi chags na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
41b3(mdo): du bzhugs te/ de nas tshong dpon gi bu dpal byig ces bya ba/ ba ra na se'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
41b4(mdo): lan gsum skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyor/ ras gcig du 'dug nas// tshong dpor gi bu dpal dbyig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logs su phal mo sbyar ba btung te/
41b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/ 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig 'das shing gshegs lags// bcom
41b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// tshong dpon gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu myed grwa ngas myed pa 'das shing gshegs te/ dper na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
41b7(mdo): snyeng ngo // gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
41b8(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed gcig da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho zhing bshes lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tshong dpon gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
41b9(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu myed grangs myed pa skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed do// tshong dpon gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
42a1(mdo): dpag tu myed grangs myed pa da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ dper na gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gyis
42a2(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar myi brgya 'am/ myi stong 'am/ myi 'bum gyis sngon 'bad de bstsal pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa ma// bcom ldan 'das bdag
42a3(mdo): gis kyang 'bad de btsal na/ ci'i slad du de myi thob// myi rtogs kyis de'i slad du thugs rtse ba dgongs te/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub
42a4(mdo): bar bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la de ltar legs par bstanang du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to//
42a5(mdo): tshong dpon gi bu legs so// legs so// khyod kyi rtog pa mdze/ sa so spobs pa dge'o// tshong dpon gyi bu de'i phyir legs par/ rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang // las dang po pa'i byang chub
42a6(mdo): sems dpa' ji ltar bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to// tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig
42a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshong dpon gyi bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa ni nyid gcig bzhin du snying zag pa nus pa'i khong das
42a8(mdo): yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas/ dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang ri mo bya ba myi btang bar bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems da
42a9(mdo): snying zag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas// dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la bskyabs su 'gro ba'i yi dam myi gtang bar bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang
42b1(mdo): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum gyi myi stongs par dus
42b2(mdo): gsum du gsol ba btab pa myi btang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum skal pa du mar gnas par dus gsum du gsol ba btab par myi btang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gi khas
42b3(mdo): thams cad du sems can thams cad la bskal pa du mar chos bstand par dus gsum du gsol bar btab pa myi btang bar bya'o// 'jig rtenang gi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la ci nus pa dang ni lcogs
42b4(mdo): pa dang / ji ltar gsol ba gdab pa de bzhin du theg pa gsum dal byang chub tu sems bskyed par dus gsum du gsol ba btang ba myi btang bar bya'o// 'jig rtenang gi khams thams cad kyi
42b5(mdo): khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad sprul ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur zhing rings par yongs su rdzogs/ par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba btab pa myi btang
42b6(mdo): bar bya'o// 'jig rtenang gi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis// byang chub gsum thob la ra 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba btab pa myi btang bar
42b7(mdo): bya'o// 'jig rtenang gi khams thams cad kyi khongs su gartogs pa'i sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa thams cad ngar 'gro thams cad nas gdon par dus gsum du gsol ba btag
42b8(mdo): ba myi btang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad spong bar dus gsum du gsol ba gtab pa myi btang bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thams
42b9(mdo): cad spong bar 'gyur ba'i gsol ba btab pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa spong bar 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba myi btang bar bya'o// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
43a1(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos las stsogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i za ba thams cad la dus gsum du rjes su
43a2(mdo): yi rang ba myi btang bar bya'o// 'tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni snying thag pa rus pa'i khong nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas// dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i
43a3(mdo): byang chub tu smond pa dang / bdag nyid sdig pa spyod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / sdig pa spyod pa la bshung ba dang / sdig pa las nges par 'byung ba dang / dge ba thams cad 'dod pa dang / dge ba thams cad blang ba dang / tshe rabs
43a4(mdo): tshe rabs su yang dkon mchog la bsnyen bkur bya ba gsol ba gta ba pa dang / gcig tu nges par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba'i spyod par gsol bu gtab pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs yongs
43a5(mdo): su rdzogs par bya bar gsol ba gtab pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi/ chos thams cad 'thob par gsol ba gtab pa dang / chos kyi 'kho// ra lo skor bar gsol ba gtab pa dang / bskal pa du mar chos
43a6(mdo): bstand pa gsol ba gtab pa myi gtang bar bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ pha ma la gnod pa myed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo/
43a7(mdo): dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza'o dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs la gnod pa myed par ji ltar mos pa dang / ci nus la dus dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// 'tshong dpon gi bu gzhan yang
43a8(mdo): las dpo pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la gnas shing 'dug pa dang / brtan por 'dug pa dang / myi lhod par 'dug par bslab par bya'o// gal te bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bslob myi
43a9(mdo): nus de yang / des bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ de'i nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la yang bslab par bya'o// gal te bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la bslob par yang myi nus na/ de sdig
