125a8(mdo): byug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas// tshig kyang 'di skad du/ e ma'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun
125a9(mdo): ring du gnas pa dang // rgyas par gyur cig ces mdzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam/
125b1(mdo): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dka' bo de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / yang dag par ra /
125b2(mdo): tu bstanang pa'i phyir// khyod la yongs su gtad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzind tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la ston tam/ yi ger bris pa la mchod pa
125b3(mdo): bgyid na/ des bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge
125b4(mdo): srong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis// bsnyen bkur byas pa bas// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzi nad pa dang / bzung nas kyang gzhan la stond pa dang / klog pa de ni
125b5(mdo): de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo// gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te/ mchod na de tshe 'di
125b6(mdo): nyid la gter thob pa bcu 'thob po// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang lha'i rna ba rab tu thob pas/ chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir
125b7(mdo): myi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab tu thob pas dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas/ zla myi shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang // mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs
125b8(mdo): pas gzugs kyi gter dang // g.yog myi phyed pas/ g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / spobs pa rab tu thob pas/ dran pa'i gter dang / pha rol gi rgol ba tshar
125b9(mdo): gcod pas/ myi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas/ bsod nams kyi gter ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems
126a1(mdo): dpa' sa ya khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur pa to// sems can dpag tu myed pa byang chub la rab tu zhugs so// sems can tshad myed pa yang
126a2(mdo): len pa myed par rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myang ci/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi
126a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying // chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya
126a4(mdo): bar zung shig/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'jam dpal gyi bstand pa zhes bya b.razung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal du
126a5(mdo): nas// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / tshad pa khya/ da par sems dang / bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gi 'od
126a6(mdo): gnas brtan 'od bsrung chen po dang // tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'bo dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ngag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lU dang / myi dang / lha ma
126a7(mdo): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la yid rangs ste/ mngon par stong ngo // // 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba
126a8(mdo): theg pa chen po'i mdol rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya sarba pun na sa mun tsa ya sa mI dI na ma ma ha ya na su tA/
126a9(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa sred myed kyi bus zhum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus
126b1(mdo): gcig ma/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pad/ a wAs bsrungs pa'i chal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ma// dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa// nyon mongs
126b2(mdo): pa myed pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur da pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa// glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba// rang gi don rjes
126b3(mdo): su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems
126b4(mdo): dpa' nyi khri thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog pa/ gzungs thob pa spobs pa thogs pa myed pa// mngon par shes pa thob pa// ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang /
126b5(mdo): brtan pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa pha rol da tu phyind pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
126b6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po blo gros bla ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
126b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
126b8(mdo): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred myed kyi bu dang / de dag las sogs pa nyi khri dang // lha'i
126b9(mdo): bubami mi thams cad kyang bas pa cher po la yang dag par zhugs pa gsus dang / 'du byi dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig ter skyong ba mang po dang bas gcig tu bzhunas radas bcom ldaran 'das 'khor 'dus zag nums
127a1(mdo): yongs su bskor cing mdun kyis bltas te/ chos storang to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa shin tu snying por gyur te/ mu stegs byed kyi tshogs thams cad zil gyis man dang to// de nas
127a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred myed kyi bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
127a3(mdo): btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di shi nang tu snying por gyur te/ mu stegs can ngan pa spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu grangs ma mchis
127a4(mdo): ba dang // gcer bu pa las bstsogs pa thams cad zild kyis ma na nad te myi mdzes par gyur da lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
127a5(mdo): legs par yongs su bzung du gsol// byang chub sems dang// 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan 'dogs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs
127a6(mdo): su bskyang du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzeng stong pa dang / yang
127a7(mdo): dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par bstan par gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyud myi 'chad pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung du gsol/
127a8(mdo): sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtang bar gsol/ ji lta bu'i tshul gyis chos kyi phan gdags pas/ mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba'i lam bstand par gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
127a9(mdo): las 'das pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
127b1(mdo): mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang myi bral ba dang / spyang ngas pa ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur/
127b2(mdo): ba'i slad du blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa rjes su thob pa'i slad du rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad du ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i
127b3(mdo): las thams cad spong ba'i slad du khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang // cho ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad
127b4(mdo): ru dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor thams cad kyi nang du bag tsha dang bral ba'i slad du sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b5(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su myi nyams pa dang / chos yongs su phyi nyams pa dang / shes rab yongs su myi nyam/ sa pa dang / ye shes yongs su myi nyams par 'gyur lags
127b6(mdo): ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su myi nyams pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug gi bar du sems can thams cad la mdza' ba brtan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin
127b7(mdo): du bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas/ sems can rnams la myi slu ba dang / gtong ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pas ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang /
127b8(mdo): sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa la gnas pas ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / gnod sems myed pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas/ ma bstand pa'i bzod pa dang
127b9(mdo): ldan pa dang / yongs su myi skye ba'i yid kyis don thams cad yongs su bsgrub pas ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas te/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
128a1(mdo): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la myi gnas pas ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang // lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pas ma bstan
128a2(mdo): pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la shi nad tu brtson pas/ bsdu ba shin tu bsdus pa dang / lha dang myi'i skye ba thams cad la myi rtag par yid la bgyi ba la brtson
128a3(mdo): pas re ba ma mchis pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la sems la legs par gnas shing // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral pos sgo'i thim pa'i rten lta bu dang / chos kyi dbang du
128a4(mdo): bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du myi bgyid pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid don tu gnyer bar bgyid kyi/ lha dang myi'i rgyal srid don du gnyer ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba dang
128a5(mdo): chos kyis tshol bar 'gyur gyi// zang zing gyis myi 'tsho ba dang // yongs su 'dzind pa thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bar/ 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis
128a6(mdo): pa'i sems dang ldan pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang / bral bas gti mug de nga bral bar 'gyur ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas/
128a7(mdo): bdud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / sgo thams cad nas yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa/ thabs la mkhas par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra nyis
128a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gi bdag po sred myed kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// sred myed kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub
128a9(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir don 'dri bar sems dpa' ni srid myed kyi bu khyod legs so// sred myed kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
128b1(mdo): rnams yon tan gi byung bar 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba ngas bshang ngo // bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred myed kyi
128b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sred myed kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsod nams
128b3(mdo): thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba// chos yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba/
128b4(mdo): dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / shes yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi bral
128b5(mdo): bar myi 'gyur/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong bar gnas pa nas/ sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas/ thabs
128b6(mdo): la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i bar de dag dang / yon tad gau khyad par gan na dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bas da nams thams cad bsdus pa'i/ tipa nge 'dzin 'di'i mying tsam
128b7(mdo): bka' stsal nas/ cang myi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba chen po che chen po stobs chen po dang ldan pa zhig yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas so// de nas 'di snyam
128b8(mdo): du sems te// bdag ni chen po che chen po stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can la 'di lta ste stobs sam/ spro ba bdag dang mnyam pa yang myed na/ lhag pa lta ga la yod/
128b9(mdo): snyam mo// des dge sbyong go'u ta ma stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan te/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan zhing sred myed kyi bu'i lus thob po zhes grag go snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dge
129a1(mdo): skyong ko'u ta ma'i tha da du song la/ bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / bdag ci 'dra ba sad par bya gor ma 'chag snyam mo// de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gza gzi brjid/ yangs pa'i/
129a2(mdo): grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po khang pa rtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 'bum
129a3(mdo): phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te// sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos stond cing / ri'i rgyal po re rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa dang / 'dra la kun nas mdzes shing blta bas chog
129a4(mdo): myi shes pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong na dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dka' ba chen po thob bo// de dga' rab dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob nas/ bcom ldan
129a5(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing / mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas
129a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi' brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa
129a7(mdo): 'dul ba'i phyir/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod song la/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ shag kya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa gang
129a8(mdo): yin pa der long shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ba mo'u dgal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snam 'da' de ga la mchis/ bdag gis
129a9(mdo): ma mthong ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag g.yas pa nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig btang ste/ 'od zer des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
129b1(mdo): khams snang bar byas so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'khor g.yug chen po gang yin pa de na/ mnga' de 'dug par snang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen
129b2(mdo): po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i khor g.yug chen po mda' 'dug pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
129b3(mdo): pa/ mo'u 'gal gi bu khyod song la mnga' de long shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ki bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bltar nyan pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyi
129b4(mdo): nang nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du skad gcig tha gcig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gi khams 'khor
129b5(mdo): g.yug chen po de nas mda' de blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phu la nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da ti// bco ma ldan 'das ci snam mnga' 'di byang chub sems dpa'as yang
129b6(mdo): yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags sam/ 'on te/ rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa mo 'u 'gal gi bu yab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis mda' 'phangs
129b7(mdo): pa yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyis mnga' 'phangs pa ni ma yin no// mo'u 'gal ka~M bu gal te/ rdzu 'phrul ki stobs kyis 'phangs su zin na/ 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
129b8(mdo): gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs rang gi bso padams yongs su sbyin pa las skyes pa de ji lta bu zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b9(mdo): bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu myi bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// grang gcig gi stobs so// grang bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de no// glang sngon po gcig gi stobs so// grang sngon po bcu'i stobs gang lam
130a1(mdo): ba de ni/ glang po che tha mal ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che tha mal bcu'i stobs bcu gang yin pa de ni// glang po che 'jigs su rung ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che 'jigs su rung ba bcu'i/
130a2(mdo): stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ dgon pa'i glang po che gcig gi stobs so// dgon pa'i glang po che bcu'i stob
130a3(mdo): gang yin pa de ni// ri 'bigs byed gi glang po che gcig gi stobs so// ri 'byigs kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che mtshon cha'i sder mo can gcig gi stobs so// glang pa cha mtshan cha'i sngar
130a4(mdo): ma can gcag ga stabs sa/ glang po che mtshon cha'i sder mo can bcu 'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che gshol mda' 'dzin gcig gi stobs so// glang po che gshol mda' 'dzin bcu'i stobs gang
130a5(mdo): yin pa de ni/ glang po che stang zil mdog gcig gi stobs so// glang po che stang zil gau mdog bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che gel ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che gel ba bcu'i
130a6(mdo): stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che sngon po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che ser po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che ser po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de mi
130a7(mdo): glang po che dmar po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che dmar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che skya bo gcig gi stobs so// glang po che skya bo bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che ku mu ta gcig
130a8(mdo): gi stobs so// glang po che ku mu ta bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// glang po che pad ma kar po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che pad ma dkar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che pad ma gcig gi stobs so//
130a9(mdo): glang po che pad ma bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs so// spos kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ spos kyi glang po che chen po gcig gi stobs so// spos kyi glang po che chen po
130b1(mdo): bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// seng ge ral pa can thams cad gcig gi stobs so// seng ge ral pa can thams cad bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ chen po che gcig gi stobs so// chen po che chen po
130b2(mdo): bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ chen po che chen po gcig gi stobs so// chen po che chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// stobs mchog gcig gi stobs so// stobs mchog bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni
130b3(mdo): stobs mchog chen po gcig gi stobs so// stobs mchog chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ rab gnod gcig gi stobs so// rab gnon bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ rab gnon chen po gcig gi/
130b4(mdo): stobs so// rab gnon chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa re ni/ sa bla'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// sa bla'i lha'i bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ gnas byed pang dag 'i gA'i bu gcig gi stongam lo/
130b5(mdo): byed 'ang dganas pa'i ka'i bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu gshol mda' 'dzin gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bu gshol mda' 'dzin bcu'i stob sa gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i bu lag na 'phreng thogs gcig
130b6(mdo): gi stobs so// lha'i bu lag na 'phreng thogs bcu'i stobs gang yin ba de ni/ lho'i bu rtag tu myos pa gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bu rtag tu myos pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen
130b7(mdo): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ lus ngan gcig gi stobs so// lus ngan gcig gi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ sum
130b8(mdo): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// sum brgyan gsum pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gcig gi stobs so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcur
130b9(mdo): stobs gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab bral gi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bu 'thab bral bcu'i stobs kang yin pa de ni/ lha'i bu 'thab bral gcig gi stobs so// lnga'i bu rab 'thab bral bcu'i stong
131a1(mdo): gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan ki lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// dga' ldan ki lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bu
131a2(mdo): yongs su dga' ldan bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ 'phrul dka'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' gcig gi stobs so//
131a3(mdo): lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i rgyal po dbang
131a4(mdo): byed gcig gi stobs so// lho'i dbang po dbang byed bcu'i stobs gang yin pa do ni/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni/ bdud sdig
131a5(mdo): can gcig gi stobs so// bdud sdig can bcu'i stobs gang y-i/ na ba de ni/ sred myed kyi bu phyed pa gcig gi stobs so// sred mye/ da kyi bu'i phyed pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ sred myed kyi bu
131a6(mdo): gcig gi stobs so// sred myed kyi bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ sred myed kyi bu chen po gcig gi stobs so// sred myed kyi bu chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges
131a7(mdo): par byung nas bskal pa brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung nas/ bskal pa brgya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung gnas skal
131a8(mdo): pa stong lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'alu gas bskal pa bcu lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung gnas bskal pa khri lon pa gcig gi stobs
131a9(mdo): so// byang chub sems dpa' nges pa byung nas bskal pa khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems
131b1(mdo): dpa' nges pa byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa ma ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas skal/
131b2(mdo): pa sa ya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa bcu
131b3(mdo): stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu lon pa bcu'i stobs
131b4(mdo): gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bas/ la ba bye ba phrag brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sem sa dpa' nges par 'byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa
131b5(mdo): bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa/ ra 'byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa gcig gi stobs/ so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung gnas bskal pa
131b6(mdo): bye ba phrag stong lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba khri lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpal nges par byung nas bskal pa
131b7(mdo): bye ba phrag khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung nas bskal pa bye phrag 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye
131b8(mdo): ba zag 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag sa ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye
131b9(mdo): ba phrag sa la lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' myi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig kyi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bcu'o
132a1(mdo): stobs gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpalas bcu la gnas pa srid pa tha ma pa gcig gi stobs yin te// mo'u 'gal gi bu stobs de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
132a2(mdo): dpa' chen po btsas ma zag tu sa la gom pa bdun 'gro bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gi bu gal te 'jig rten gi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang la
132a3(mdo): 'dug pa'i 'jig rten gi khams de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis ma rlabs su zin na/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten gi khams de'i sa chen po thur du dpag tshad drug khri brgya stong zhom par
132a4(mdo): 'gyur te// de'i 'og nas chu'i phung po las chu'i rgyu shing rta'i srog shing tsam sa gzhi chen po brtol te 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po de yang zhom par myi 'gyur la/ sems can
132a5(mdo): rnams la yang gnod par myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma ba btsas ma thag pa'i stobs dang / myur ba dang / shugs dang mthu ni de 'dra'o// mo'u 'gal
132a6(mdo): gi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsas ma zag bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa' yang 'tsho'i mchog la bab pa gcig gi stobs te/ stobs de dag dang ldan
132a7(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o// ji lta bu'i stobs dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132a8(mdo): chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba de bas 'bum 'gyur gis lhag pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug go// de bas kyang ches grangs myed dpag tu myed brjod du myed bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i stobs dang
132a9(mdo): ldan na// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mo'u 'gal gi bu gal te 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad byang chub mngon
132b1(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur na yang / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs gcig gi 'bum gi char yang myi phod
132b2(mdo): pa nas/ dpe'i bar du yang myi bzod de/ stobs de lta bu brnyes pas/ stong gsum gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal ki bu
132b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin pas bsdus pa ste/ de las chung ba yang myed lhag pa yang myed do// de ni rdzu 'phrul yang ma yin// cho 'phrul yang ma yin no// byang chub seMs
132b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gi stobs ni/ sto bas gang dang yang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas rkang pa'i the bo/ 'i spu'i khu bu gcig gis 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung
132b5(mdo): gi bye ma bskyed grangs nas 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu mye da pa dag tu 'phangs kyang / sems can 'ga' tsam la yang rgano/ dpar myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
132b6(mdo): po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gi stobs de ni de ltar dpag tu myed bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam mo// ma 'u 'gal gi bu gal te de bzhin
132b7(mdo): gshegs pa'i stobs de bstan du zin no ni// khyed kyis kyang yid ches par myi nus na/ sems can gzhan gyis lto ci smos// mo'u 'gal gi bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba
132b8(mdo): de'i tshe/ khams bzhi po sa dang / chu dang / mye dang / rlung gi khams 'di dag khams gcig tu 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams su byin gyis rlob ste/ des na sa chen po zhum par myi 'gyur la/ sems can
132b9(mdo): rnams la yang gnod par myi 'gyur ro// des na chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa las byang chub sems dpa' yab yum las byung ba'i stobs 'di thos nas/ dga'
133a1(mdo): zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtsha rad du gyur nga nas stan las langs te bla kos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
133a2(mdo): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpo'i stobs thos nas/ bdag gi nga rgyal dang dregs pa chag ste/
133a3(mdo): ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad la sman pa bde ba'i slad du bla na myed pa
133a4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu ci 'dra ba de lta bu yang bdag gis thob par gyur pa gcig/ tshan
133a5(mdo): po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid las/ lho'i bu khros tshig/ 'di thos nas// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang
133a6(mdo): da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur da ci gces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
133a7(mdo): sems dpa' sred byed kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi mying bka' stsal nas/ cang myi gsung bar gyurarang ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad sdus
133a8(mdo): pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das ci nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gi bdag po byang
133a9(mdo): chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sred myed kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des bsod
133b1(mdo): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su ma bzung ba de ni gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de khongs su 'dus shing rjes su
133b2(mdo): zhugs po'i phyir ro// sred myed kyi bu dper na chu myig thams cad dang / mtsho bran thams cad dang / mtshe'u thams cad dang / chu rlung thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i khongs su 'dus shing
133b3(mdo): rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin du/ sred myed kyi bu bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba/ sbyin pa las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims las byung ba rnams dang / bsgom pa las byung ba rnams dang / zag pa dang /
133b4(mdo): bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa myed pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / lha rnams dang / myi rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa'i
133b5(mdo): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub// kyi sems kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa dag go// sred kyi bu de'i phyir bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung
133b6(mdo): bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bla na myed pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// sred myed kyi bu dper na/ rin po che'i ri chen po gang dag yin 'di lta ste/
133b7(mdo): lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / khor g.yug dang / 'khor g.yug chen po dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / bar+Na dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal
133b8(mdo): thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'dzam bu gling dang / shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod dang / byang gi sgra s+yai
133b9(mdo): snyan dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams dang / stong gi 'jig rten gi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams dang / stong gsum gi 'jig rten gi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
134a1(mdo): khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar ji snyed yod pa nas/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i bar 'di dag thams cad ni
134a2(mdo): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par bya ba de bzhin du/ sred myed kyi bu so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams rnams dang / bslob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang /
134a3(mdo): myi bslob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ci yang rung ba dang / ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
134a4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa khongs su 'dus shi/ nga rjes su zhugs te/ sred myed kyi bu rnams des kyang gang dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
134a5(mdo): pa'i sems can de dag gyis// bsod nams thams cad// yongs su gzung ba de ltar rig par bya'o// sred myed kyi bu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can las/ theg pa chen po
134a6(mdo): las yang dag par zhug pa ma rtogs par ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba ni/ bsod nams dang / shes rab kyi mchog du brjod do// sred myed kyi bu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams
134a7(mdo): na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te// sems can re re yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams ji 'dra ba de lta bu/
134a8(mdo): bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa na/ sred myed kyi bu 'di snyam du sems/ ci bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i gcigs
134a9(mdo): gi bsod nams gi phung po lnga mang lags na/ sems can grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi smos kyang lta ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred myed kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
134b1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems cad ji snyed yod pa ses can du bsdu ba bsdus pa de dag re re nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi
134b2(mdo): sems can rnams 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa lta zhog gi/ sred myed kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gi khams gang 'gro'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad
134b3(mdo): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa na/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred kyi bus gsol da
134b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / mnyam par gyur da ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na/ sems can grangs ma mchis pas 'khor los
134b5(mdo): bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal / pa/ sred myed kyi bu khyod mos par bya// khong du chud par bya ste/
134b6(mdo): de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba cher mngal ches dpag tu myed de// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/
134b7(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang gyi phong/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gi cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gi char yang myi phod/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /
134b8(mdo): dper dang / rgyur yang myi bzod de/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o// sred myed kyi bu gzhan yang stong gi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gi khas
134b9(mdo): byams pas khyab par byed do// sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mye le la zhig gis stong gi 'jig rten gi khams rin po ce sna bdun gyis gang bar byas ste/ sbyir ba byin ma/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod
135a1(mdo): nams kyi phung po de dang / tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang // byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs
135a2(mdo): po'i bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid ches mang gi/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i ni de lta ma lags so// sred myed kyi bu stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems
135a3(mdo): stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/ sred myed kyi bu gal te myi la la zhig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang
135a4(mdo): bar byas te/ sbyir pa byin na/ sred myed kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang / byams pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong
135a5(mdo): gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams/ kyi phung po gang lags pa de gnyis ches mang gi/ sbyin pa las byung / ba ni de lta ma lags so// sred myed kyi bu stong gnyis kyi bdag po
135a6(mdo): tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog go// sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// stong gsum gi bdag po tshangs pas stong ga sum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams byams pas khyad par
135a7(mdo): byed la/ sred myed kyi bu myi la la zhig gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rin po che sna bdun gis gang bar byas te/ sbyar ba sbyin na/ sred myed kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshangs pa chen po byams
135a8(mdo): pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gnyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyid pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan
135a9(mdo): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi phod pa nas// rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi
135b1(mdo): tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi// sred myed kyi bu gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems cad du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/
135b2(mdo): tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
135b3(mdo): lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su grol ba la brtson pa/ g.yo myed cing sgyu myed pa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang
135b4(mdo): yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de bas ches yang ste/ tshangs pa bsod nams kyi phung po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi phod pa
135b5(mdo): ras rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu de ltar na se// mas dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// rjes kyi rdo rjes kyi phung po ni dpag tu myed pa yin te/ sred myed kyi
135b6(mdo): bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ngag gis bla na myong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag kyis bsod nams
135b7(mdo): thams cad yongs su bsdus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o// sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar phyogs
135b8(mdo): su 'jig rten gi khams ji snyed cig yod/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ki khams ji snyed gcig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol pa/
135b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag ni brjod pa 'am brda sprad par rdo myo thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
135b10(mdo): bka' stsal da pa/ phred myed kyi bu gal te dper blang ba bstand pas/ bstand pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan pas/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan du zin kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ge/
135b11(mdo): khams ji snyed yod pa ni bstan par sla ba ma yin no// sred kyi bu 'od kyang don 'di nyid brda sprad pa dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can bsod nams
135b12(mdo): 'dod pa rjes byer zhing 'bogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i sems can gyi brtson 'grus chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la dpes bstand to// sred myed kyi bu dper na/
135b13(mdo): myil la zhig gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kham sa 'di chu'i phung po yang srid pa'i rtse mo man cad yongs su nyungs 'brus gang bar byas la/ sred myed kyi bu de las shar phyogs
135b14(mdo): su yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed gi khams 'das nas yungs 'bru gcig bor te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru de dag thams cad/ yongs su zad par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khas
135b15(mdo): rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par myi nus so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu'i kun tu sbyar ro// sred myed kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yungs 'brus
135b16(mdo): yongs su gang bar gyur da la/ de las mya la la zhig gis yungs 'bru re re yang / yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses na/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag
135b17(mdo): bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru gcig gi tshe gses pa'i phyogs gang lags pa de yang / gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams
135b18(mdo): cang sha ri'i bu dang 'dra bar gyur da pas kyang / bskal par yang rtogs par rngo myi thog lags na/ yungs 'bru'i cha gsas pa thams cad lta smos kyang myi 'tshal// sred myed kyi bu myi la la zhig gI/ shar phyogs kyi yungs 'bru'o/
135b19(mdo): cha gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten ga khams 'das nas yungs 'brul cha sems pa re re bor te/ sred myed kyi bu de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i chagases pa thams cad zad par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig
135b20(mdo): rten gi khams rnams kyimatha' rtogs par myi nus so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu'i kun tu yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// sred myed kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
135b21(mdo): gi khams nam mkhas yongs su khyab pa de snyed pa de dag thams cad myi la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byin na/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ myi de bzhi de las bsod
135b22(mdo): rams mang du bskyed dam// byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pra dpag tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
135b23(mdo): sA lang pa/ sreng myed kyi bu de lta bu'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod// rabs kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i thas
135b24(mdo): pa phun gsum tshogs pa/ g.yo myed po/ sgyu myed pa// sems cad thams cad yongs su grol ba brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang / byaHsa pa chen po bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
135b25(mdo): snga mo'i brgya'i char yang myi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu dper na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha' khams kyis ma khyab pa ci yang myed pa de bzhin du/ sred myed kyi bu byang chub sems
135b26(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa des ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams ji snyed yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de dag ma khyab pa gang yang myed de/ 'jig rten gi khams de
135b27(mdo): dag na/ sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yongs su khyab po// 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sems can gang dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad
136a1(mdo): as 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyurd tam/ de bzhin du brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyurang tam/ de bzhin du tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang /
136a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ g.yo myed pa// sgyu myed pa// sems can yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/ snying rje chen po la zhugs pa byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa bdun la 'am
136a3(mdo): rams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bas ches mang ste// sems can thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur dra ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de ma yin
136a4(mdo): mo// sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gsum pa'o// sred myed kyi bu gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams su rtogs pa'i
136a5(mdo): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba/ dang / mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang // de dag thams cad ni brgya byin gyis bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i
136a6(mdo): char yang myi phod pas na/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ka khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin dang mnyam pa'i bsod nas/
136a7(mdo): kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad ni tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi phod pas ra/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig
136a8(mdo): rten khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang // de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i
136a9(mdo): brgya'i char yang myi phod pas na/ brgya'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog dang mnyam pa'i
136b1(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang // de dag thams cad misha ri'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi bod pa nas// rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzong ngo // sred byed kyi bu/
136b2(mdo): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sha ri'i bu dang / mnyam pa'o shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad
136b3(mdo): mi rang sangs rgyas gcig go zhes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang kyi bong ba nas// rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod ngo // sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi
136b4(mdo): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur de nas kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can chen po
136b5(mdo): nges par byung nas bskal pa lnga brgya lon po'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi phod// pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// thams cad la de
136b6(mdo): bzhin du sbyar te/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nas mas cad bsdu sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ myi sum khri nyi stong gyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
136b7(mdo): po'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug pugayos so// lha dang myi'i sil snyan dag kyang srog go// lha dang myi'i mye tog gi spri dag kyang bab ste/
136b8(mdo): me tog gi spro de dag gis so chen po 'di pus mo nub nub tsam du bkram mo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyod dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang
136b9(mdo): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang // tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
137a1(mdo): tu sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni bdag cag zil gis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gi don bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan/
137a2(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal bar bltar na/ sems can gang su dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las
137a3(mdo): mngon par byung ba yang ma lags/ de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma lags kyi// bcom ldan 'das kad kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par
137a4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus po'i ting nge 'dzind las mngon par byung ba yang ma lags/ de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
137a5(mdo): ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma lags so// le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gza brjid
137a6(mdo): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyid pa'i chos rnams gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po
137a7(mdo): drim byed pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
137a8(mdo): kyi sems myi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos gcig po 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par
137a9(mdo): byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyam pa'i chos yongs su tshol bas chos myi shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog ste// rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis ni bsod nams
137b1(mdo): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa thams cad
137b2(mdo): yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o//
137b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzi dang 'di thob par byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems
137b4(mdo): yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos ba'i po de dag mi bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams
137b5(mdo): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos/ lnga ste/ l-I zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang / chub la zhugs pa dang / rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang / g.yo
137b6(mdo): myed pa dang / phra dog myed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste// rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni bsod nam sa thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di thob par byed pa'o//
137b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su
137b8(mdo): spang ba dang / tshogs kyi kha myi 'dren pa dang / dben pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang / byams pa chen po myi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos drug po de dag ni/ bsod
137b9(mdo): rnams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos bdud ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
138a1(mdo): zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang / sbag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rgyu yongs su shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / lam gi tshogs yongs su chos
138a2(mdo): ba dang / lam bsgom pa'i le lo myed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bdun po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
138a3(mdo): ting nge 'dzin de 'di thob par byed pa'i chos brgyad de// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus las su rung ba nyid dang / sems las su rung ba nyid dang / tshor ba la so sor rtog pa nyid dang / chos la rjes su lta ba nyid
138a4(mdo): dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams myi bskyed pa dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams kun nas bsrung
138a5(mdo): zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po de dag ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams
138a6(mdo): cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa myi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa myi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / da ltar byung ba myi zad
138a7(mdo): pa'i chos nyid du so sor rtog pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / stong pa nyid
138a8(mdo): myi spong ba dang / mtshan ma myed pa rnam par bsgoms pas smond pa myed pa dang bral ba dang / bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos dgu po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge
138a9(mdo): 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag myed pa la mos pa dang /
138b1(mdo): thog myed pa la bzod pa dang / gang zag myed pa la gcig du nges pa dang / myi rtag pa la yid ches pa dang / skye ba thams cad la sems can dmyal bar 'du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes
138b2(mdo): pa dang / khams rnams la sprul gdug par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / srid pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnams las
138b3(mdo): nges par 'du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin da 'di thob par byed pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen
138b4(mdo): bo dra me myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsdu bar lwa ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod
138b5(mdo): rams thams cad bsdus te ting nge 'dzin 'di nyad par bgyi'o// bsod nams bsags par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa
138b6(mdo): ting nge 'dzind 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mos par bgyi'o// bsod rnams myi zad pa thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin
138b7(mdo): 'di thob na par bgyi/ mos par bgyi'o// bsod nams kyi zad pa thob par 'chal pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzidang 'di la brtsod par bgyi'o// bsod nams rgya mtsho la thob par
138b8(mdo): 'chal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzung bar bgyi ba/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ bkang bar bgyi'o// bsod nams brgya'i mchod yongs su gzung bar 'tshal
138b9(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor da la brtson par bgyi'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces
139a1(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par brtson pa 'di lta ste/ bsod nams myi zad pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho dang / bsod nams bsam gyis
139a2(mdo): myi khyab pa dang / bsod nams bstsogs pa dang / bsod nams brgya'i mtshan kyis chos 'di dag ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po
139a3(mdo): dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// rigs kyi bu gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rton pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams 'du ba dang / bsod nams rgyas
139a4(mdo): pa dang / bsod nams myi zad pa dang / bsod nams bsam gyi das myi khyab pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/ gsum gang zhe dan/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs
139a5(mdo): dang / thos pa'i tshogs so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i tshogs la ji ltar/ brtson par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
139a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos dngos po gang la de'i gtong ba'i sems myi skye zhing / gtong ba'i blo myi 'byung ba'i dngos po de blang bar myi bya'o// yongs su gzung ba gang la btang ba'i sems myi skye ba'i yongs
139a7(mdo): su bzung ba de yongs su bzung bar myi bya'o// gang la bslang ba rnams kyis bslangs na/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i blo skye ba'i g.yog 'khor de bzung bar myi bya'o// dngos po gang la bslong ba rnams kyis bslangs nas
139a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' myi gtang ba'i blo skye bar gyurd pa'i rgyal srid de blang bar myi bya'o// longs spyod de dag dang / nor de dag dang / rdzas de dag dang / rin po che de dag blang bar myi bya ba nas/ de lta bu'i dngos po
139a9(mdo): yang rung ba'i bar blang bar myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gi lus 'di yang sems can thams cad la btang ste/
139b1(mdo): yongs su btang na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams lta ci smos snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la dngos po gang dang gang gis dgos po gang dang gang byed par 'gyur ba de yod na/ de dang de
139b2(mdo): la de dang myi dga' ba myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed par sbyin par bya ste/ lag pa 'dod pa rnams la lag pa yang sbyin mo// rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la rkang pa dang / myig 'dod pa rnams la myig kyang sbyin no// sha 'dod
139b3(mdo): pa rnams la sha dang / khrag 'dod pa rnams la khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la rkang dang / yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la yan lag dang nyin lag dang / mgo bo 'dod pa rnams la 'og po yongs su gtong
139b4(mdo): bya na/ phyi rol gi dngos po 'di lta ste/ nor dang 'bru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / gzhon pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
139b5(mdo): dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / tsho// ra 'dus dang / ri 'or ba dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed// pa dang bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / 'khor rnams lta tsaM
139b6(mdo): smos// gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la gang dang gang na sa don byed par 'gyur ba de dang de yod na// de dang de la dngos po de spyi na par bya ste// myi dag pa myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed pa dang /
139b7(mdo): rnam par sbyor ba la myi ri bar yongs su btang bar bya'o// myi lta bar sbyin par bya'o// gzhan du na sems cad la phar gdags pa dang / sems cad la snying rje ba dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can
139b8(mdo): de dag nyid bsdus pa'i phyir bya bar zad // bdag gis byang chub thob pa ya// ciras sems cad 'di dag chos kun rtogs par gyur da cig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
139b9(mdo): gang su dag ji ltar sems bskyed par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la yang myi lta ba yir te// de ni srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las
140a1(mdo): mngon par 'du mi byed do// lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar gyi byed do// nga srog kri phyir yang gzhan la slong po rgya byed do// longs spyod kyi phyir myi dge ba mngod par 'du myi
140a2(mdo): byed do// g.yog 'khor gi phyir yang brtsod pa dang 'thab mo bslong bar myi byed do// chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams kyi phyir yang gzhan dgra la 'dring bar myi byed do// gzhan gi longs spyod dag la yang rngub
140a3(mdo): sems bskyed par myi byed/ ser sna'i sems bskyed par myi byed do// de 'dod pa nyung ste/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang dge ba dang myi ldan par bskyed par myi byed na/ mang po lta ci smos// de de ltar brjon 'dod chen dang
140a4(mdo): chags par spong bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chen dang / chags pa spangs ras btsal bar bya ba tshol bar myi byed do// btsal bar bya ba mya 'tshol na yang dag par brtsol bar myi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa la
140a5(mdo): brtson na yang dag par 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro// yang dag/ par song na yang dag par bsgrub pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa la zhugs na/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
140a6(mdo): rnams mnyes par byed do// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mnyes par byas nas/ sten par byed// 'grog par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams dang / bsten
140a7(mdo): cing 'grogs pa bsnyen bkur byed na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las yang dag par nges pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang bsgrub par byed do// de yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs nas log par
140a8(mdo): bslab pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thams cad byed do// de sems can gi don la brtson na/ myi rigs par ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// de rigs pa la zhugs na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi dbang
140a9(mdo): po ma chog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pa dang / tshul ma yin pa la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltarar sbyin pa'i tshogs la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams ni yon tan gi khyad par de lta bu
140b1(mdo): ngag thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni nang dang phyi rol gi chos rnams la gcig gi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gnyis kyi 'du shes bskyed par myi bya ste/
140b2(mdo): rang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gri sa'i khams yin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus 'di ni rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam snang ba dang 'dra ste/
140b3(mdo): spyod pa myed pa/ byed pa myed pa// sems pa myed pa/ snying po myed pa/ khams kyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro// gal te 'di la la zhig gis bcad dam/ gtubs sam/ dbyugs pa 'am/ mtshon nam
140b4(mdo): shing ngam/ bong bas bsnun kyang rung ste/ de la bdag gis tshor ba'i rnam par rig pa bskyed par myi bya'o// lus la blta bar myi bya'o// sems can de dag la yang tha ba dang // sdang ba'i sems bskyed par
140b5(mdo): myi bya'o// snyam po'i steng du nges sems can de dag la byams/ pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dper ma/ sman de/ shing ljon pa ni rtsa ba las khyer ram/ sdong po 'am/ yal ga 'am/
140b6(mdo): shun pags am/ lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'am snying po las khyer ba na/ 'di snyam du bdag gi cha ba khyer la sdong po ma khyer gcig ce 'am/ bdag gi sdong po khyer la rtsa ba ma khyer gcig
140b7(mdo): ce 'am/ bdag gi yal ga khyer la lo ma ma khyer cig ce 'am/ bdag gi lo ma khyer la yal gA ma khyer gcig ce 'am/ de bzhin du bdag gi lal ka phre'u dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shud pags dang /
140b8(mdo): snying po las ma khyer cig ce 'am/ bdag gi snying po myed pa las khyer la/ snying po las ma khyer cig snyam du rtog par myi byed de/ de ltar smar gi ljon pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rtog par myi byed mod kyi/
140b9(mdo): 'on kyang sman gi shing ljon pa ni rnam par myi rtog bzhin du/ nad rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma sel par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i yus
141a1(mdo): 'di la sman gi shing ljon pa lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// sems can gang dag la ci dgongs pa de dang de bzhin du khyer ces byas te/ lag pa 'dod pa la ni lag pa// rkang pa 'dod pa la ni
141a2(mdo): rkang pa/ myig 'dod pa la ni myig/ sha 'dod pa la ni sha/ khrag 'dod la ni khrag/ rus pa 'dod pa la ni rus pa rkang 'dod pa la de gang mgo'o 'dod pa la ni 'go bo/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa la na
141a3(mdo): bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad khyer cig snyam ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis bsod nams myi zad pas mngon par 'byung ba yin/
141a4(mdo): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sbyin pa byin po ni// sems can ser sna can rnams kyi gtong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// sems can
141a5(mdo): dbul po rnams kyis long spyod chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yod/ sa su bsngo bar bya'o// des yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su gtong ba na/ sems can thams cad kyi yan lag
141a6(mdo): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// des sbyin pa byin na ni/ dus thams cad du chos gsum du yo ngas su bsngo bar myi bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod
141a7(mdo): pa dga' ba dang / rgyal srid dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su bsngo bar myi bya ba dang / bdag nyid bsod nams dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar myi bya ba dang / nyan thos
141a8(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar myi bya'o// des sbyin pa byin par sbyir ba de yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/
141a9(mdo): yan lag bzhi yangs su dag pa yangs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu bar bya ste/ de la yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir
141b1(mdo): yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpal dge 'dun yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / thes
141b2(mdo): cad mkhyenang pa nyid ye shes yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ de ltar na yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub mes dang seMs dpa' chen po skyid pa de yong su bsngo ba bya'o// rigs
141b3(mdo): bu gzhan lnga byang chub ses dpe seMs dbu chen pos sbyin pa nye ba rten pa byi lnga par gyi bya'o// des byang chub ses dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ji ltar zad par 'gyur zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur te/
141b4(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su ma bsngos pa dang / thabs myi mkhas pa dang / dpa' bar skye bar 'dod pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po ba sten pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag
141b5(mdo): dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnam/ sa kyi sbyin pa ni/ yongs su zad par myi 'gyur la nye bar brtan par
141b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/
141b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni yongs su zad par myi 'gyur la/ nye bar brtan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
141b8(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos chos gsum mngon du byas la/ sbyin pa byin par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang / sems can la snying rtse ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
141b9(mdo): dang myi 'gal ba dang / chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i rnam par smyin pa la mya ra ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gsum po de dag la mngon du byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//
142a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can rnams chos gsum la dkod pa'i phyir/ sbyin bu sbyin par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thos
142a2(mdo): cad byang chub la dgod pa dang / chos bstand pa de nyid la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad bla na myed pa'i bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag la sems can rnams dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub
142a3(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod
142a4(mdo): pa chen po dang / gtong ba'i sems te/ chos de gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su spang ba'i phyir byang
142a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa dang / ser sna ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis yongs su spang ba'i phyir byang chub seMs
142a6(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa 'asems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe
142a7(mdo): na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab dang / ye shes ste/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyir ba sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzham yang
142a8(mdo): chos gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis
142a9(mdo): thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gang dag sbyin par bya ba'i sbyin pa dag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
142b1(mdo): 'di lta ste/ sems snyoms pa sbyin pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa la myi re bo'i sbyin pa dang / byang chub tu sngo ba'i sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yongs su rdzogs par sbyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu sbyin pa
142b2(mdo): bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin par bya ba dag go// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams myi zad pas mngon par 'byung bar 'dod pas/ sbyin pa'i tshogs
142b3(mdo): 'di lta bu la brtson par bya'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
142b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di bka' stsal pa/ ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin
142b5(mdo): pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni/ nams kyang bsod nam/ sa yongs su nyams pa 'am/ ye shes yongs su nyams pa la// ma/ shes rab yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba lagaso//
142b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// khyod ci skad zer ba bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' gang dag sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pas de dag ni
142b7(mdo): bsod nams myi zad pa dang // bsod nams rgya mtshos mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pas dbul por yang myi 'gyur ro// de dag ni chos kyi rgyun dang ldan pas long spyod chen
142b8(mdo): por yang 'gyur ro// de dag ni nor bdun dang ldan pas phyug por yang 'gyur ro// de dag ni bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yod pas bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa yang yin no// de dag ni sems can thams
142b9(mdo): cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi zhing yang yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid la gzhan yang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
143a1(mdo): kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyi gang zhen// gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / bslab pa yongs su myi gtong ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la snying rje ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa
143a2(mdo): rnams la gus pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / lus kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
143a3(mdo): yang dag par blang ba rjes su bsgrub pa ste/ gzhan dag kyang de la 'dzud pa dang / de dag 'dod par byed pa dang / bdag la myi stong pa dang / gzhan la myi smod pa dang / tshul khrims dag pa de'i ngang tshul can du gyur da pa dang /
143a4(mdo): tshul khrims kyis myi rlom pa dang / brtson pa myi 'dor ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad sbyangs pa dag las myi g.yo ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs gnas par byed pa dang / rang gi sems srung ba
143a5(mdo): dang / gzhan gi 'khrul ba dag la skyon du myi ltung ba dang / sdig/ pa thams cad myi byed pa dang / srid pa mngon par grub pa la mdo// na par myi dka' ba dang / gzhan rnams dge bo'i rtsa ba dag la
143a6(mdo): 'dzud pa dang / gzhan gi bya ba dag la spro ba dang / bde ba dag la de'i ngang can du myi 'gyur ba dang / dgon par gnas pa myi 'dor ba dang / nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang / byas nas kyang dga' ba dang /
143a7(mdo): mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / bkur sti byed pa dag la dang du len pa dang / bkur sti byed pa rnams la khengs par myi byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa
143a8(mdo): dang / ma grags pa dang / spang ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dag la khengs par myi 'gyur/ zhum par myi 'gyur ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / khon du myi 'dzin
143a9(mdo): rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa dang / mdza' shes dang / dgra rnams la sems snyoms par blta ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la mchog tu myi 'dzind pa dang / theg pa gzhan du yongs su
143b1(mdo): myi bsngo ba dang / lha gzhan la phyag myi 'tshal ba dang / lta bar gyur da pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnond pa dang / 'gyod pa spong ba dang / yid la chags pa myed
143b2(mdo): pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mchog tu dga' ba dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad la lhag par chags pa myed pa/ bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba dang / myi dga' ba bzod pa dang
143b3(mdo): brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems rab tu 'dzind pa dang / dmyigs pa la bos pa g.yengs pa myed pa dang / myi skye ba la bzod cing myi skrag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khris
143b4(mdo): kyi tshogs yin te/ tshul khrims kyi tshogs de la rten nas/ srog gri phyir yang bslab pa nyams par myi byed do// de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin
143b5(mdo): brgya byin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin/ longs spyod kyi phyir ma yi// na dbang phyug gi phyir ma yin/ kha dog gi phyir ma yin// grags pa'i phyir ma yin snyam pa dang / smra dang / tshigs su
143b6(mdo): bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ srog gi phyir ma yin/ gos kyi phyir ma yin/ zas kyi phyir ma yin/ mal cha dang stan gau phyir ma yin te/
143b7(mdo): na ba'i gsos dang / sman zong gi phyir tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus la brten te tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
143b8(mdo): reg bya dang / chos la brten te tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// gzugs la brten te tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la brten te tshul
143b9(mdo): khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// 'dod pa'i khams la brten te tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// gzugs kyi khams la brten te tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// gzugs myed pa'i khams la brten te
144a1(mdo): tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// sems can dmyal bas bsgrag ste/ tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste// tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed/
144a2(mdo): ngo// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bskyabs 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// myi dbul po la 'jig pas skrag ste/ tshul khrims bsrung bar myi byed do// lha dbul po'i
144a3(mdo): 'jigs pas skag dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsaM dang / lto phye chen po dang / dbul po'i 'jigs pas skrag ste// tshul khrims bsrung bar mya byed
144a4(mdo): do// gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi tshul gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi rigs gnas par bya ba/ dang / chos kyi rigs gnas par bya ba dang / dge 'dun gi rigs
144a5(mdo): gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde
144a6(mdo): ba dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// sems can thams cad rab tu dkrol bar 'dod pa'i de tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// sems can
144a7(mdo): thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba 'dod de tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos gnas par 'dod de/ tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
144a8(mdo): 'dod de/ tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi 'chad par 'dod pa dang // chos kyi rigs myi 'chad par 'dod pa
144a9(mdo): dang / dge 'dun rigs myi 'chad par 'dod de tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// 'phags po'i rigs bzhi yongs su spyod par 'dod de// tshul khrims srung bar byed do// lha'i mngon par shes pa 'dod pa dang /
144b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa dang / shes rab 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'dong ngo // tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa dang / cho 'phrul 'dod pa dang /
144b2(mdo): cho 'phrul 'dod de tshul khrims bsrung bar byed do// de tshul khrims de yang ma nyams pa dang / ma zhig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / a 'jol pa dang / dbang sod pa dang / legs pa char phyin pa dang / legs par bsams pa dang / ma rtogs pa
144b3(mdo): pa dang / ma myed pa dang / btsang ba dang / dri zhim pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stod pa dang / ma spras pa dang / chos kyi rjes su thun pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i snying por byed pa yin no//
144b4(mdo): de tshul khrims kyi phus de lta bu dang ldan pas chos bcu las nyams par myi 'gyur te// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid las yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyur te// de la yang
144b5(mdo): bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang / brgya byin las yongs su nya/ mas par myi 'gyur te// de la yang bag yod la/ byang chub 'dod/ cing sangs rgyas mthong ba 'ba' shig 'dod pa dang / tshangs pa las
144b6(mdo): yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur te/ de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang // shes nas dad pa thob pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thob
144b7(mdo): pa'i chos la nan tan du bsgrub pa'i chos thos pa las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa shes pa las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad
144b8(mdo): shes pa 'dod pa'i phyir spobs pa myi chod pa las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang // byang chub
144b9(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par zhes par myur ba dang / thams cad mkhye dad pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams par
145a1(mdo): myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos bcu po de dag las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung/
145a2(mdo): po de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa yin no// klu rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yin no// gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur bstir
145a3(mdo): byas pa yin no// dri za rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa yin no// klu'i dbang dang / lA ma yin rnams kyis rtag tu bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag
145a4(mdo): rnams kyis rtag tu bkur ba yin no// mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu tha dad du 'gro bar bya ba yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag
145a5(mdo): tu stond par bkur ba yin no// sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba yin no// de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par/ bsrung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
