205b7(mdo): gang lags/ yang dag par 'du ba gang lags/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po/ smra byed pa'i rtsa pa ni snying rje chen po yin/ gzhi ni snying rje chen po yin/ yang dag par 'dul ba yang snying rje chen po yin no//
205b8(mdo): mi che chen po'i che ba gang lags/ gzhi gang lags/ yang dag par 'dra ba gang lags/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad yin/ gnon sems can thams cad
205b9(mdo): yin// yang dag par 'du ba yang sems can thams cad yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po// sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po las
206a1(mdo): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems can gyi phyir te// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'o// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po gzhan yang byang
206a2(mdo): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang chos kyi sgo gcig las brtsams nas/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'i bshad pa gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag gis 'chad cing 'dug pa ni
206a3(mdo): chos gang yang chos nyid dang 'gal bar myi byed de/ de 'dod na lus kyi snang bas sems can rnams la chos ston // spu'i khung bu thams cad kyang chos ston pa 'byin / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin
206a4(mdo): cu/ de chos ston pa spobs par byed/ de yid kyi tshul ston pas kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston te/ phas kyis rgol bams cad kyis kyi thub pa yin no// phyir rol gi mngon par
206a5(mdo): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis stan bcos sam/ nyi ma da/ pa/ zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma zhes pa 'am/ myi lam dang mtshan ma shes pa 'am/ rig byed dam/ sngags sam
206a6(mdo): rigs sngags sam/ sgra 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'am/ sa g.yo ba 'am/ 'gro ltung ba'i sngags kyi sbyor ba 'am/ bya rog gi sgra 'am/ ri dgas kyi khyu 'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
206a7(mdo): za dang bcas pa 'am/ rgyal po'i rtags dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma 'am/ lo legs pa dang / l-i nyes pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ gnon rnam par rtse ba shes pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten gi bzo
206a8(mdo): shes pa dang / las shes pa 'am/ yi ge dang / lag brda' dang / grangs dang / rtsi ba dang / ri mo 'bri ba dang / glu dang / gar dang / dza dang / khar dkrol dang / rol mo 'jug pa'i shes pa gang dag yin
206a9(mdo): pa de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' de tshe rjes nas/ ma bstan pa mngon du 'gyur zhing / de dag la de'i shes pa rab tu 'jug go// shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la yang de dag thams cad stond cing // zas
206b1(mdo): cad la mab rang phyi nad par 'gyur te/ de bstan bcos dang / sngags dang / rigs sngags kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes la/ sems cadan thams cad la yang gyi gnod par gnas shing / de dag gis
206b2(mdo): dag par yang gyi sems so// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab nyams tshungs pa 'bum phrag bcu dang / lhan gcig tu gnas shing 'dug la spra'o// lta bas kyang lta ba ston/
206b3(mdo): kha dog gis kyang kha dog ston/ smra bas kyang smra ba ston dang kha dog dang 'od dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang kha dog dang 'od dang gzi brjid stonang latshangs pa de dag la chags par yang myi 'gyur/ tshangs pa
206b4(mdo): de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de tshur 'ong zhing de la gus pa bskyed do// de bzhin du lha'i gnas thams cad du yang bdag po yin par ston la/ de dag la chags pa yang myed/ dga' ba yang myi bskyed
206b5(mdo): kyi/ myi rtag pa'i 'du shes nyid bskyed/ mug bsngal gi 'dus/ sa nyid skyed/ bdag myed pa'i 'du shes nyid bskyed/ nye bar zhi ba/ nyid la tod/ sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa nyid yod/
206b6(mdo): chu kyi zhing po nyid la ton te/ des 'phrul pa'i rgyal po 'di yang / shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'o// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
206b7(mdo): ni/ bdud kyi gnas bkod pa ci 'dra ba de dag las bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyur da kyi bkod pa'i khyad par gyis// bdud de rnams brgyas te/ 'dod par byas nas brgyal bcag ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs
206b8(mdo): pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod nas/ de'i 'og tu chos stonang to// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni kun tu 'gro bar shes par byas ste/ sbyin pa byin nam/ len tam/ yongs su bsngo
206b9(mdo): yang rung / shes rab ni kun tu 'gro bar shes par bya'o// tshul khrims srung ngam/ gzhan dag kyang der yang dag par 'jung dam/ yongs su bsngo yang rung / shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o// bzod
207a1(mdo): pa bsgom 'am/ bzod pa la yang dag par 'dud dam/ bzod pa de byang chub tu yongs su bsngo yang rung / shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o// brtson 'grus bcom 'am// gzhang dag la/
207a2(mdo): yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par 'dzud dam/ brtson 'grus de byang chub tu yongs su bsngo yang rung / shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug gam/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag
207a3(mdo): par 'dzud dam/ bsam gtan de byang chub tu yongs su bsngo yang rung / shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o// chos rnams 'dzind tam/ gzhan la stond tam/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog kyang
207a4(mdo): rung / shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o// thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du goms pa / 'dor zhing 'jog pa na/ shes rab nyid yin par shes par bya'o//
207a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs can ni/ thams cad du dge ba'i stobs can du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi bdag por gyur da pa ni/ thams cad la dbang phyug gi
207a6(mdo): dbang thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyis rnam par 'phrul pa ni thams cad du chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rjes su thob po// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi mtshon thogs pa
207a7(mdo): ni nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod cing rab tu 'dral lo// byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab la gnas pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi gnas yongs su 'dzin to// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'od byed pa ni
207a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis bkod pa 'thob po// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i chos lhun gyis grub pa rjes su rtogs te// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po 'di lta ste/ dper ma
207a9(mdo): steng gi bar snang la mnga' 'phangs na/ dben pa'i stobs ji tsam pa de srid du sngon nas brtsal gyi dgos pa kho nar slar sa la ltung ngo // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shes
207b1(mdo): rab kyi stobs rnam par dag pa de yang brtsal myi dgos pa kho nar de dge ba'i chos thams cad la yang 'bab/ stobs gang gis skad gcig cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag g.yol bar byed pa dang //
207b2(mdo): bdud kyi sde chen po de dag 'pham par byed par stobs kyang / byang chub kyi snying por kun tu ston/ byang chub thob nas kyang stobs gang dag gis/ lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyi ji ba'i stobs
207b3(mdo): bcu po dag kyang 'thob ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po tshul khrims dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes pa dang / shes rab kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
207b4(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ro// gang bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dga' bar gyur da pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par 'phrul pa bzhi po 'di dag
207b5(mdo): lhag par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di dag ni nyan thos// dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la byed pa'i phyir ro// de na/ sa byang chub sems dpal rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhus pa'i//
207b6(mdo): lan thob pas/ dga' mgu rangs yid bde rab tu dga'/ tshi me zhing yid rangs par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thal mo sbyar te// myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing tshig 'di skad ces spras
207b7(mdo): so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par 'phrul pa de dag gis rnam par 'phrul
207b8(mdo): bar gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal pos la dang bya'i mye tog rab tu nos pa kha dog nas pa cum bar rnams kyi phung po byed khyim brlabs nas/ mye tog de da /
207b9(mdo): kis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad la kun tu gtor to// mye tog de dag gtor nga ma thag tu gang dag gi lus la phog pa de dag thams cad gser gi kha dog 'dra/
208a1(mdo): la/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang pos brgyan par snang ngo // bar snang las kyang lha 'bum dag tshig tu smra ba/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rnam par 'phrul pa 'di la mos nas/ bla
208a2(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rnam par 'phrul ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ zas
208a3(mdo): cad mkhyend pa'i sems kyi khongs su rtogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub kyi sems bskyed du lags na/ chos rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di dag 'di ltar
208a4(mdo): thos par ga la 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byin nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa// rnam par
208a5(mdo): 'phrul pa'i rgyal po ngas mngon par dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ mar me mdzad kyi pha rol du na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun cu pa/ kun nas 'od gzer gzi brjid rgya chen zhes bya ba byung ste/ de
208a6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa des kyang rnam par 'phrul pa bzhi po 'di kho na da ga ston pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u rgya cher rab tu bstan par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa' yul phun gsum tshogs pa zhes bya ba
208a7(mdo): zhig kyang yod par gyur pa te// des de la zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag thob par gyur du/
208a8(mdo): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa to// srog chags sum khri nyi stong ces kyang zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag las kyang rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag ngas thos te/ thos
208a9(mdo): nas kyang bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las ngas bzod pa thob nas kyang // de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas so// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de lta bas na/ da lta yang rung / yongs su mya
208b1(mdo): ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyand cing / thos nas kyang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher
208b2(mdo): yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// bstand pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha dang / myi'i srog chags sum khri nyi stong / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
208b3(mdo): tu sems bskyed cing / lha'i bu de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab/ sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu dkrol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil
208b4(mdo): sman de dag las kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos shing la 'dzinang par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ ku chub par byed/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa'i
208b5(mdo): sems can de dag ni mos pa rgya che ba dbang po rno ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa/ shes rab spyod pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnye na gyis yongs su zin pa/ sngon dge ba'i brtsa ba bsags pa
208b6(mdo): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin no// zhes de skad kyi sgra byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
208b7(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kang dag mnga' ba de dag sa bu bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang byang chub
208b8(mdo): sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang mchis lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rnam par 'phrul
208b9(mdo): pa'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yongs su sbyang ba byas shing phyir myi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa/ sa brgyad pa la gnas shing / sa dgu la 'bar ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pas
209a1(mdo): yongs su zin pa de dag yod de// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
209a2(mdo): dang ldan pa ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i stobs dang byams pa yod/
209a3(mdo): su rdzogs pas/ thams cad gtong ba'i stobs dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du myi gnyer ba dang / 'dren pa la myi lta bas/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs dang /
209a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad pa skyed cing / de rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir/ sems ma zhum pas brtsod 'grus chen po yongs su klas pa'i stobs dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin du spyod cing spyod lam/
209a5(mdo): ma khrugs pas/ ting nge 'dzin gi stobs la gnas pa'i stob/ sa dang / mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs shing rten cing 'brel pa/ ra 'byung ba dang / mthun pas lta ba thams cad spangs pa thob pa'i/
209a6(mdo): stobs dang / chos zab mo gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la lta bas thogs pa mye da pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs dang / rtogs pa
209a7(mdo): dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / spros pa dang / yongs su spyod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad
209a8(mdo): yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'khor ba tshad myed pa yongs su bzung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas myi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed thams cad rmyi lam lta bur mos ste/ 'khor bas yongs su myi
209a9(mdo): skyo ba'i stobs dang / chos kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pas bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gso ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed par
209b1(mdo): chos la mos pas kyi skye ba'i chos la 'azod pa thob pa'i stobs ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu po de dag go// nas byar 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de la byang chub sems
209b2(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ zos pa thams cad 'dzin pas gzungs thob ste/ brjed pa myed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed par 'khor rnams la chos ston pa dang // chos thams cad
209b3(mdo): rab tu dbye ba dang / spobs pa sogs pa myed pa dang / spobs pa bar chad byed pa dang / sba thams cad shes pas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed par 'khor rnams la chos ston pa dang / gnas thams cad la
209b4(mdo): mos pa rnam par grol bas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman sbyor shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su ngas pa dang / ji ltar so sor 'os par chos 'chad pa dang / byang
209b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed par 'khor rnams la chos so/ na pa dang / de 'khor gyi 'jigs pa bral ba yin te/ 'ga' ni gzhar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams nas 'ongs
209b6(mdo): shing / bdag la dri ba myi dri grang bdag gis ni de sten myi nus so snyam pa'i mtshan ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa yang dag par rjes su myi me thong zhing / sems can thams cad 'dri ba'i bskabs kyang 'byed de/
209b7(mdo): drib ci skad byas pa'i lan yang 'debs shing / de 'jigs pa dang bral la be tsom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas pa yin zhing 'jigs pa myed par yang 'khor rnams la chos ston pa ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal
209b8(mdo): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde 'jigs pa bzhi po dag go// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
209b9(mdo): bstadad pa'i sbyin pa can yin te/ de sbyin pa byin gcig ces sus kyang skul gyi dgos kyi/ skyes ma thag tu sbyin pa la sems 'jug pa yin te// gal te bdud rang gi gzugs kyis 'ongs nas de la 'di skad du/
210a1(mdo): khyod sbyin pa de byin pas ci zhig bya/ gang sbyin pa byin par byed pa de ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhes zer yang byang chub sems dpa' de ser sna byed pa'i gnas dang / skabs myed kyi de
210a2(mdo): bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba la sems 'jug cing de sbyin pa rnam par 'ged pa nyid la sems 'jug la/ de sbyin pa de thams cad kyang byang chub la gzhol zhing / rnam par sbyin pa myi re ba dang / sems can
210a3(mdo): thams cad la yongs su bsngos pa yin te// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni ma bstand pa'i tshul khrims can yin te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung
210a4(mdo): nA yang su las kyang bslab pa dang / so sor thar pa myi nod la/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas kyang bsngags pa yin/ bslab pa la dga' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas kyang
210a5(mdo): ji lta bur bcas pa'i bslab pa srung la/ mngon par byung nas ji ltar bcas pa'i so sor tha rad pa la bstan myi dgos par bslob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa'o//
210a6(mdo): srog gi phyir yang de bslab pa'i gzhi myi gtong zhing / tshul khrims thams cad du byang chub tu gzhol la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chal pa'i chu la khrims spangs pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub
210a7(mdo): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// de sems can thams cad kyis brgyad bkag cing spros la/ yan lag dang nyin lag rnams kyang bcad/ rab tu dbul ba dang / gdold pa dang / rigs ngan pa dang /
210a8(mdo): sbyin ma mkhan dag gis spros kyang byang chub sems dpal sems kyi zhug gA de dag la byams pa nyid kyis khyab par byed la/ bslar lan glan nus shing mthu yod kyang / lan gyi ljon par chos nyid la rton/ sangs
210a9(mdo): rgyas kyi chos kho na la rton cing / sems can de dag nyid dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir go cha bgos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i de rab tu nyam zag kyang
210b1(mdo): brtson 'grus myi gtong zhing nams kyang zhum par myi 'gyur la/ de gang gi tshe nyan thos rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ 'khor ba na spyod pa sdug bsngal bar mthong yang de nyan thos kyi yongs su
210b2(mdo): mya ngan las 'da' ba/ de la sems myi 'jug pa gang gi tshe/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal bar mthong yang de rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs
210b3(mdo): su mya ngan las 'da' ba de la sems myi 'jug/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub cing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad bya ba pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong
210b4(mdo): skye/ bdag kyang stong pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa rtse da pa'i chos la 'jug cing / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo la lta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rnam par grol ba
210b5(mdo): shes pa la myi reg pas/ rnam par thard cing sangs rgyas kyi no sa yongs su ma rdzogs pa de'i tshe yang de'i sems zhum par myi 'a gyur gyi/ bsam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i
210b6(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// zhes brtson 'grus bskyed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// gang gi tshe 'khor los
210b7(mdo): bskum pa'i rgyal po 'am// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ bdud dbang bsgyur bar gyur pa de ni/ de lha'i bu mo mang pos bskor cing / lha'i sil snyam dang / kar dang gru blangs pas bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa//
210b8(mdo): nam yang bsam gtan nyid mngon du gyur pa/ tshad myed pa rnams mngon du gyur pa/ de'i sems dben pa nyid la 'jug par gyur pa/ de'i sems 'du 'dzi' dag la 'jug par myi 'gyur/ de 'khor bas cher 'jigs
210b9(mdo): par 'gyur// de 'dod pa la yang myi sdug pa'i 'du shes chen po skye bar 'gyur/ de phung po rnams la bshed por 'du shes skye bar 'gyur/ khams rnams la dug gdug par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams
211a1(mdo): la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / bdag gi g.yog 'khor de la bdud kyi g.yog tu 'du shes pa dang / de bud byed kyi 'khor de la dur 'phrod du 'du shes skye bar 'gyur// de chos kyi g.yog 'tsha
211a2(mdo): nyid 'dod cing / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan pa nyid 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad tha rad pa nyid la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ de'i sil bstan dang rgyud can dang / klu'i sgra de dag las bsam gtan g.yan
211a3(mdo): lag sma 'byung la/ gal te de la bdud sbra de myed par byed na yang de'i sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus nam mkha' la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi spa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
211a4(mdo): smra 'byung ste/ des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal srid de dang / da bang phyug de bor nas/ nags tshal du gnas par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
211a5(mdo): chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// de 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam sa la snying po myed pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur/ de shes rab rnam/ par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ bag la nyal ba dang /
211a6(mdo): lta ba dang bral ba yin/ don dang chos la rton pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rmyi lam na yang bdag tu lta ba dang / gzhan du lta ba myi 'byung / de la bag la nyal dang / ltu ba dang /
211a7(mdo): kun tu bkris te 'dug pa thams cad myed cing 'gyod pa dang bral ba yin/ de bdud sdig can 'gyod pa gang gis bsgribs na// chos dang bral bar gyur pa'i 'gyod pa bskyed myi nus/ de gal te sems can
211a8(mdo): yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba'i tshul khrims las 'das kyang / de 'gyod par myi 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// de tshe rjes nas
211a9(mdo): kyang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du lus kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ lag pa 'am/ bong pa 'am/ dbyig pa 'am/ mtshon gyis sems can gang la yang gnod par gyi
211b1(mdo): byed de/ de mchos dang / dbyis pa bom pa yin/ bdag gi long spyod kyis chog shes pa yin te/ de lan pan sma gang tsam yang gzhan kris ma byin par gyi len/ sa gan rin po ches gang pa ya ma sa pa
211b2(mdo): bskyed/ de shin tu nyam lag gcig 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang / gos rngon cing rnying na yang / gzhan yang 'tsho bar gyi mthun pas/ nor bar myi byed cing / tshangs par spyod pa yin/ de ba na rmyi sa ldan yang 'dod pa rnams
211b3(mdo): yongs su myi spyod de/ de 'dod pa dang zab mo dang / nyon mongs pa byed pa yin/ 'dod pa'i phyir las phyi mthun pa myi spyod de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'o// de ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i
211b4(mdo): lus kyi las de dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// de dag yongs su dag pa yin te/ bden par smra ba yin/ yang
211b5(mdo): dag par smra ba yin/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed pa yin/ bad ka dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / ka/ nod sbyin dang / dri za dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa rnams myi
211b6(mdo): slu ba yin/ phra ma'i tshig myed cing 'khor myi phyed pa yin/ bad ga gi 'khor la rjes su chags shing tshig rtsub po myed pa yin/ da ga' bar smra ba yin/ 'jam por smra ba yin/ tshig mya
211b7(mdo): brlang ba smra ba yin/ rtsig skyon byed pa yin/ rigs par smra ba yin/ tshig nyung ba yin/ song por smra ba yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin te/ gang tshig myi gsal ba dang / gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / rtsub
211b8(mdo): ba dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / pha rolang po myi dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag kyi sba/ tshig khyal bar gyi smra ba yin te/ gang byed pa la ni myed ces smra
211b9(mdo): gang yod pa la ni yod ces smra ste/ de tshig gang bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa des/ ma 'dres pa'i tshig 'di rab tu 'thob po// tshig spras pa gang gis ma dad pa rnams dad par 'gyur/
212a1(mdo): la/ dad pa rnams kyang gong du mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / skye ba thams cad du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi tshul smra ba'i tshig 'thob par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i bsam la ma 'dres pa des kyang bden pa'i rjes su
212a2(mdo): 'jug pa'i tshig 'thob par 'gyur te/ smra ba gang smras pa de de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du myi 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// de bdag
212a3(mdo): gi sems la dbang du gyur pa yin te/ brnab sems myed cing gnod sems myed pa yin/ yang dag pa'i lta ba yin/ byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems de las nams kyang nyams
212a4(mdo): par myi 'gyur te/ de sems kyi gya gyu thams cad dang / sems kyi g.yo thams cad dang / sems kyi dmu rgod thams cad yongs su dag cing byams pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems kyis/ nyin
212a5(mdo): mtshan 'das par byed de/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de// ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// de skye/ sa ma thag tu bstan chos dang / gas pa sngags dang / rigs
212a6(mdo): sngags dang / sman dang / rtsi shes pa dang / yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / grangs dang / rtsis rnams ma thos shing / slob dpon myed par yang mngon du gyur da te/ de bstan chos dang / bzo thams
212a7(mdo): cad la mkhas shing 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la gzhan gi dring myi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan la gzhan gi ngor lta ba ma yin gi/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di ci zhig 'chad/
212a8(mdo): bdag cag gis nyan te bslab po snyam nas/ de nyid kyi ngor lta bar 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// gang gi tshe sems can gzhan dag dang /
212a9(mdo): gang zag gzhan rnams la 'jig rten pa'i gso ba sbyor ba de'i tshe rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa la myi re bar sbyor zhing snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos nyid
212b1(mdo): rjes su dran zhing / 'jig rten pa'i gso ba sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gis nam zhig na/ khams myi mthun pa'i nad 'di la sems can rnams la thar par bya ba zhi ku/ tha rad par byas nas kyang
212b2(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i nad shin tu spong zhing / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur snyam pa de lta bu'i dran pa thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de ni byang chub
212b3(mdo): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// de smon lam btab cing / re ba myed pa nyid du brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang / mngon par grub cing byang chub sems
212b4(mdo): dpa' de brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nyid don du gnyer ba yin/ 2khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang don du gnyer ba yin mod kyi// de 'i de dag bsgrim myi dgos shing / lhun gyis grub pa nyid du mngon par
212b5(mdo): grub par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' de gzugs 'do// da pa'i phyir tshangs par spyad pa mya spyod// long spyod 'dod pa'i// phyir ma yin/ rgyal srid 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ g.yog 'khor
212b6(mdo): 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa dang / brjod pa dang / smra' dod pa'i phyir tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa yang ma yin la/ de'i de da ka kyang lhun gis grub cing / brtsal myi dgos pa dang / re ba myed
212b7(mdo): par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// de rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gnas na yang / gang sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha
212b8(mdo): de dag byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du lhags nas dran par byed/ skul ma 'debs te/ de la 'di skad ston to// 'di ni bya ba yin/ 'di ni bya ba ma yin/ las 'di ni byang chub tu 'gyur/ 'di ni yongs su
212b9(mdo): nyams par 'gyur ro// khyod de ltar spyad cing de ltar gnas na/ dbang po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / mthun par 'gyur ro zhes lha de dag kyang de la skul la de yang rang bzhin/
213a1(mdo): gis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las myi g.yo ste// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// ji tsam du khros shing rab tu sdang ba dang za ba dang /
213a2(mdo): zhe sdang dang / gnod sems mang ba rang bzhin gis myi srun pa'i rigs can gyis sems can rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gnod par bya myi nus te// khros shing za ba dang
213a3(mdo): zhe sdang dang / gnod sems yang ba'i sems can de dag kyang / de mthong ba tsam gyis dad par 'gyur ro// gang dag de la log par byed pa de dag de la log par myi byed kyi slar de dag chos la sbyar ba'i phyir yang dag
213a4(mdo): par dad par byed do// de la log par byed pa'i sems can rnams ngam 'gro log par ltung bar myi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gang dag lus sam/ ngag gam yid kyis bdag la
213a5(mdo): log par byed pa'i sems can de dag gzhi des ngan 'gror ltung bar/ ma gyur da cig ces/ byang chub sems dpa' des thos nyid du tshul/ khrims ma 'dres pa'i chos yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs
213a6(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir te/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i de'i sems kyis smon lam btab pa yang grub par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i chos ma 'dres
213a7(mdo): pa bcu bzhi pa'o// sems can gang dag pa dad pa 'dungs pa log par lta ba las la gyi lha la/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la myi rton pa/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la brgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dge sbyong
213a8(mdo): dang / bram ze gzham dag la ma dad cing / ma gus la spyi bstar myi byed zhes pa myi byed/ ri mo myi byed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' de ma mthong ba dang / spyod lam mtho param thos pa nyid kyis dang cing kus
213a9(mdo): par 'gyur/ sti bstang byed/ zhes byed/ ri mo byed de/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ drang
213b1(mdo): sro rnams sam/ tshangs pa 'am/ bdag cag nyid ston par 'du shes shing / 'jig rten na ston par grags pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi na ngas/ de nyid rab tu grags par 'gyur zhing / su 'am/ gru 'am/ karbo/
213b2(mdo): sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ drang srong ngam/ tshangs par ston par 'du shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' de la btud rab tu btud/ de la rim 'gro byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag sngon bdag cas
213b3(mdo): ka ston pa de yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes su mthong nas/ skur 'ong ngo gus par byed 'di nyid kartse bo/ 'di nyid mchog yin no snyam nas dad pa thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems
213b4(mdo): dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// khyim 'am/ grong khyer gang na dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel zhing myi dge ba'i chos rnams spong la/ sems can yongs su sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos/ yongs su
213b5(mdo): 'dzin par 'gyur ba der de lhun gyis grub pa nyid du skye bar 'gyu ra te/ de der yang dag par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pa'i pha ma dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yul lam ljongs kang du
213b6(mdo): byang chub sems de skyes pa der ston pa gcig tu 'gyur te/ brjod cing mchod par 'gyur ro// ljongs kyis phyogs de nas sems can gang yang ngan 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

213b8(mdo): dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// de mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad dang mthun par 'gyur zhing // bdud thams
213b9(mdo): cad kyis kyang de la grags rnyed par myi 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba
214a1(mdo): ci'i phyir ma 'dres pa zhes bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir/ ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal rnam par
214a2(mdo): 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po stsal cing / snang ba tshad ma mchis
214a3(mdo): pa mdzad pa ngo mtshar lags so// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rna lam du grags pa de phyis gzhan
214a4(mdo): zos na/ de lta bu'i dad pa'i dngos po thob par myi 'gyur lags so// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob nas 'dzin pa nas/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas
214a5(mdo): kyi chos thams cad gzung bar 'gyur lags so// gzung nas kyang gzhan dag 'chad pa des/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yongs su smyin par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gang gis chos
214a6(mdo): kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ tshul bzhin du sbyar ba des/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur lags so// gang 'a de la bzod pa de ni rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa lags so//
214a7(mdo): gang 'di la nan tan bgyid pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan tan bgyid pa lags par lta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang dam grangs 'di dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni
214a8(mdo): mngon par shes pa pab cing // byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa lags par blta par babya'o// ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po khyod zer ba de bzhin te/ gang ros kyi sa
214a9(mdo): grangs 'di dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpal de ni mngon par shes pa thob cing / byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa yin par blta'o// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin
214b1(mdo): gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi pha rol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdung ba'i yang pha rol / de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal gyi yang pha rol da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal kyi yang pha rol da/ de bzhin gshegs
214b2(mdo): pa rab gsal gyi sang pha rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na

215b9(mdo): ba myed pa la bzod pa'i chos can du gyur to// de dag la gtam rgyas par bya ba yang phyi dgos te/ de dag ni zur tsam gyis go zhing dbang po rno ba sha stag go// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
216a1(mdo): chos ston pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha dang gyi ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis bshad pa de kun shes par gyur te/ de la kha gcig gis ni bzod pa thob/ kha cig gis gzungs/ kha cig

218a7(mdo): shin tu rnam par bye ba rnam par dbyed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pas rnam par gnond pa/ rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa la brtson pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
218a8(mdo): pa dang / babs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu sond pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan yid bya ba la mkhas pa
218a9(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa btags pa la bde blag tu mkhas pa myi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa myed pas/ rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
218b1(mdo): khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i
218b2(mdo): chos thams cad la mos pa/ rnam par grol ba la smon lam shin tu btab pa/ sems can dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / rmyi lam dang / chu zla dang / myig g.yor dang / brag cha dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs
218b3(mdo): par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi
218b4(mdo): dbang po la rtog pa gtogs par khong du chud pa/ shugs chen po 'a zin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ sha'i myig dang / lha'i myig dang shes rab kyi byig dang / chos kyi myig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan kyis
218b5(mdo): snang ba thob pa/ lam ki yan lag gi tshogs shin tu bstsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa// byang chub se mas dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir
218b6(mdo): myi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rdo rje dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon
218b7(mdo): sum du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog kyi smon ma 'jed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyun la rnam par lta ba sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar
218b8(mdo): gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya bas so so nye bar gnas pa/ rnam par thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du sngags pa yongs
218b9(mdo): su brjod pas kyang ma bar phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' byed/ dka' 'byung dang / lag ma rdo rje dang / rin cen me tog pa dang / rin po tog dang / mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i blo
219a1(mdo): gros dang / myig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga' zhing mchog du dka' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog man da' ra'i
219a2(mdo): dri dang / rlung kra dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lta dang / mnyam myi mnyam lta dang / kha lo sbyar dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / lhun po'i mo 'dzin dang /
219a3(mdo): lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i mchog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / mngon gsum blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs gcod pan dang / lha'i gcod pan dang /
219a4(mdo): lha'i yul gyi gcod pan dang / mdzes pa'i myig gis lta ba dang / ga bzangs dang / legs par bsam pa sems pa dang / 'khor lo rab gnas rkang pa dang / myi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon pa dang / ro rje
219a5(mdo): rkang pas rnam par gnon pa dang / rkang pas 'jig rten gsum na/ ma par gnon pa/ dga' stobs dang / stobs myur dang / stobs pa myi 'chad pa dang / stobs pa byin gyis rlabs dang / 'jam smra dang /
219a6(mdo): sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / dra ba can gi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshim byed dang / 'gro 'dzin dang lha'i rgyal po mchog dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / thogs myed sems
219a7(mdo): dang / skye rengs blo gros dang / myi bskyod pa dang / dpag myed rin cen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang / sna tshogs mye tog dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /
219a8(mdo): ded dpon bzang po dang / skyes byin dang / chu lA dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la bstsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs
219a9(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs so// gang stong gsum gi stong chen po'o 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
219b1(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyand pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
219b2(mdo): te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod par zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las yangs te kla gas
219b3(mdo): brag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba
219b4(mdo): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gas su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod do// 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros
219b5(mdo): ldan// snang ba banyes shing nyon mongs dri bsul pa// 'jigarten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin la dges shing / bas bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// dul ba 'dul ba gdul ba'i pha
219b6(mdo): rol phyi nad// bcom ldan lnga dang myi dang klus mchod pa// gdul ma zar phyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshon mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gi kha dog 'du// dge ba'i mtshan
219b7(mdo): kyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba'i// srid gsum mtshungs myed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gi tshogs 'joms zhing // phas kyis rgol ba'i rgol 'jos myi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gi sems kyi
219b8(mdo): spyod la mangs// thugs je mchog ldan rjod la phyag 'jal lo// dgra bcom rgyal ba nyan yongs rgyas bsas pa// 'cho ba dag ci'i rgyal shugs tshul khrims gnas// lha'i lha ma chog dri myed drim bral// pha rom tshan/
219b9(mdo): 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs rin cen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa// 'gon por rtag gnas rtag tu dkon pa dges// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa myi mnga' ba/ nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag
220a1(mdo): 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgyal bden bzhin bka' mchid gsung // myig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid tsamag/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rtsub// 'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal
220a2(mdo): lo// lha dang myis mchod pa'i mthu bo che// 'gon po lha'i dbang po bdud 'jom pa// myi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa'i// mya mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i chos la dges//
220a3(mdo): mnyam bugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas kyi rnams kha lo sbyar// yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta
220a4(mdo): bur 'jam pa'i gsung // dbyangs kyi yan lag rab chol kun rdzogs pali// bden pa bstan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa ma tshan ma myed cing smon pa la// zab mo blta bka' shin tu rtog par
220a5(mdo): dka'// mthar la 'jug pa mkhas pa blo gros ldan// tha ra pa li lam nges khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i ba com ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu myi mnga' ba/
220a6(mdo): las kyi nam sbyin 'bras bu'i kho na gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas ma byon gang ngam gshegs ma lags/ rtag tu bden pa'i chos rnams rab tu gsung // smyig rgyu rgyu bzhin lnga'i
220a7(mdo): myig mnga' ba// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba myi skye gang du yang skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang gang du yang myi bas pa// chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas/ gnas la myi gnas/
220a8(mdo): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin dag pa gsung // rtag tu myi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// lhun po rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// myi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku ni dben zhing mnyam
220a9(mdo): thugs blo ldan pa// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu mchog la zhus pa zhus pa rnams// 'jig rten zla bas myur du bskabs dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
220b1(mdo): chen po lha'i gcod pan gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das
220b2(mdo): kyis bdag la bstabs phyen// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
220b3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po lnga'i gcod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dri ba dris pa dang / den
220b4(mdo): lung bstan pa'i sa// khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol
220b5(mdo): te// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan cing bcom ldan 'das la 'a de skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na// byang chub se mas dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/
220b6(mdo): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa'i la 'ju ga pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lakra
220b7(mdo): pra shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa
220b8(mdo): shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa brjod pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
220b9(mdo): dpa' sbyin pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyis brgyan po'i brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags
221a1(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan ka brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems
221a2(mdo): dpa' shes rab kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las myi nyams pa rnams lags
221a3(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs
221a4(mdo): rgyas thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston pa la ma brtags pa/ kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba la yA sa sa mya ngan las 'das pa la
221a5(mdo): yang myi gnas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang / myi g.yo ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
221a6(mdo): rnams don yang myi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu gda' ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis nor de ra ldan la thabs kyis nor myed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byar
221a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' ma zhes bgyi ba'i spos rnam par ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang
221a8(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos gtan la phab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang // 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad
221a9(mdo): kyis myi gos pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar myi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang myi bral
221b1(mdo): ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis par bslob dpon rnams lags/
221b2(mdo): ji ltar sa byang chub sems dpal sems can thams cad kyi rton par gyu rad pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags// ji ltar
221b3(mdo): dbyang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang bskum pa thob pa rnams lags// de skad ces gsold pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i gcod par
221b4(mdo): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba dang / 'a dag rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang // s+pha dang
221b5(mdo): kyi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rig sa kyi bu khyod da ltar gyi dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na/ mas kyi rjes su gzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring
221b6(mdo): gnas par bya ba phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang 'ang 'di yongs su dri bar sems dpa' ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do//
221b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga'i gcod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
221b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la 'od gzer thogs pa myed pa rnams yin/ rin po che 'phangs pa'i dngos
221b9(mdo): po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yid la myi 'gyod pa rnams yin// chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa myi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so zhes bya/
222a1(mdo): ba byin pa dang / chos nyan pa 'am/ chos 'gro ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram// mtshan mo 'dug par bskul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang // byang chub kyi sems kyi bsam
222a2(mdo): ba dang / zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang
222a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin
222a4(mdo): ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed tha mas cad gang yang myi 'gre'o// gang nas kyang ma 'ongs par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa
222a5(mdo): ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag pa nga ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la/ mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
222a6(mdo): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te// bzhi ka bzhen/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang sgrib pa myed pa'i
222a7(mdo): sgo mngon gsum du gyurd pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems la su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun gsum tshogs pa ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
222a8(mdo): na// sems can thams cad kyi mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// so so ci rigs pa bachos ston pa la mkhas pa
222a9(mdo): rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // bdag gi sems sbyangs pas sems can
222b1(mdo): thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
222b2(mdo): chos bzhi dang ldan na// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'dug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis gzung ba dang / ye shes chags pa myed pa dang / babs la mkhas pa la
222b3(mdo): zhugs pas bsgrib pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa
222b4(mdo): nams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang lnga nun/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smyid pa la 'jug pa shes pa la 'jo dra ba myed pa la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par
222b5(mdo): smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su smra'i// 'di la
222b6(mdo): bdag gir myi smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu chud myi gzon pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang / 'chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi
222b7(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa la 'dug pa shes pa la brjed pa myed par spyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ sbyin pa'i brgyan gyis brgyad pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan kyis legs
222b8(mdo): par brgyan pa rnams yin// dpe' byang bzang pos rnam par smras pa rnams yin// gzugs lta bas myi ngoms pa rnams yin// lag na rin po che thob pas yongs spyod kyi zad pa yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs
222b9(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'ang dag dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i brgyad kyis brgyad pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/
223a1(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / phyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
223a2(mdo): par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas/ lha dang phyir skye bar yongs su gzung bar gyur cing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyar ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang
223a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di reg dang ldan na// tshul khrims kyi brgyaran gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i brgyad gyis brkyar ba rnams yin
223a4(mdo): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang / sma dbyangs lta bu dang / ldan pa rnams yin// ka la byin ka'i sgra dang / rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin// skye bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang sdug cing yid
223a5(mdo): du 'ong ba rnams yin te/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yid dam brtan// ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po// 'di dag dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su
223a6(mdo): rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi da nga ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa nyams 'og du chud par bya ba'i dge ba'i
223a7(mdo): chos rnams la yid dam la brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol kyis gnas pa myed pas/ rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i/
223a8(mdo): bshes gnyer byed pa rnams yin// thos pa'i tshogs bsngags pas myi ngos pa'i phyir yid yongs su myi skyo ba rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// brtson 'grus
223a9(mdo): kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ myi rgol ba yin/ ma khyengs pa nas
223b1(mdo): yin/ mu cor smra ba myed pa rnams yin/ cang shes kyi sems myi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o//
223b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can dang srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag du smra/
223b3(mdo): ba myed pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa myed pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dpe ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi myed cing / the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs
223b4(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem sa dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams
223b5(mdo): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi// dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par
223b6(mdo): bsgrub pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la dga' bas ma don par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i gtang snyoms ste// rigs
223b7(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// mngon par shes pa las kyi nyams pa rnams
223b8(mdo): yin te/ bzhi gang pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtad bzhi sdud par shes pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang bskur ba'i sems shes pa dang /
223b9(mdo): sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las myi nyams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
224a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ g.yul nas rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol tu myi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyus la
224a2(mdo): bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin
224a3(mdo): no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mngon
224a4(mdo): gsum du myi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la bsams bzhin du yang skye ba dang / lta ba'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcing bras bcing bar myi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la rten
224a5(mdo): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan// na/ rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs
224a6(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam ya ra ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
224a7(mdo): te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par
224a8(mdo): shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems
224a9(mdo): can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'dra
224b1(mdo): pa la yang gyi gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang babs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi des kyi 'dor pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
224b2(mdo): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang myi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la yang
224b3(mdo): rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang kyi g.yo ste/ gzhi gang zhes 'dis ste/ sems can rang bzhin myed pas chos rang bzhin myed par rtogs pa dang / chos rang bzhin byed pas sems can rang bzhin myed par rtogs pa
224b4(mdo): dang / sems can rang bzhin byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang ba na myed par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin byed pa la som nyi myed/ cing be tsom dang bral ba yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
224b5(mdo): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// khams sna tshogs la yang/ rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las myi g.ye'o// rigs kyi bu bya// nga chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang myi 'dor la
224b6(mdo): gnod par yang kun tu myi snang ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ sbyor ba 'kho ra ba la gnas pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
224b7(mdo): yongs su bskang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// don yang myi
224b8(mdo): 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu myi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor myed pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste rgya chen po la mos
224b9(mdo): pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba'i phal 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang /
225a1(mdo): slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing nor myed par yang 'gyur ba dang // nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyi longs spyod zad myi shes par yang ston pa ste// rigs kyi bu
225a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan par yin la/ thabs kyis nor myed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes
225a3(mdo): bya ba'i sgos rnam pa myed pa'i sgro la 'jug pa rnams yin/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad myi rtag par shes pa sbyor ba dang 'du byed thams cad bzod ma nas sdug bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa
225a4(mdo): dang / chos thams cad bdag myed do zhes bya bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni bzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
225a5(mdo): po 'di dag dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam par myed pa'isgol 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems da / chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon gsum
225a6(mdo): du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi myig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin// chos kyi myig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon gsum du gyurapa
225a7(mdo): pa rnams yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskor ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mdo su du gyur pa rnams yin no//
225a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shind tu rnam par phye ba pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa
225a9(mdo): bsgrib pa byed pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rtor pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba myed par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'ang dag dang ldan
225b1(mdo): na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// 'jig rten gi bya ba dang / 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs
225b2(mdo): pa thams cad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gi chos mngon gsum du gyur da pa dang / 'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang /
225b3(mdo): bzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gi bya ba dang / 'thun par zhugs kyang
225b4(mdo): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis ltar myi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
225b5(mdo): sems kyi dbang phyug dang shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub/ sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis
225b6(mdo): bltar myi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no// rig sa kyi bu byang chub sems da cho bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang myi bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi kang zhe na 'di lta ste/
225b7(mdo): sems can rnams sangs rgyas la blta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
225b8(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang myi bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang myi bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
225b9(mdo): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhi kar zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba/ ye shes mthong
226a1(mdo): ba mngon gsum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa
226a2(mdo): dang // nyon mongs pas myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang
226a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa myed par spobs dpon rnams yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun gsum tshogs pa rnams yin/
226a4(mdo): sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba la brtan zhing / bsam pa sgyu myed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba la myi chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de yang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du
226a5(mdo): byed kyi bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chu/ ba sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos rnams bla// nges pa myed par bslob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
226a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gi don byed pa rnams yin te/ bdag gi
226a7(mdo): bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba myed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho yi/ zang zing gi 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs
226a8(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi
226a9(mdo): 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / thos pa rgyan myi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam bshes pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam
226b1(mdo): chu khrid cing kyi byed pa'i chos ston pa yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
226b2(mdo): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
226b3(mdo): las kyi ldog cing myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin/ bsams bzhin du che dang 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang ston la/ phyir gyi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyal
226b4(mdo): yang dag par gzhol zhing / sa bcur nye bar byung nas/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan nA/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
226b5(mdo): la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa
226b6(mdo): drug du g.yos nas sdang ba chen pos kyang 'jig te nang gi khams khyabapar gyur to// steng gi bar snang las la bye ba khrag khrig brgya s+ho/ gis lha'i klu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i
226b7(mdo): char rab tu 'phab nas 'di skad ces/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das
226b8(mdo): kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bsnyad cing bshad de rab tu gnod to// bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyar pa dang / bos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas 'dzin pa dang /
226b9(mdo): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang myi brel ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar
227a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa bzhin du/ lA dang myi dang lha ma yin gi 'jig rten gi mdun du seng ge'i sba ba sgrogs par 'gyur ro//
227a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
227a3(mdo): bshad pa na/ lha dang mya'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyi stong na myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa to// de
227a4(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nga chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
227a5(mdo): 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang // gzhan dag la yangargya cher rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang lnga/ na bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rigs
227a6(mdo): kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i med sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur
227a7(mdo): ro// brkyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun gsum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed de// shin
227a8(mdo): tu byams pa bsgom par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / zos pa tshol bas myi
227a9(mdo): ngoms ste/ mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bstsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
227b1(mdo): rgyas kyi byid kyi rlabs kyis byin ga rlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gi nang du 'jig pa myed pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin// shegs
227b2(mdo): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang // gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas
227b3(mdo): mthus stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni gang dag sa phyogs mthon dman can dang / ri nag po dang /
227b4(mdo): chu byig dang / mtsho dang / mche'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgyamatsho chen po de dag thams cad kyi sdang bar gyur to// sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang lag zil lha ra mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chu na gnas pa'i sems
227b5(mdo): can rnams la yang gnod pa myed par gyur to// stong gsum ka stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo ba/ rgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu
227b6(mdo): sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de log/ sa su bdud mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de yi bshing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu
227b7(mdo): tshogs skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur da to// sa chen po las kyang pad ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa/
227b8(mdo): dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'bon to// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stob chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di khyab par gyur to// gyi snang zhing gyi dkrol bar yang ster gi bar snang las lha'i sel/
227b9(mdo): snyan dang / klu dbyangs kyi spra phyung ste/ grags par gyur da to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang las kyang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri myo mnam pa rnams mchog gi dri dang byung ste/ dri des stong
228a1(mdo): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di dri zhim po anam par gyurard to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi nga lngang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan/
228a2(mdo): 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ga ngan ba der mngon par bab nas/ sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// me tog gi shing de las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu bab cing / sil snyan
228a3(mdo): dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo // steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam du kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig
228a4(mdo): ki brgyan 'phreng dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i g.yer ka'i dril bu sa com chags kyi dra ba phyang bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba yid dga' bar byed pa// chags par byed pa des stong ka su/
228a5(mdo): ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di go bar byas par gyu/ rang to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
228a6(mdo): dga' bar bgyid pa mgu' bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang stong gsum gi stong chen po'o 'jig rten gi khams 'a de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur da par gang ba 'di su'i snga
228a7(mdo): lham lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ sha ri'i bu 'dini myo 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ri spos kyi ngang ldang nas 'khor gyi 'am ci stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor dri ba stong phrag tu ma dang / lha 'khor stong
228a8(mdo): phrag du ma dang / 'ong ba de'i sde ltas so// de smar gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de las myi 'am ci rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang klu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgyad stong du mas bskor nga nas
228a9(mdo): steng ka bar sdang me tog gi chu bo'i'o char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te/ phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal da te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM
228b1(mdo): skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spya ra 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gyi 'am ci rgyal po ljon pa bdag nyid kyis pi bang gi log pa bye ru r+ya las byas// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gis pa/
228b2(mdo): le'u can/ sa le sbram dang / nor bu rin po che ru mas spras pa/ sngon ki las kyi rnam par sbyin pas yongs su sbyangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po dag dang lhan gcig tu grag par byed do// myi 'am ci rgyal
228b3(mdo): po ljon pas pi bang pa de blangs pa bag tu/ de nas pi bang gi sgra res stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams dbyangs gis go bar gyur to// bi bang gi swA des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang
228b4(mdo): klu'i sgra dang / lha'i klu dbyangs kyi sngarnams zil dkyis mar rtsi gsal bar gyur da to// de nas pi badz+ra nasde des bskal pas 'dod pa ra spyod pa'i lce'i bu de dag gise lha'i rol mo bor te
228b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// myi 'am ci rgyalapo ljon pas pa bang de blangs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum ka stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di'o shing dang / ri'i rgyal
228b6(mdo): po ra rab dang / gangs dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang gzung dang / btang gzung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po dang / se dang / bar+Na dang / shing gel pa dang / sman da dang / nags tshal
228b7(mdo): ji snyed pa de dag bams cad ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg ko// g.yo rab tu g.yo kun tu rab tu g.yo'o// 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'di sa ste dper na/ chang giser lo ba'i rtsa'i
228b8(mdo): 'khyer rab tu 'byar kun tu rab tu 'gyur ba pa de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang ri de dag thams cad kyang 'dud rab tu 'dud kun tu rab tu 'dud do// / gyi 'am ci rgyal po ljon pas pi bar pa
228b9(mdo): log pa bye rur+ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral
229a1(mdo): ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
229a2(mdo): brgya byid dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten ba spyod pa dang / myi dang mi ma yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bsam gtan ba'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kris pa bang gi sgra de thos pa
229a3(mdo): dang / pi bang gi sgra de ma bzod nas/ rang rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud kun tu rab tu 'dud // gar byed rab tu byed byed kun tu rab tu bar byed do//
229a4(mdo): nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la myi dag 'a ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul zhing / spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas/ byis pa chu ru bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de
229a5(mdo): nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba rnam par thard pa brgyad las bsam
229a6(mdo): gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na// de ci'i phyi ra rang gi lus 'jog par myi nus shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du kar byed pa de lta bur ston// nyan thos chen po de dag gis spras/
229a7(mdo): pa// rigs kyi bu rtsi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bi bang 'di blangs pa dang // sil bstan dang / klu dbyangs sbyar dpas bi bang ki sgra des bdag cag la dbang byed par bdag gi lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par
229a8(mdo): gyi dga' zhing 'ad rab tu 'darang te/ sems rnam par gzhag par yang ma nus so// de ras byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis/ gnas btad 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od
229a9(mdo): zung cher po gas gtsug logs pa/ 'dod pa nyung ba/ chog shes pa/ spangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa dang / wa dang gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi mchod can du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzi
229b1(mdo): par myi nus shing / gnas brtan du gyur kyang byis pa chu ru bzhin du bar byed pa ltar ston/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos spras pa/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ rlung rnam par 'thor byed langs pa na/ shing dang / nags dang / ri
229b2(mdo): thams cad 'di ltar bdag cag rnam par gzhag pa'i stobs myed/ mthu khyed de/ de dag thams cad myi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo 'gul rab tu 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon ba
229b3(mdo): pi bang blangs pa/ des sgra thos pas bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis rin po che 'das pa bzhin du/ bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyu rad to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di smon lam dang / bsod nams
229b4(mdo): dang / ye shes kyi khyad par mi 'di 'dra ste/ des nyan thos kyi sod nams dang / ye shes dang / gzi' brjid thams cad zi lad kyis nond to// byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod kyis smras pa/
229b5(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ rnams kyi dpal dang gzi brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir pi bdon/ sgra des/ bskul pa 'am bskyod par myi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od
229b6(mdo): srung chen po su zhig bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyi bskyed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nye che ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa' rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de ni pi bang gi sgra 'dis
229b7(mdo): zil gis no rang to// gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang gzi brjid de la ni// zil dkyis myi non par myi nus pa la ltos// de nas kyi 'am ci rgyal po ljon pas pi bang gi smra de sprog
229b8(mdo): pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byed rlabs kyis bri bang de dang / sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de
229b9(mdo): bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stong pa myi 'gyur 'khrugs pa myed// bzod nas dag ste dri myed nam mkha' bzhin// gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa'o// /
230a1(mdo): mas ca mnyam thams can sems cad byed// sems cad spyad na sbya pas byung ba yang/ chos kyi sna dang mtshungs de de yang byed// ning rnam pa thams cad zhi nga pa 'i phyin te// ba
230a2(mdo): dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par sdang // 'phel ba ma yin gyi zad kyi skyes te// sob sog nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas byin// chos dbyings nges par
