268b5(mdo): mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri myi mchis// dngos po bas par// dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las// 'bru// nga ba lags kyis rje ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba
268b6(mdo): mdzad pas na// de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi// gang du 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur da pa// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma ma chis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog chags de
268b7(mdo): rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags// bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te// gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la
268b8(mdo): ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'// rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyir nus kyang gangal// nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung kada'i// sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur myi gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rtu la zhugs te// nam mkha'i dkyil gyi a
268b9(mdo): nas/ gshegs pas gshegs shing // gser gi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten ki khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang // 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi
269a1(mdo): phung po'i ri yang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang // bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra
269a2(mdo): blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal dang / khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos
269a3(mdo): dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i phyir/ rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la
269a4(mdo): ba der dong ngo // ljon pa'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgya da khri bzhi stong byed do// myi 'am ci'i mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grags par gyurd to// de ltar myi 'am
269a5(mdo): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer da te// bya rgod gyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta
269a6(mdo): de las babs nas// rang gi gnas su bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta de las babs nas/ bcom
269a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi bstan la 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i
269a8(mdo): ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de la babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong
269a9(mdo): rdal pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
269b1(mdo): ngan ci ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam// bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas
269b2(mdo): phyogs gcig du 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i gcod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor
269b3(mdo): dang bcas te shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig mthong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba des
269b4(mdo): myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa slas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pas// 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa las myi nyes
269b5(mdo): pa dang / rab tu thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas// sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong ba// dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang //
269b6(mdo): myi bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'acug dpa'i chos yong su zhu bas brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ myi 'am
269b7(mdo): ci'i bdag po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// myi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pas// khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par brnyed kyis khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba' ni gang sems can thams cad dang
269b8(mdo): 'kho bos kyang 'thob par 'dod de// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa// rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis// khyod dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rgyal po chen po byang
269b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang // thun mong du yin pa de gang yang myed do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
270a1(mdo): sem sA myi bskyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid myi bde bar myi 'gyur// 'gyod par myi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang / thams cad mkhyen
270a2(mdo): par yongs su bsngos pa de yang // sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni// sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang /
270a3(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa rnyed do// de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas/ des
270a4(mdo): myi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog chen pos mtshams myed pa'i 'gyod pa 'byung ba'i sems bsalang nas// khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba che na po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar bsgrib pa myed pa thob cing gnas
270a5(mdo): pas// khyod kyis kyang rnyed par legs par brnyed do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par/ byas ste/ ci nas gang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa yang /
270a6(mdo): brjed par myi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar myi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan gyis
270a7(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan la 'di skad ces bka'
270a8(mdo): stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na// chos kyi sdod du 'gyur te/ gsum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin
270a9(mdo): gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rtond pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros
270b1(mdo): dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang // bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes
270b2(mdo): cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang // dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang // dbul zhing nyam zag pa
270b3(mdo): thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i snod gtang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha
270b4(mdo): rol tu phyind pa'i snod thos pa tshol bas ngoms myi myong ba dang / myi ltos pa 'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang // bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba
270b5(mdo): dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang // chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang // thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems cad thams cad kyi
270b6(mdo): the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sa sa rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba srung ba'i snod zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i
270b7(mdo): sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang // mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / myi 'khrugs shing phyang bar lung bston pa'i snod myi skye ba'i
270b8(mdo): chos la bzod pa dang // stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di
270b9(mdo): ngag dang ldan na// chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i
271a1(mdo): chos kyi snod du gyur da cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur da cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces bka'
271a2(mdo): stsal to// myi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du 'od kyis 'khor rang gi gnas su song shig/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes
271a3(mdo): myi bgyi ste// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'as ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags// ji ltar na yongs su myi skyo ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
271a4(mdo): bka' stsa lang pa// myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad myed pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad myed pa
271a5(mdo): thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad myed pa thos na skrag pa dang // bsod nams tshad myed pas mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po grub/ pa thos pa na skrag pa ste/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'
271a6(mdo): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// yod sa su myi skyo bar rig par bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems
271a7(mdo): can gi khams tshad myed pa de yang / bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las zla bar bya'o zhes thos nas kyi skrag pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'khor ba tshad myed pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos nas myi skrag pa dang // thams cad
271a8(mdo): mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshad myed pa de dag gis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos nas myi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad myed pa bsngags pas mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po grub ste// bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos nas
271a9(mdo): kyi skrag pa dang // myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo
271b1(mdo): par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bskabs bskabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / bsgrubs bskabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing yongs
271b2(mdo): su myi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du myi 'jug pa ste/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su sbyong bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am
271b3(mdo): ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa myi 'dod
271b4(mdo): pa dang // lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste// myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
271b5(mdo): dang ldan na// yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i ga/ dag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// so// ngas su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
271b6(mdo): bslob pa mthong na yongasu skyo ba dang / bsod nyams byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la myi brtson pa dang // ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la myi stond pa dang / myi 'am ci'i
271b7(mdo): bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su bskyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe
271b8(mdo): na/ 'di lta ste/ bslob pa la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed cing / de 'gras pa'i sems myed la bzhin 'dum zhing khro gnyer byed de// chur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la kyi
271b9(mdo): chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa rol bas kyi ngoms zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu stond cing // zang zing byed pa'i sems kyis/ chos de dag gzhan la rag
272a1(mdo): tu stond pa ste/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
272a2(mdo): yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i lam yongs su myi tshol ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po la myi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus myi
272a3(mdo): brtsom pa dang // yon tan chu ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing / gong du myi tshol ba ste/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am ci'i bdag po
272a4(mdo): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la mye 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu
272a5(mdo): ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang // sems can yongs su smyin/ bar brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba/ 'i phyir de la chags pa yin te/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems
272a6(mdo): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'dis/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la lan btab nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
272a7(mdo): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bskyo ba dang / yongs su myi skyo ba dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam// rgyal pos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das
272a8(mdo): thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/ yongs su myi skye bar spyod par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
272a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bka' stsal pa/ myi
272b1(mdo): 'am ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes smra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal
272b2(mdo): po ljon pas rang gi pi bang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// bi bar de blangs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyi pi bang gi sgra de las/ seng ge basbyi
272b3(mdo): pa ltar shing sa la du ma g.yo ba'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod pa// chos kyi nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//
272b4(mdo): de dag yongs su skyo ba myed par spyod// bde ba spyod dang skyid pa skyo da pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa myed// brtan
272b5(mdo): ba spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ka/ nga du'ang sgyu myed spyod pa yin// dul ba'i spyod dang sbyin pa'i spyod
272b6(mdo): pa dang // dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang // bya nga chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ser sna myed par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang // lus dang /
272b7(mdo): ngag ni yongs su spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa myed// rtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang // khro skyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog
272b8(mdo): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnod sems myed par spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang // 'khor bar yongs su myi skyo spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo myed par
272b9(mdo): spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang // lus dang sems ni rab tu dben spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag g.yeng ba myed par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod
273a1(mdo): pa dang // chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'chal pa'i spyod pa myed// byams dang spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la
273a2(mdo): snying rje'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i tha ba myed par spyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan ma myed par yongs su rags spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod
273a3(mdo): pa// de dag smon pa myed par spyod pa yin// yang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang // shes pa thams cad yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du yang chags pa myed par spyod//
273a4(mdo): dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba myed pa spyod pa/ dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// bsam gtan spyod dang / rnam thar da spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang //
273a5(mdo): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag chags pa myed par/ spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa
273a6(mdo): gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin// chos spro/ da pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyun myi
273a7(mdo): 'chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du yang lta bar spyod pa myed// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag
273a8(mdo): spyod dang // nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su gdung bas spyod pa myed// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam thar spyod// sems can kun la 'jigs myed mchog
273a9(mdo): spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon lam spyod pa myed pa yin// nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad ma lta bur gos pa myed spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lhar bcas
273b1(mdo): 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang // dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang /
273b2(mdo): khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'dod chags nyes pa za ba gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du yang gti mug spyod pa myed// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab myig ni yongs
273b3(mdo): su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag kun tu rtog par spyod pa myed// dul ba spyod pa rab tu zhi spyod pa// mying dang gzugs la myi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag
273b4(mdo): sgra dang myi ni mang pos bstod// 'phags pa'i spyod pa shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la bab pa yin// dang
273b5(mdo): bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par/ byed spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de da ga byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don yod
273b6(mdo): spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba myed par spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du yang ma rig spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa
273b7(mdo): dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags par spyod pa dang // 'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa yin// byang chub
273b8(mdo): mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dman pa la ni spyod pa byed// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan bde las ldog par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/
273b9(mdo): de dag kyi shes spyod pa myed pa ni/ swa ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang // mying dang gzugs la gyi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs pa myed pa spyod pa yin// thams
274a1(mdo): cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yongs su smyin par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra'o// // byang chub sems dpa'i
274a2(mdo): spyod pa bstand pa tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di// pi bang gi sgra de las byung ba na// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyurd to// rgyal po ma skyes sgra'i 'khor dang // rgyal
274a3(mdo): po khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / myi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gi 'khor gi srog chags brgyad stong bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das
274a4(mdo): bdag cag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi 'o// nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can tshad ma mchis pa da ga kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 'dzin du stsal
274a5(mdo): par bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis myi 'am ci// 'i rgyal po ljon pa 'gror gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gan// ngas pas myi 'am ci'i ljon pa bu dang bcas dpung dang bcas slas dang
274a6(mdo): bcas gnyen bshes dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te// bcom ldan 'angs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bzod pa gsol nas/ sil bstan bkrol
274a7(mdo): me tog gi char bab/ 'od zer gi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos par byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste// de skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin
274a8(mdo): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas// bdag zil gyis gnond to//
274a9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ke'u shi ka myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas khyod 'ba' shig zil gyis mnand pa ma yin gyi// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs par// gang dag
274b1(mdo): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi brgyan byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten bskyod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zil gyis nond to// de ci'i phyir zhe
274b2(mdo): na// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byind dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil kyis nond to// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub seMs
274b3(mdo): dpa' ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis myi nond to// gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil kyis nond par sems pa de ni// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
274b4(mdo): dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa la sa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstand pa 'di thos nas// thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags
274b5(mdo): nas 'di skad ces/ kye ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa myi mnga' zhing / bsgrib pa myi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las ni nyams so// zhes smras so// // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byind kyi
274b6(mdo): bu// lha'i bu 'od zer nga srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyurang te 'dug pa des/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smra sa so// yab 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar
274b7(mdo): gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems myi bskyed pa de ni// sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags// rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes
274b8(mdo): gnyen la bsten pa ma lags te// phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ro// yab skyon myed pa la zhugs te rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa la rabagyir ci ma mchis// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sum bcu rtsa gsum
274b9(mdo): ris kyi lha'i bu las lha'i bu stong tham pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems
275a1(mdo): dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgyad stong phrag ji snyed pa// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gtang ba ni bdag la mngon gsum du gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das sngon byar
275a2(mdo): chub sems dpar gyur pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa rnams rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad
275a3(mdo): gcig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang bdag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol
275a4(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu'i 'od zer srung la 'di skad ce sra bka' stsa la to// 'od gzer da bsrung byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis ni// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par myi 'gyur gyi
275a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i brtsa ba brtan pa rnams kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od gzer srung byang chub sems/ dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur
275a6(mdo): te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i
275a7(mdo): chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa
275a8(mdo): drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang // mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang // thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od gzer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i
275a9(mdo): chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du
275b1(mdo): mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du myi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la
275b2(mdo): byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub
275b3(mdo): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams
275b4(mdo): cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang // chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'a dris pa myed pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste// 'od zer srung
275b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang lda na/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bsad pa/ 'di dag bshad pa na// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong myi skye ba'i chos la brjod
275b6(mdo): pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thur ba'i chos la bzo dpa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha mar// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsald pa// kun dga' bo khyod
275b7(mdo): kyis myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyind pas 'dul ba bstand pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam// kun dga' bos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag
275b8(mdo): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags so// bcom ldan 'das a la la/ ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyad pa 'dis mdzes te ngo mtshar te/
275b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgo mo bsdus pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang chos kyi rnam grangs
276a1(mdo): 'di la brten nus 'dum 'gyur du skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du bdags su nyem ba'i 'ja lang pa dang ldan pa zo chung ngu can thos kyi mig pa'i smon ma mchis pa/ bachad la zhugs par
276a2(mdo): gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang // 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i sngon du gyur pa/ blo rgyu che
276a3(mdo): zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa'i chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
276a4(mdo): nas chos kyi snang ba ji snyed gcig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshald snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
276a5(mdo): ki khams nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyu ra ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa spu'i lung
276a6(mdo): bu thams cad nas/ 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / stong phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig
276a7(mdo): brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang / rgyur yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i
276a8(mdo): phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
276a9(mdo): ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo' ba rnams mkhyend pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang
276b1(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / zos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
276b2(mdo): rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa dang sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang / snying rje
276b3(mdo): chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom
276b4(mdo): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na sa mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klon
276b5(mdo): pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag las/ nga rgya cher rab tu stong pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod rnams ji snyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
276b6(mdo): bka' stsal pa kun dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyirtse stong gsum mi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab
276b7(mdo): tu bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
276b8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyor ba byin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang bye 'phred kyi dus dang / nam gi ma song dang / nam gi gung kun dang / po rangs dang / stong gsum gi snong ches
276b9(mdo): po 'jig nyid gi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa dang / nam grangs 'di lta bus
277a1(mdo): lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na// kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las
277a2(mdo): bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag cing tshad du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gdugs cig
277a3(mdo): bstsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na// dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bstsags pa la spos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o//
277a4(mdo): khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don tu gnyer ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don tu gnyer ba dang / sems can ra rab tu tha rad par bya ba'i don du gnyer ba gang // chos kyi rnam grangs
277a5(mdo): 'di thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog ka ma/ kun chub par byed na// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bya/ nga chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de de las bsod nams kyi phung po
277a6(mdo): mang du bskyed na/ gang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lnga spos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las pa na tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gas/ kun nub par byed
277a7(mdo): dam/ gzhan dag la yang stod na/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi phan 'dogs pa de
277a8(mdo): ni// 'phan 'dogs pa rnams kyi mchos so// 'di la ste chos kyi gding ba 'di ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste chos yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
277b1(mdo): kur dka' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni// nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa byin pas na// lus brtan par byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa
277b2(mdo): 'bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin par byas ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/
277b3(mdo): yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul gsum bcu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs
277b4(mdo): pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags rung b.ra' gyur pa dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gi nyon mongs pa tshar
277b5(mdo): gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ba dang / las
277b6(mdo): byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang // yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang // grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur
277b7(mdo): ba dang // phyi ma yin pa rnams kyis grags rnyed par gyi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
277b8(mdo): dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par myi 'gyur zhing de la lha dang phyir skye ba dka' bar myi 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pas// byang chub sems
278a1(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rton pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa des bdag mya ngan gi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyings par gyur pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan
278a2(mdo): 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba stsal du gsol // gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang myi gsung bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa sdig
278a3(mdo): can khyod dang mthun pa'i sems can chos la zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang // gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig/ sdig can 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i steng nas rdul
278a4(mdo): blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam gra ngas zab mo 'di la ma mos te// de dag thams cad ni khyod dang mthun
278a5(mdo): no// sems can gyi khams tshad myed pa khyod dang mthun gyis/ de ba sa na sdig can dga' bar gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// sems can dpag tu myed pa ni byang chub la yang dag par
278a6(mdo): zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyi stong ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge
278a7(mdo): slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug du g.yos nas/ sgra chen pos 'jig rten gi khams
278a8(mdo): khyab par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab/ sil bstan brgyad stong dag nim dkrol bar rang 'khrol lo// la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang las kye bdag cag gser
278b1(mdo): gi 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa bshad pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni grong khyer
278b2(mdo): ba ra na ser chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can yongs su smind par ma mdzad pa de bas ches mchog go// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang
278b3(mdo): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher stond pa dang / za na glegs bam la bris te/ 'chang ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// zhes ched du brjod
278b4(mdo): ba ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub se mas dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod bar dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
278b5(mdo): to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de dag de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myi 'am
278b6(mdo): ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
278b7(mdo): dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i gcod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
278b8(mdo): mngon par stod to// 'phags pa myi 'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljond pas zhus pa/ zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// rdzogs s+ho//
279a1(mdo): rgya kar skad du a r+ya bo d+hi sa twa go tsa ro pA ya bi sha ya bi kurbi ta ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gi thabs
279a2(mdo): kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na
279a3(mdo): bcom 'das yul 'phags rgyal na/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi bskyed mos tshal/ sha~Mng sa la dang / ta la dang / ta ma la dang / dong ka'i shing dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / p+lag sha dang / u dum ba ra dang / pa ra shi ka
279a4(mdo): dang / d+ha nu ka ri dang / a ti muka ta dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'chang dang / skya sngar gyis legs par brgya nad pa/ 'bab chu'i dong dang / mtsho dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u dang / dzing dang / lu
279a5(mdo): ma mong pos mdzes par byas pa/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos mngon par gang ba/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / ku ra la
279a6(mdo): dang / la ba dang / ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / shang shang te'u dag sgra mngon par sgrog pa dang / ldan pa bung ba mang pos gang ba/ sa bzhi na 'u sing sngo ba dang ldan pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong
279a7(mdo): te stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang pas gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'dis ste/ me dang ldan bzhima'i bu dang / rtse'u 'gal gi zhu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang /
279a8(mdo): bu chen po dang / ka bi na chen po dang / dag pa dang / dga' bo dang / steng rgyas 'od srung dang / chu cung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba lang bdag dang / ba ku la dang / lam bstan dang
279a9(mdo): lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng nags pa dang / skul byed dang / gsus po che dang / sgra can 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag las stsogs pa dge slong khri nyi stong dang / thabs
279b1(mdo): gcig ste/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ nam mkha' gnas myed pa'i spyod yul ba/ myi rten par gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa dang /
279b2(mdo): chod pa dang / kun nas bkris pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad tshul gcig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon
279b3(mdo): par phyogs pa/ lam gi rgyun ma chad pa dang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la/ mos pa myi zlog pa'i yid dang ldan pa shes rab dang ye shes rnam par mthong ba'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ thabs kyi yul dang spyod yul la nges
279b4(mdo): par 'byung ba sha stag go// dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dadang grags 'dzin las stsogs pa/ dge slong ma brgyud 'bum dang ya dang thabs gcig ste/ chos kar po shi nad tu yongs su bsdus pa/
279b5(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam rab tu rtogs pa/ thams cad/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang nye bar gyurd pa/ dngos po myed pa'i chos kyi tshul shi nad tu rtogs pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyi tshul la rtog pa/
279b6(mdo): chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthas mtha' myed par shi nad tu mos pa bsgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa thob pa/ gdul ba'i 'gro ba ji lta bu de bzhin du gzugs kun tu stond pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// byang chub
279b7(mdo): sems dpa' sa ya phrag bdun dang / nyi 'bum gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang /
279b8(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon pa dang / rtsal chen dpa' bo dang / cher sgyings dang / cher bsgyings stobs ldan dang / tshogs chen dbang
279b9(mdo): po dang / glang po chen po spos kyi glang po dang / zla ba chen po dang / zla ba bzang po dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin cen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang / chos dri ma myed pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang /
280a1(mdo): rnam par grags pa'i zla ba dang / 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i zla ba dang / rgyas pa'i zla ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po ltar sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / sa la nges par sgrog/
280a2(mdo): pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sma 'bebs pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi rnga nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang thams cad du go bar byed pa'i dbyangs
280a3(mdo): rnam par myi rtog pas rnam par ma brtags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa steng nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil kyis gnond pa'i dbyangs dang / kun nas snying po dang / yon tan snying po
280a4(mdo): dang / chos dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang / rnam par snang byed kyi/ snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang gnyi snying po dang / pad mo'i snying po dang / pad ma'i dpa
280a5(mdo): kyi snying po dang / bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / ye shes dpal gyi snying po dang / bre gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags blo gros dang / rlabs chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros
280a6(mdo): dang / rin chen blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / rgyan chen blo gros dang / sangs rgyas blo gros dang / blo gros kyi zad pa dang / blo gros brgya mtsho dang / lhun po'i sgron ma dang
280a7(mdo): sgron ma chen po dang / chos ta la la'i smon ma dang / phyogs thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sgron ma dang / kun tu sgron ma dang / mun pa thams cad sel pa'i sgron ma dang / 'gro ba thams cad sdang bar byed po'i
280a8(mdo): sgron ma dang / shin tu snang ba'i sgron ma dang / zla ba'i sgron ma dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma dang / ngan song se lang dang / bdud 'pham byed dang / bdud cen pham byed dang / mngon par 'byung dka' dang / zhu ba dka' dang /
280a9(mdo): gting dpag dka' dang / blo rtogs dka' dang / ngan 'gro skyems dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
280b1(mdo): kazho nu rad pa dang / de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpal sa ya phrag bdun dang / 'bum phrag gnyis dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa ting nge 'dzin thob pa
280b2(mdo): spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ thogs pa myed pa'i myi 'jigs pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba
280b3(mdo): lus dang sems rnam par grol ba/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / ldan pa sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo phyung
280b4(mdo): par thob par byed pa la mkhas pa// sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos yang dag par ston pa/ phyir myi zlog pa'i chos ston pa/ blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa'i chos kyi
280b5(mdo): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ stong pa nyid brjod pa/ se/ ke'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad spa 'bebs/ ba/ bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa/ byang chub sems
280b6(mdo): dpa'i spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad thob pa/ rjes su chag sa pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa dang / chu dang mye dang rlu dang / sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang
280b7(mdo): ba'i gnas su chud pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis stong bsngags snyan par brjod brjod cing / bkur pa phyi ma'i mtha' bskal da
280b8(mdo): par byid kyi rlabs kyis byin kyis rlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'dzind pa/ chos rin po che'i 'od gzer dang ldan pa yon tan gi bsngags pa thams cad mthar kyis phyi nad pa dang
280b9(mdo): ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang por gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam phun gsum tshogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la smon pa'i spyod yul la nges par byung ba// sngon theg pa chen po la spyad pa legs par spyad pa
281a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis dri ma myed cing yongs su dag pa rtag tu rgyun myi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim 'gro byed pa la brtson pa/ phyir myi zlog pa'i go cha bgos pa/ snying rje chen po
281a2(mdo): mngon tu gyur pa rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ nem nur dang the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs/
281a3(mdo): pa sha stag go// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma du ma dang yang thabs gcig gi// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ lha 'am lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod
281a4(mdo): sbyin 'am gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yan nam lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ myi 'am ci 'am myi
281a5(mdo): 'am ji'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am lto 'phye chen po/ 'i dbang po 'am/ kyi 'am ci'i dbang po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid/ che ba/ rgya che ba rgya che ba/ g.yog 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang
281a6(mdo): ldan pa gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas
281a7(mdo): dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang sku'i 'od kyis 'khor thams cad zil kyis mnan nas lam me lhan na lhang re'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
281a8(mdo): brgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags shing / r-i nag po gzhan zil gyis mnan nas lam me lhan ne lhang re ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang / lha dang myir bcas
281a9(mdo): pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkyis mad dang cings ma me sman de snang ngo'o// 'dis ste dpemamatha pa yang bya 'o khri ba nyal bab ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byas pa ni stsag pa dang skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyi
281b1(mdo): mnand te/ mog mog por byas nas/ lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil da gyis man nad te/ mog mog por mdzad nas
281b2(mdo): lam me lhun ne lta pa de'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ dag cing dri ma myed pa'i nam mkha' sprin myed pa la/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyi dra ba rab du 'phro bar 'dug pa ni srin bu rtse khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan te/
281b3(mdo): mog mog por byas nas/ shin tu lam me ldan ne ljang nge'o//
281b4(mdo): de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdan seng gi khri la bzhun/ sa pa yang/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spyod
281b5(mdo): brnams kyi 'od kyis dkyis pan dang te/ mog mog por ma dang nas lam me snyad de snang ngo'o// 'dis ste ba dud/ mam cho chen po'i spos kyi 'bar bani lam me skad de snang 'o// de 'dzin
281b6(mdo): du bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang / lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che be dur+ya yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing dri ma myed pa 'od gzer rab tu 'phro ba ni lam me lhan ne ljang
281b7(mdo): de'o// de bzhin pu bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar mdzad pa yang lam me ldan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na gleng bzhi'i
281b8(mdo): sems can thams cad zil gyis man nad cing lam me ldan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lam me ldan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin thogs
282a1(mdo): pas ngas kyi chu mtha ma thogs snying lha'i mdun ma cos pa'adas na gnas pa ni/ sna thams cad gisad kyis yadad cing lam ste ldan ni snang 'o// de bzhin du cwos snang ras pa nas gro'
282a2(mdo): bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis man dang cing lham me lhan lgang de'o// de nas 'das dpal ga dur gyur da pas/ de lta bu'i 'khor cheran po 'dus par yang rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bskyes par
282a3(mdo): dka' ba de yang mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gdang seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang shin tu lam me ldan me lhang nge'o// 'khor cher po 'di yang 'dus par gyur na/ 'di ga tso'i swA ltas
282a4(mdo): zhig tu 'gyur/ bdag gis de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurang pa stan las lang sra nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzerang te pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang
282a5(mdo): sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logs su tha/ la mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa// 'di dag gyis mngon par bstod to// stobs bcu mnga' ba ltar
282a6(mdo): bcas 'jig rten gi/ zil da gyis mnan nas khyod ni lhan ner gyur da / srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra ma mchis na// lhag pa'i sems can mchi sa par ga la 'gyur// dper na// lha gnas gyur da pa lhun po ni//
282a7(mdo): ri bo kun gyi nang nas mngon 'phags te// ri bo gzhan dag zil dkyis man drad nas su phyogs rnams kun nas ldalhan ne rnam par mdzes// de bzhin thub pa yon tan mnga' ba po// ye shes ri bo'i dbang po 'jig rten
282a8(mdo): las// mngon par 'phags shing 'khor kun zil dman nad te// rtag tu ldan ner bzhugs shing rnam par mdzes// dper na/ mkha' la gnas pa'i dgung zla ni// mar gi ngo la mdzes pa ma lags kyi// dpal
282a9(mdo): sngan dgung zla nya ba rgyas pa ni// skar mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad zil kyis gnon// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba thub pa khyod// rang gi slob ma skor tshogs zham 'bring mda' ba// 'jig rten thams cad
282b1(mdo): zi lad kyis mnor mdzes shing / ye shes 'od rnams kyis kyang sim par mdzad// drang srong dper na gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// 'jig rten thams cad zil man nad rab tu lhan // mye'i nyi ma khyod kyang de bzhin te/
282b2(mdo): blo gros 'od kyis 'jig rten kun zil gnon // dper na ri mchog mchis pa'i zhugs kyi tshogs// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs su rnam par mdzes// de bzhin ye shes ri bzhugs thub pa yang // phyogs bcu dag tu rnam
282b3(mdo): par mdzes pa lags// dper na ri dgas rgyal pos ri dgas phran// zil kyis man nad cing der gnas mngon par mdzes// mu stegs gzhan kun kye nang gnas shing // thub pa khyod kyang de bzhin rnam par mdze
282b4(mdo): dper na/ 'di na gyi bdag 'khor los bsgyur// 'gro ba zil kyi sa mnan cing rnam par mdzes// mgon po chos mchog 'khor los sbyar ba yang // 'gro ba'i nang na de bzhin rnam par mdzes// dper na
282b5(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum lha dbang brgya byin ni// lha rnams zil dkyis/ man nad nas mngon par mdzes// mtshungs zla ma mchis de bzhin// tshogs pa rnams// thams cad zil kyis mnan nas rnam par
282b6(mdo): mdzes// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
282b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / dman pa la mos po'i sems can rnams kyang rgya chen po la 'jug
282b8(mdo): pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyang byang chub la dmyigs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dman pa la sbyor ba'i sems can rnams kyang brtson pa chen po brtsom par 'gyur
282b9(mdo): ba dang / lam las nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyang byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bsgrubs po'i dgongs po'i
283a1(mdo): tshul la 'dug par 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi skabs kyi yul rngam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs del/ 'khor 'dir bstar du gsol// de skad ces gsol
283a2(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ldem po dag dgongs te
283a3(mdo): bstand pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mos par dka' ba// shes par dga' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ rnam par shes par dka' ba/ 'jug par dka' ba/ yongs su rtogs par dka' ba yin pas/ cho ga nyams
283a4(mdo): pa 'am/ lta ba nyams pa 'am/ tshul khrims nyams pas yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par shes par myi nus so// dman pa la mos bu rnams kyis mos par myi nus so// bsam pa nyams pa rnams
283a5(mdo): kyis yid ches par myi nus so// sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su// ze nad pa rnams kyis 'jug par myi nus so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma ze dad pa rnams kyis rtogs par myi rus
283a6(mdo): so// chos de lta bu ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis brlabs par ma nyan par yang mya nus na/ mos par lta ga la nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par de ni
283a7(mdo): gnas myed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yid 'ong snya pa'i dbyangs dang ldan khyod kyis/ nga la gang dris don de ngas sta nad nyon// sems can dman pa mun pa
283a8(mdo): bsgribs pa yis// chos tshul de pa khong du chud myi nus// gang dag sngon sangs rgyas la spyod spyad cing // 'jig rten 'gon po rnams kyis byin rlabs pa// de dag chos tshul dam pa 'di thos na// myi rtog shin tu gya nom 'byung bar
283a9(mdo): 'gyur// gang dag sdig grogs sprul gyis sems zin cing / dge ba'i bshes kyis dug sman rngam spangs pa/ de dag dam chos dkon mchog 'di thos pa/ kye ma bka myed g.yang sa che las lhung /
283a10(mdo): gang dag sems cung dban zhing 'um 'gyur dang / gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa me myed pa/ yid ches myed pa mos pa nyams pas ma/ chos kyang de dag dga' bar myi 'gyur ro'i
283b1(mdo): chos mchog 'di la dad par ma gyur pa// de dag yun ring sdug bsngal lhung 'gyur te// kye ma sdug bsngal rnams la gnod 'gyur zhes// de la snying rje mngon byas de ma bstan nga // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
283b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni dag pa lags te/ spyad pa rnams legs par spyad pa// sangs rgyas 'byung ba legs par bsnyen
283b3(mdo): bkur bgyis pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi legs par yongs su bzung ba// dad pa'i myig legs par yongs su dag pa/ mos pa'i spyod yul la nges par byung ba/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par yongs
283b4(mdo): su dag pa// rnam pa bzang po rtogs par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni de lta bu lags pas de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di 'chal bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'tshal bar 'gyur na// seMs
283b5(mdo): can rnams la thugs rtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag kyang gsol da to// drang srong chen po gang dag chos 'di 'tshal
283b6(mdo): 'gyur ba'i// sems can dpal yon ldan pa 'di na mang du mchis// gang dag sngon sangs rgyas la spyad pa legs spyad pa// de dag rnams la thub dbang de ring chos bstan gsol// de dag gus dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar ya rmi
283b7(mdo): bya'i sde'i rags 'ang 'chis bkra na// drang srong ne po grad drug ce bskyed mdzad cing // dacos lnga dbyes pa 'i da ba du gsol// rgyal rkyong sa bdag rdzogs pa pa da// kyi ba gyodopa pa cwa na du ma// dog 'i byang chu se sa dang kyu rgo du sang da/ god po dan thag yon ya
283b8(mdo): gsol// de sos pa dang / chos ldad kyis 'das dngapa la gzhodun pa la 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
283b9(mdo): rgyas la don 'di dri bar sems dpa' legs so legs so// 'di ltar 'jam dpal khyod ni chos 'di dag la mngon gsum du gnas pa/ chos thams cad la the tsom myed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
284a1(mdo): thabs la mkhas pa nges par byung ba ste/ 'jam dpal khyod ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o// 'jam dpal khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba bya bar 'dod pa'o//
284a2(mdo): 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rngam grangs ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das
284a3(mdo): de bzhim 'tshal lo zhes 'jam 'phel gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcwa
284a4(mdo): gnyis dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la mos
284a5(mdo): shing dman pa la mos pa myed pa yin/ rang bzhin gyis snying rje spyodayul dang ldan zhing dkar po'i rang bzhin can yin/ bcos ma ma yin ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i spyod yul dang ldan zhing yaM dam la brtan pa
284a6(mdo): yin/ tshogs shin tu stsags shing spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba legs par bsnyen bkur cing dkar po'i chos legs par yongs su bsdus pa yin// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' zha na ma
284a7(mdo): tho ba myed pa dang ldan zhing sdig pa'i las thams cad bor ba yin/ sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa yin/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin du byed cing slu ba myed pa yin
284a8(mdo): bged pa'i ngang tshul can yin zhing / ro bro rnams la ma zhen ma chags pa mang ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi rlabs shing bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs dang bral ba yin/ sems can thams cad la yang
284a9(mdo): dang yang snying rje chen po yang dag par 'jug pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu yon tan gi chos bcu gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu
284b1(mdo): 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ste 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bde bar bya ba'i phyir phan pa'i sems so// sdig pa thams cad myi byed pa'i phyir snying rje'i sems so//
284b2(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems so// ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu sim par byed pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems so// theg pa gzhan myi 'dod pa'i phyir dag pa'i sems
284b3(mdo): so// nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa selang pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems so// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'i sems so// rdzas myed pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i sems so// dngos po dang
284b4(mdo): bral ba'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i sems so// myi srung ba'i phyir brtan pa'i sems so// chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i phyir myi zlogs pa'i sems so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed
284b5(mdo): pa'i phyir sems cad thams cad sgrol ba'i sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa/ lang to// rgyal sras gang dag spyod la legs spyad cing // dkar
284b6(mdo): po'i chos kyis bsam pa yongs dag la// dgra la 'ang byams pa'i snying rjes sems brlan pas// de dag byang chub don tu sems kyang skye/ gang dag sdig grogs dgra bo rnam spangs shing / byang chub
284b7(mdo): ston pa'i dge ba shes bsten gyurd te// byang chub theg par smon lam sbyor byed pa// de dag byang chub don tu sems kyang skye// gang dag sngon mthar spyad pa spyod pa na// nams kyang skyo ba'i sems ni myi skye la// rdo rje
284b8(mdo): lta bur myi zlogs sems ldan pa// de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye// gang dag skye bo kun la byams sems shing // sems can thams cad bde la sbyor 'dod cing // sdig pa thams cad spang ba'i bsam pa can
284b9(mdo): de dag byang chub dor du sems kyang skye// theg pa gzhan gyi yon tan myi 'dod cing // byang chub rgya chen yon tan mchog sems shing // rnam dag nyon mongs myed pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye
285a1(mdo): srid pa zhi ba gang la yang dag tu// skad gcig tsam yang yod myed rtogs myed cing // mye long gdan ltar 'gro ba kun lta ba// 'di ni yang dag tu na byang chub sems// nyon mongs skyon gyi rdul rnams rab/
285a2(mdo): spangs shing // dri myed nam mkha' lta bur rnam mdzes la// tshig lam nges tshig thams cad mthong dka' ba// 'odi ni bzang po'i byang chub sems shes bya// gzungs dang so so rig dang spyod mchog gi// rtsa ba 'di
285a3(mdo): yin mtshan gyi 'byung gnas te// dpa' byad bzang po 'bar ba lus kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rigs su gnas// / gleng gzhi le'u ste dang po'o//
285a4(mdo): 'jam dpal yon tan gyi chos de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis yang dag par mthong ba des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bcu gnyis po dag
285a5(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyi lam ston par yang / dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la sbyar bar bya// ba dang / longs spyod chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i lam yin par yang
285a6(mdo): dag par bzong bas/ sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i rigs skyo bar 'gyur ba/ yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / ser snga tshar
285a7(mdo): gcod pa 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/ sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / gtong ba'i rgyud 'phel bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/ sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /
285a8(mdo): yi dgas kyi grong khyer gyi sgo gcod par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / skye bo mang po dang thun mong gi longs spyod rnams las snying po le nad par 'gyur ba yang dag par
285a9(mdo): mthong bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / yo byad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs
285b1(mdo): su gtong ba la mos par bya bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la 'dzin pa'i sems bdag la myed par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/
285b2(mdo): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
285b3(mdo): pa'i rjes su bstand pa la 'thun par zhugs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu yon tan phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag par mthong ba'i byang chub
285b4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyin pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
285b5(mdo): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa lad to// sbyin/ pa rgya chen mtshungs myed sbyin pas de dag byang chub 'grub 'gyur zhes// rka lag 'go dang dri myed myig dang rkang dang de bzhin rus pa dang // bdag
285b6(mdo): ni longs spyod bzang po rdzogs 'gyur rigs kyi mchog du skye bar 'gyu ra// sangs rgyas dri myed lam 'phel yon tan ser sna yongs su spang sa par 'gyur// dbang dang pha rol du phyind las stsogs pa rdzogs
285b7(mdo): 'gyur sbyin 'di rgyas pas bsngags// mkhas pa de ltar du mar rtog cing don kun gtong la dga' bar byed// rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi chos bcu gnyis po 'di dag mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
285b8(mdo): phyi nad pa la brtson par bya'o// bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis byin gyis brlabs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su zin par 'gyur bar mthong bas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la brtson par
285b9(mdo): bya'o ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam du zhugs par 'gyur bar mthong bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag gi nyon mongs po'i 'chi ba rnams lhod par 'gyur bar mthong bas
286a1(mdo): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar mthong bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag
286a2(mdo): gyis ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par sbyangs par mthong bas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba myed par mthong bas/ tshul khrims
286a3(mdo): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ba dang / mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams kyis smad pa myed par 'gyur bar mthong bas// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag bag yod pa'i chos la brten pa
286a4(mdo): 'gyur bar mthong bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag gi sems can thams cad la myi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur bar mthong bas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
286a5(mdo): phyi nang pa la brtson par bya ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las/ sdom pa thob par 'gyur bar mthong bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol// da tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi
286a6(mdo): chos thams cad bsgrubs par 'gyur bar mthong bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bdag kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bla na myed pa yongs
286a7(mdo): sbyangs par 'gyur bang mthong bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la brtson par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag par mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
286a8(mdo): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ste// tshul khrims de yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal da to//
286a9(mdo): bdag gi nyon mongs 'ching ba lhod 'gyur zhing // bdag ni ngar 'gro'i sgo bcod 'gyur ro zhes mkhas pas phan yon yongs su bsam yas la// tshul khrims g.yag rnga bzhin du bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas rjes bstan
286b1(mdo): rjes su bdag 'brang zhing // bde bar gshegs pas rtag tu bsngags 'gyur la// bdag kyis byin rlabs don myed myi 'gyur ba// tshul khrims gnas las 'gyur zhes tshul khrims bsrung // lus dang ngag la kha na ma tho myed
286b2(mdo): sems la skyon myed chos la spyod par 'gyur// lus kyis bsrungs la ngag kyis bsrungs gyur cing / sems kyis sdig pa rnam par seMs myi 'gyur// bag yod bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa ste// dge ba'i las kyi rtsa hA
286b3(mdo): gang gyur pa// de la rtag tu bag yod bdag gnas bya// bag myed thams cad rtag par yongs su spang // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog gnas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams bdag gis thob par 'gyur//
286b4(mdo): sangs rgyas tshul khrims rab tu byang bar bya// de ni tshul khrims mtsho ka ces 'phags pas gsungs// yon tan de dag thob par gang 'ad da cing // byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog 'dod pa// des ni
286b5(mdo): tshul khrims g.yag rnga bzhin bsrungs na// yon tan thams cad ma/ khas pas myur du thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa bcu
286b6(mdo): gnyis kyis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad skad cig pa'o zhes bzod pa sgom par bya ba dang / bdag myi dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / bdag/
286b7(mdo): dang gzhan yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / 'khrug pa gtan myed par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang kun nas bkris pa rnam par gsal ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya/
286b8(mdo): ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spang ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang mtshar dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom/
286b9(mdo): bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las
287a1(mdo): cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad myed pa yang dag par mthong bas bzod pa bsgom par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
287a2(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya ste/ bzod pa de yang thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'ang
287a3(mdo): ngag bka' stsal to// kye ma chos rnams skad cig ya ma rma// de la rnams kyang sems can rnyed myi 'gyur// yon tan chos rnams rab tu rtogs 'gyur na// 'phags pa sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par 'gyur// mtha' ga
287a4(mdo): rnam par spang ba byas pas na// bdag dang gzhan la rtag tu gnod myed par// bzod pa phun gsum tshogs pa myur bsgom zhes// thugs rje che na po'i dbang po de skad gsung // rtag tu rnam rtog myed par bya ba la de ni brtan
287a5(mdo): pa'i yid kyis bzod pa bsten pa// zad pa shes pa bdag gyis thob/ bya zhes// nyon mongs zhi bar bya phyir bzod pa ste// mtshan gzug sa dpe' byad bzang po dag bya dang // tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gro bar su
287a6(mdo): 'dod pa// brtson 'grus brtan pa de yis bzod stobs stenang// bzod la mos na thams cad 'byor da par 'gyur// bdud kyi stobs ni stobs myed bya ba la// bzod pa 'dra ba stobs zla gang yang myed// de ni yon tan
287a7(mdo): kun gyi 'byung gnas te// de phyir bzod pa'i yon tan de bsten bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas rtulang pa bcu gnyis kyis brtson 'grus brtsom par bya'o// bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos
287a8(mdo): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i rtul pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro ba'i rtuld pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
287a9(mdo): thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rtul pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya bo'i rtul pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
287b1(mdo): spyi dad par bya ba'i rtul pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod pa'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi shes pa gsal pa'i rtul
287b2(mdo): pas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i brtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhi thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rtuld pas brtson
287b3(mdo): 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / phyi mo'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal par sems can gyi don du spyod pa spyad pas yongs su myi skyo ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / skad cig gcig gyis 'jig rten gi khas thams cad
287b4(mdo): du 'gro ba'i rtul bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtul pas
287b5(mdo): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ste// rigs kyi bu rtul ba bcu gnyis po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtso// na 'grus brtsam par bya ste/ brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen
287b6(mdo): ba nyid du yongs su sngo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// drang srong sras po gang dag byang chub mchog 'dod pa// khyu mchog de dag rnam kyi
287b7(mdo): brtson 'grus ma zhum mchog/ de dag sangs rgyas zhing ni brgyar yang 'gro bar byed// de dag yun ring spyad pa spyod kyang skyo ba myed// sems can yongs su smin par bya phyir brtson 'grus can// de dag bskal pa brgya phrag
287b8(mdo): mang por sdug bsngal bzod// skye bo sdug bsngal dpag myed zhi bde sbyin 'dod pa// le lo myed pa de dag brtson 'grus myi nyam 'dod// zhing kun rnam par sbyong bar bdag ni smon lam 'debs// chos rnams 'di dag thos
287b9(mdo): cad rnam pa kun rtogs bya// zhing brgya kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// theg pa mchog la bdag gyis sems can bye ba gdul// shi nad tu rgya che zhing rnams sprul pa byas nas su// sems kyi skad cig gcig
288a1(mdo): la byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// rgyal ba'i sras po brtson 'grus pha rol dong ba dag/ sems can don du rnam par 'phrul ba 'di na ston // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas rnam pa bcu
288a2(mdo): gnyis kyis bsam gtan rnams la bsgom par bya'o// bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shin tu myi 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i rnam pa dang / yul rnams la myi rgyug pa'i phyir sems gnas
288a3(mdo): pa'i rnam pa dang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir myi gnas pa'i rnam pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnond pa'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das
288a4(mdo): pa'i rnam pa dang / de la ma chags pa'i phyir khyad par gyi rnam pa dang / bsam gtan zlog pa'i phyir 'dod rgyal gyi rnam pa dang / dngos po 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi rnam pa dang / tshad yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
288a5(mdo): spo dang po'i phyir chad myed pa'i rnam pa dang / shi rang tu zhi ba'i phyir ni/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang / cang shes pa'i phyir sems dul ba'i rnam pa/ dang / dbang po nges par bsdams pa'i phyir nges par sems dpa'/
288a6(mdo): rnam pa dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa ma bor ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pa'i rnam pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan sgom gyi/ nga rgyal dang lta ba dang sred pa'i shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa'i ni ma
288a7(mdo): yin te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad zil kyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan rnams sgom par bya ste/
288a8(mdo): bsam gtan de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' gzi ldan pa// me nyid de dag
288a9(mdo): bsam gtan ni nyon mongs thams cad zhi phyir dang // shim tu 'khrug rtsed ngor phyir yin// zhi ba'i zhi gnas nges par sems// yul la'ang rtag par dka' ba myed// sems 'khrug gyur ra ba gnas rnams su// rtag
288b1(mdo): par yang dag rab tu sbyor// myi gnas de dag bsam gtan byed// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa// gang la'ang de dag myi gnas te/ de dag myi gnas bsam gtan byed// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can//
288b2(mdo): bsam gtan 'jig rten 'das par brjod// de bas ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis// nyan thos rnams dang 'jig rten 'phags// de dag bsam gtan las su rung // ji ltar 'dod bzhin dbang yang sbyar// 'dod pa'i khams
288b3(mdo): su skye myi 'dod// de dag bsam gtan zlog par byed// bdag nyid chen po de dag gi// bsam gtan rnams mi rnam pas 'phags// de dag der chags myed pa zhes// de phyir rgyal bas bka' stsal to// sems cad/
288b4(mdo): myed chos dri myed de// de dag bsam gtan tshad myed do// phyogs gcig bsam gtan byed pa dag/ gzil kyis mnan cing bsam gta na byed// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa'o// ma smad bsam gtan pas
